Title: Rujugiro wa APR na Rwarutabura bahawe ibiribwa n’umufana wa Rayon
Body:
Umufana wa Rayon Sports, Mutsinzi Jean ubarizwa mu itsinda rya The Blue Winners muri iki gitondo yahaye inkunga y’ibiribwa umufana ukomeye wa APR Rujugiro na Rwarutabura wa Rayon Sports.
Ibi biribwa yatanze muri iki gitondo birimo Ibitoki, Kawunga, Umuceri, Ibishyimbo, Isukari, Ifu y’igikoma n’ibindi mu gufasha imiryango yabo mu bihe nk’ibi bikomereye abasanzwe barya ari uko bagiye gukora akazi ka bubyizi.
MUNYANEZA Jacques wamenyekanye ku izina rya Rujugiro umufana wa APR FC wahawe ibi biribwa aganira n’Umuseke yavuze ko ari ibintu byamutunguye bimwereka ko hanze y’ikibuga abafana baba ari abavandimwe.
Ati “Ni ibintu byantunguye kubona umufana wa Rayon Sports mucyeba wa APR FC akora iki gikorwa cy’urukundo, biradushimishije kuko ibi biribwa bigiye kudufasha muri iyi minsi ikomeye turimo n’imiryango yacu.”
Rujugiro avuga ko muri iyi minsi itoroshye kubera Coronavirus we n’umuryango bari mu rugo bakurikiza gahunda za Leta by’umwihariko gukaraba kenshi gashoboka ku munsi.
Muri iyi minsi isi yugarijwe n’iyorezo cya Corovirus cyahagaritse ibikorwa by’imikino mu Rwanda abasaga 75 bamaze kucyandura naho Umubare w’abanduye COVID-19 hirya no hino ku Isi umaze kugera ku bihumbi 800 mu gihe abishwe n’iki cyorezi bamaze kugera mu bihumbi 40.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Pape Diouf wabaye Perezida wa Olympique de Marseille yahitanywe na Covid-19
Body:
Pape Diouf wigeze kuyobora ikipe y’umupira w’amagaru ya Olympique Marseille mu Bufaransa akaba yarabaye  n’Umunyamakuru yahitanywe na Covid-19.
Ni umugabo w’imyaka 68 ufite inkomoko muri Senegal. Pape Diouf yagize uruhare mu guteza imbere umupira w’amaguru, azamura abakinnyi barimo Basile Boli, Didier Drogba na Samir Nasri, yapfuye kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki 31 Werurwe ahitanywe na Covid-19.
Diouf yabaye umuyobozi wa Marselle yo mu Bufaransa kuva mu mwaka wa 2005 -2009 asimburwa na Jean-Claude Dassier.
Amakuru y’uburwayi  bwa Diouf yamenyekanye mu mpere z’icyumweru gishize, uburwayi buza gukomera ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 28 Werurwe ubwo yashyirwaga mu byuma byamufashaga guhumeka.
Yagombaga koherezwa mu Bufaransa kuri uyu wa kabiri mu gitondo ngo akomeze kwitabwaho n’inzobere ariko aza kuremba cyane indege ntiyaba ikigiye kugeza ubwo yatabarutse ku mugoroba.
Papa Diouf yavutse tariki ya 18 Ukubuza 1951 avukira Abéché muri Tchad nyuma y‘amazi umunani ababyeyi be bamujyana muri Senegal.
Yakuze akunda umupira w’amaguru, ku myaka 18 se umubyara yaje kumwohereza i Marseille mu Bufaransa gukurikira amasomo ya Gisirikare aho yashakaga ko na we azaba umusirikare nka se, warwaniriye Ubufaransa mu Ntambara ya Kabiri y’Isi.
Papa Diouf yarabyanze atangira gukurikiza amahitamo ye yiga amashuri asazwe ayarangije aza guhura na Tony Salvatori amwinjiza mu mwuga w’itangazamaku amushakira akazi mu kinyamakuru La Marseillaise.
Yahoraga ajya gutara amakuru y’ikipe ya Olympique de Marseille byatumye amenya ubuzima bwayo aza no kuyibera umuyobozi mu mwaka wa 2005- 2009.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Numvaga nzarangiriza ‘carrière’ yanjye  muri Rayon- Bakame
Body:
Ndayishimiye Eric AKA Bakame umunyezamu w’Ikipe y’igihugu Amavubi na As Kigali, avuga ko ubwo yakiniraga Rayon Sports yumvaga ko ari yo kipe azarangirizamo uyu mwuga ariko ko byanze akayivamo mu buryo butunguranye butari na bwiza.
Uyu munyezamu umaze igihe kinini muri shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda, yagiranye ikiganiro na RBA agaruka ku bihe byiza n’ibibi yanyuzemo muri uyu mwuga.
Bakame azwi cyane muri Rayon Sports yatwaye ibikombe ikanitabira amarushanwa mpuzamahanga akomeye ubwo yagendaga atabara iyi kipe agakuramo ibitego byabaga byabazwe.
Uyu mukinnyi wanaje kuva muri iyi kipe yirukanwe mu buryo butari bwiza ashinjwa kugambanira iriya kipe, yavuze ko na we atabyishimiye kuko yayigiriyemo ibihe byiza.
Ati «Numvaga ari yo nzanarangirizamo carriere (igihe cye muri football) yanjye.”
Avuga ko ubuzima ntawe ugena aho bumwerekeza ku buryo bishobotse ashobora kugaruka muri Rayon Sports yaba ari umukinnyi cyangwa ari umutoza.
Yavuye muri Rayon aza no kujya muri Kenya mu ikipe ya AFC Leopards biranga ahita agaruka mu Rwanda ubu akinira As Kigali.
Yanagarutse ku mateka ye mu mupira w’amaguru yatangiye muri Les Citadin ikiri mu kiciro cya kabiri cya Shampiyona akaza kwisanga mu kiciro cya kabiri ari muri Atraco FC.
Ngo ikipe ikomeye yakinanye na yon i APR FC yari ikirimo abakinnyi bamenyekanye cyane mu Rwanda barimo Mbuyu Twite na Kabange Twite.
Ngo icyo gihe kandi yanakinanaga na Ndori Jean Claude bombi ari abanyezamu bakomeye mu Rwanda ku buryo umwe yabonaga umwanya ari uko undi akoze ikosa.
Uyu mukinnyi unazwiho gushyenga cyane, avuga ko mbere yari afite impano yo gukina Volleyball ndetse ko ari na wo mukino wa mbere watumye asohoka mu Rwanda.
Avuga ko igihe azaba ahagaritse gukina atazawuvamo ahubwo ko azakomeza nk’umutoza w’abanyezamu kugira ngo azamure impano z’abanyarwanda bifuza kuzaba abanyezamu.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Abakinnyi ba Juventus n’umutoza bemeye kumara amezi 4badahembwa
Body:
Abakinnyi ba Juventus n’umutoza Maurizio Sarri bemeye ko imishahara yabo ihagarikwa mu gihe cy’amezi ane mu kurinda ikipe yabo yagira igihombo.
Nyuma y’uko imikino yose mu Buutaliyani ihagaritswe kugeza ku itariki ya 3 Mata 2020, muri kiriya gihugu kibasiwe cyane na coronavirus i Burayi, abarwayi bakaba barenga 92,000 naho abarenga 10,000 bamaze kwicwa na Covid-19, ingaruka z’iki cyorezo zageze no ku bukungu bw’amakipe.
Abakinnyi ba Juventus bemeye kwigomwa umushahara wabo, iyi kipe ikinamo rutahizamu Cristiano Ronaldo ukomoka muri Portugal n’umukinnyi, Aaron Ramsey, bo na bagenzi babo ntibazahembwa umushahara w’uku kwezi kwa Werurwe, Mata, Gicuraci na Kamena.
Ikipe yabo ni yo iyoboye urutonde rwa shampiyona ya Serie A, irusha inota rimwe Lazio Roma.
Mu gihe umupira w’amaguru waba wongeye gusubukurwa muri iki gihugu, ubuyobozi bwa Juventus buvuga ko buzongera kubisuzuma “bushyize mu gaciro”.
Abakinnyi bo mu yandi makipe amwe akomeye y’i Burayi, arimo Bayern Munich na Borussia Dortmund yo mu Budage, na bo bemeye kugabanyirizwa umushahara.
Mu Bwongereza, bamwe mu bakinnyi barimo na David de Gea umunyezamu wa Manchester United ukomoka muri Espagne batanze ubufasha mu by’ubuvuzi mu bihugu bakomokamo.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Tugume mu rugo ku bwo kurinda ubuzima bwacu – Sadate/Rayon Sports
Body:
Kuri uyu wa mbere nibwo Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje imibare mishya y’abantu bamaze kugaragarwaho n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho imibare igeze ku bantu 36, nta we iki cyorezo kirahitana mu Rwanda, Munyakazi Sadate Perezida wa Rayon Sports yasabye abari mu rwego rwa Siporo bose kuguma mu ngo iwabo bakarinda ubuzima.
Perezida wa Rayon Sports, abinyujije kuri Twitter yasabye abakunzi ba Rayon Sports kuguma mu ngo zabo kugira ngo barinde ubuzima bwabo.
Yanditse ati “Ma miliyoni yihebeye Rayon Sports, Banyarwanda mureke tugume mu rugo kugira ngo turinde ubuzima bwacu kandi dukurikize amabwiriza duhabwa n’ubuyobozi bwacu.  Guma mu rugo wirinde kandi urinde n’abandi, ubuzima ni ubw’agaciro tububungabunge.”
Munyakazi Sadate yakomeje avuga ati “Ndabizi ko mu bo mbwira harimo n’ababa basohotse ariko igomwe ugume mu rugo.”
Uyu muyobozi aherutse gusaba abakunzi ba Rayon Sports kwitanga kugira ngo ikipe itazasenywa na Coronavirus, mu munsi umwe atangaje ibyo, Aba-Rayon bitanze Miliyoni imwe y’amafranga y’u Rwanda, ariko intego ya Rayon Sports ni ukuzishakamo miliyoni 20.
Shampiona y’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda yarahagaze kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Leta y’u Rwanda yasohoye amabwiriza yatangiye kubahirizwa tariki 21 Werurwe 2020, agamije kugabanya ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya coronavirus, asaba Abaturarwanda guhagarika ingendo zitari ngombwa.
Nibura ayo mabwiriza yubahirijwe, u Rwanda mu byumweru bibiri rwaba rumaze guhashya iki cyorezo kuko mu minsi 14 ukirwaye aba yagaragaje ibimenyetso.
Jean Paul NKUNDINEZA 
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Rayon irasinya amasezerano na Airtel azayinjiriza miliyoni 240 FRW
Body:
Rayon Sports na Airtel-Tigo bagiye gusinya amasezerano y’ubufatanye mu myaka itanu, abakinnyi ba Rayon bakazajya bambara ikirango cya Airtel ku kaboko nayo ikazabaha miliyoni 48Frw buri mwaka mu gihe cy’imyaka itanu.
Umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports, Sadate Munyakazi yabwiye Radio 10 mu kiganiro cyayo cy’imikino ko amasezerano impande zombi zamaze kuyumvikanaho, akaba ari bushyirrwaho umukono kuri uyu w Mbere agatangira kubahirizwa.
Ati : “Urebye ni uko hajemo ikibazo cy’iki cyorezo twari kuba twayasinye tukanatumira itangazamakuru rikaza tukaryereka ibiyakubiyemo , ariko ntabwo byakunze.  Ndayasinyira mu biro nyoherereze abafatanyabikorwa nabo basinye ubwo turaza gutanga itangazo ry’uko byagenze nyuma.”
Tariki 01 Ukwakira 2019 iyi kipe yasinye amasezerano y’imikoranire mu gihe cy’umwaka umwe na sosiyete itwara abantu n’ibintu mu Rwanda “RITCO” .
Mu mezi atanu ashije Rayon Sports itangiye  ubu buryo imaze kubona abafanyabikorwa bagera kuri  batanu .
Airtel iraba ibaye umuterankunga wa kabiri wa Rayon Sports nyuma y’uruganda Skol  ariko ubu rutagikorana neza na Rayon Sports.
 Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Lorenzo Sanz wabaye Perezida wa Real Madrid yahitanywe na Coronavirus
Body:
Lorenzo Sanz yapfuye ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe 2020, aguye mu bitaro, yari arwaye Coronavirus. Uyu yabaye Umuyobozi wa Real Madrid yo mu Cyiciro cya Mbere muri Espagne. 
Sanz yapfuye afite imyaka 76 y’amavuko, yayoboye Real mu mwaka wa 1995 – 2000. Icyo gihe Real Madrid yatwaye ibikombe bibiri bya Champions League.
Igikombe cya mbere ku buyobozi bwe Real Madrid yagitwaye mu 1998 itsinze Juventus ku mukino wa nyuma, hari hashize imyaka 32 idatwara iki gikombe.
Lorenzo San Duran umuhungu we yavuze iby’uru rupfu rwa Se abinyujije ku rubuga rwa Twitter.
Yagize ati “Data yitabye Imana. Ntabwo yari akwiye iherezo rimeze gutya. Umwe mu bantu beza, b’intwari kandi bakoraga cyane nabonye mu buzima bwange. Umuryango we na Real Madrid ni byo yashyiraga imbere.”
Lorenzo yavuye ku buyozi bwa Real Madrid atsinzwe na Florentino Perez mu 2000, niho Real Madrid yatangiriye ibihe bishya bya “Galácticos” (gukinisha abakinnyi bahenze cyane) itangira gukoresha amafaranga menshi.
Nyuma yo gutandukana na Real Madrid, Lorenzo Sanz yaguze ikipe ya Malaga mu 2006,  aza kuyigurisha muri 2010.
Lorenzo Sanz abaye umwe mu hitanywe na Coronavirus ufite aho ahuriye n’ibikorwa bya siporo ku Isi.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Imibanire yacu na  Skol ni nka bisi yacitse feri- Perezida wa Rayon Sadate
Body:
*Ikibanza cya sitade baracyitweretse
*Ibya Skol natwe ni nka bus yacitse feri
*Yanga SC ntifite ubushobozi bwo kugura umukinnyi wa Rayon
*Rayon Sports iheruka guhemba abakinnyi muri Mutarama, 2020
*Igikombe cy’amahoro ni ‘nyirantarengwa’
Mu kiganiro Umuyozi wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate ahamya ko ibiganiro na Skol bimeze nk’imodoka yacitse  feri.  Ibi yabitangaze mu kiganiro yagiranye n’abakunzi b’umupira w’amaguru kuri group ya Whatsap yitwa Ruhago yacu.
Ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu taliki 20 Werurwe, 2020 Perezida wa Rayon Sports Sadate Munyakazi  yagiranye ikiganiro n’abakunzi b’umupira w’amaguru muri rusange ndetse n’abakunzi ba Rayon by’umwihariko.
Ni ikiganiro cyamaze isaha bamubaza ibibazo byerekeranye n’ubuzima bw’ikipe bakunda.
Kimwe mu bibazo byagarutsweho na benshi ni amasezerano ya Rayon Sports n’ikigo  Skol, bakabaza aho bigeze kugira ngo yongerwe.
Mu buryo buziguye, Sadate Munyakazi yaciye amarenga ko ibintu bitameze neza hagati ya Rayon Sports na Skol.
Yagize ati:  “Amasezerano ya Rayon Sports ari mu marembera. Mbona ameze nka bisi yacitse feri. Kuva natangira kuyobora iriya kipe nta faranga ryabo turabona. Duhora tuyishyuza.”
Yemeza ko amasezerano bafitanye n’uru ruganda abemerere kuba batandukana narwo.
Uwitwa Silva amubajije  iby’umushinga wa MK Card wagombaga gufasha Rayon Sports kwiyubaka, Munyakazi yagize ati : “Iby’umushinga wa MK Card bimeze nk’umwana wavutse agakikirwa agakambakamba, kandi mbona atangiye guhagarara n’ubwo ahagarara akagwa ariko ni rwo rugendo.”
Undi witwa Dodos amubajije iby’amakuru avuga ko hari abakinnyi barimo Kimenyi na kapiteni w’iyi kipe bashobora kwerekeza muri Yanga SC yo muri Tanzania, Sadate yamushubije ko Yanga idafite ubushozi bwo kugura umukinnyi muri Rayon Sports.
Ati: “Igikombe cya Shampiyona ntabwo turakivaho, abakinnyi bo kwerekeza muri Yanga ntabo kuko Rayon Sports ntabwo ari ikipe yo kugurisha abakinnyi muri Yanga Africa. Igikombe cy’amahoro cyo ni nyirantarengwa cyo rwose abagitekereza bakibagirwe. Tuzagitwara!”
Undi yamubajije amahirwe yo kugitwara, Sadate amusubiza ko kugeza ubu angana na 50%.
Yemeza ko hagomba gushyirwamo ingufu nyinshi kugira ngo bazagitware ariko akavuga ko kugitwara biri mu byihutirwa kandi by’ingenzi ku ikipe.
Ku byereyeke kumenya aho umushinga wo kubaka Stade ya Rayon Sports ugeze, yasubije ko ikibanza cyo kuyubakamo cyabonetse ariko yirinda kuvuga aho kiri.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Abafana ba Rayon bamaze kwitanga Miliyoni 1Frw, Sadate  ati “turashaka 20”
Body:
Abafana ba Rayon Sports bakusanyije amafaranga arenga miliyoni 1 Frw mu gikorwa cyatangajwe n’ubuyobozi bw’ikipe cyo gushyigikira iyi kipe mu gihe itari gukina.
Ejo hashize umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate yatanze ubutumwa busaba abakunzi b’iyi kipe kwitanga uko bifite kugira ngo ikipe yabo idasenywa n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyahagaritse ibikorwa byinshi bihuza abantu benshi birimo n’umupira w’amaguru.
Kuva hatangazwa iyi ntabaza ya Sadate, abafana b‘iyi kipe bamaze gutanga miliyoni 1 y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Mu butumwa yanyujije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Sadate yavuze  abakunzi ba Rayon Sports bamaze  gutanga arenga miliyoni 1 abasaba gukomeza gufasha iyi kipe.
Yagize ati “Nyuma y’uko ejo mbasabye gutera inkunga Équipe yanyu ariyo yacu, duhereye ku giceri cy’ijana ndagira ngo mbamenyeshe ko mwakoze igikorwa gikomeye kuko mwegeranyije amafaranga 1.045.752frw mwikomere amashyi kadi igikorwa kirakomeje turashaka kugera kuri 20 millions.”
Ubusanzwe Rayon Sports amafaranga yayo menshi ikoresha mu bikorwa byayo bya buri munsi iyakura mu bafana bayo bab abitanga ndetse n’abaza kuyishyigikira ku kibuga mu mikino iba yakiriye.
Kugeza ubu ntabwo bizwi igihe shampiyona izasubukurirwa, abantu bakaba bakomeje gukangurirwa kwirinda aho bishoboka bakaguma mu rugo, mu kurinda ikwirakwiza rya COVID-19.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Sadate yasabye abakunzi ba Rayon kwitanga ngo ikipe yabo idasenywa na Coronavirus
Body:
Perezida wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate yatanze ubutumwa busaba abakunzi b’iyi kipe kwitanga uko bifite kugira ngo ikipe yabo idasenywa n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyatumye Shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru iba ihagaze.
Mu butumwa yanyijije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Sadate yavuze ko muri ibi bihe ikipe ya Rayon Sports ikeneye imbaraga z’abakunzi bayo.
Yagize ati  “Équipe wihebeye iragukeneye burya Inshuti nyanshuti uyibona mu bihe bikomeye, Turwanye Coronavirus tunaharanira ko itadusenyera Équipe ni wowe ni njyewe bo gufasha Rayon kudasenywa na Cov 19…”
Uyu muyobozi wa Rayon Sports yakomeje asaba abakunzi bayo kwitanga uko bifite ku buryo n’ufite igiceri cya 100 Frw yatanga umusanzu we.
Ati “…utanga icyo ushoboye, kanda *610# hera ku giceri cy’i 100 uraba…”
Ikipe ya Rayon Sports itari guhirwa muri Shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru iherutse guhagarikwa kubera Coronavirus, biherutse gutangazwa ko ishobora gutandukana n’umufatanyabikorwa wayo w’imena Skol.
Ubusanzwe Rayon Sports amafaranga yayo menshi ikoresha mu bikorwa byayo bya buri munsi iyakura mu bafana bayo baba abitanga ndetse n’abaza kuyishyigikira ku kibuga mu mikino iba yakiriye ku buryo bishobora kuyigora muri ibi bihe Shampiyona yahagaze kandi abakinnyi n’abayobozi bayo bakaba bakomeje guhembwa.
Kuwa kabiri w’iki cyumweru kandi, Sadate na bwo yifashishije Twitter yari yavuze ko yumvise amakuru yatangajwe na bimwe mu bitangazamakuru byo mu Rwanda ko Rayon Sports imaze amezi ane idahemba abakinnyi bayo.
Uyu muyobozi wakunze kumvikana arengera ikipe ye cyane, yabeshyuje aya makuru, avuga ko nta mukinnyi n’umwe ibereyemo ikirarane.
Icyo gihe yagize ati “Wenda ntituzi imbere ariko aho tuva turahazi.”
Rayon Sports ifite igikombe cya shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru ya 2018-2019, yatangiye imikino ya shampiyona ya 2019-2020 iri mu zihatanira igikombe gusa bisa nk’ibiri kugenda bikomera kuko mukeba wayo APR FC iyirusha amanota atandatu ikaba ari na yo iyoboye urutonde rw’agateganyo n’amanota 57 mu gihe Rayon ifite 51.
Mu mukino iheruka gukinana na Gicumbi ya nyuma, Rayon Sports yanganyije n’iriya kipe y’akarere ka Gicumbi 1-1.
Sadate wanagarutse kuri uyu mukino, yavuze ku ifoto yacicikanye ku mbuga nkoranyambuga igaragaza bamwe mu bafana b’ikipe ya Rayon buriye ibiti ngo babashe kureba ikipe yabo kuko hari hamaze gusohoka amabwiriza abuza abantu kujya ku bibuga kureba imipira.
Yashimye ziriya nkoramutima z’ikipe yabo gusa avuga ko itababaniye kuko itatsinze, ndetse ko yabuze ibisobanuro atanga uretse kwisegura gusa.
Mu butumwa yatanze kuri uriya mukino, yasoje agira icyo asaba abakinnyi b’iyi kipe agira ati “Mwibuke ko Rayon Sports ari iy’abafana, ubwitange bwiyongere please [ndabinginze].”
Josiane UWANYIRIGIRA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Imikino ya nyuma ya CHAN2020 yahagaritswe
Body:
Impuzamashyirahamze y’Umupira w’Amaguru ku mugabane wa Africa, (CAF), yatangaje ko ihagaritse  irushanwa rya CHAN2020 ryari ritegerejwe muri Cameroon bitewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje kuyogoza isi muri iyi minsi. Ikipe y’u Rwanda Amavubi ifite tike yo gukina imikino ya nyuma iri mu itsinda B.
Imikino ya nyuma muri iri rushanwa yari iteganyijwe kuba mu ntangiriro z’ukwezi kwa Mata 2020 muri Cameroon.
Iki gihugu kiri mu bimaze kugaragaramo abarwaye COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus.
Ku wa kane tariki 12 Werurwe, CAF yohereje muri Cameroon inzobere mu by’ubuvuzi kugira ngo zirebe niba hari ingamba zihagije icyo gihugu cyafashe zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya coronavirus mu gihe haba hari gukinwa imikino ya CHAN 2020.
Inzobere zamenyesheje CAF ko irushanwa rigomba kwimurwa.
Mu itangazo CAF yashyize hanze ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki 17 Werurwe 2020, rivuga ko yasubitse imikino ya CHAN2020 igihe kitazwi, hashingiwe ku nama zatanzwe n’Umuryango mpuzamahanga wita ku buzima ‘WHO’ ku birebana na kiriya cyorezo.
Nubwo Cameroon yashyizeho ingamba zo guhashya icyorezo, gikomeje gukwirakwira hirya no hino muri Africa ngo nta gihe kizwi umuntu yavuga ko kizaba cyatanze agahenge.
Indi ngingo CAF yahereyeho isubika amarushanwa, ni uko kugeza ubu bitoroshye kugenderanira n’ibihugu muri Africa kuko za Guverinoma zashyizeho ingamba zikomeye zirimo no gufunga imipaka, hagamijwe gukumira icyorezo.
CAF ivuga ko yabaye inasubitse inama y’inteko rusange ya 42 yayo yari kuzabera muri Cameroon ku wa 24 Mata 2020, kugeza igihe hazatangirwa andi mabwiriza mashya.
Mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’iyi virus, abantu basabwa; gukaraba intoki neza, kwirinda kujya ahateraniye abantu benshi no kwirinda ingendo zitari ngombwa.
Itsinda rya mbere muri iyi mikino ya CHAN2020 rirmo Cameroon, Morocco, Libya na Zambia. Itsinda B ririmo D.R.Congo, Guinea, Mali n’u Rwanda. Itsinda C ririmo Uganda, Congo, Namibia na Burkina Faso. Itsinda D ririmo Zimbabwe, Niger, Togo na Tanzania.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Ku kibuga kitarimo abafana, Rayon Sports yanganyije na Gicumbi 1-1
Body:
Gicumbi FC yanganyije na Rayon Sports, umukino wabonetsemo amakarita abiri atukura. Ni umukino w’umunsi wa 24 wa Shampiyona, Rayon Sports yari yakiriye Gicumbi FC kuri Stade ya Kigali nta mufana n’umwe uhari.
Amabwiriza y’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA), avuga ko nta bafana bemerewe kureba imikino kuri za Stade nyuma y’uko mu Rwanda habonetse umurwayi wa mbere wa Coronavirus, icyorezo cyugarije isi muri rusange.
Ku isaha ya saa kenda umukino watangiye Rayon Sports ishaka igitego. Ku munota wa 26′ Michael Sarpong  yasigarenye n’umunyezamu ashatse gucenga umuzamu umupira uramusiga.
Sarpong yahise avunika asimburwa na  Nshimiyimana Amran.
Iminota 45′ yarangiye umusifuzi yongeraho iminota itatu, ku wa gatatu w’inyongera Gicumbi itsinda igitego ku mupira w’umuterekano watewe na Nzitonda Eric urabanza ukubita umutambiko w’izamu uhurirana na Kimenyi Yves umunyezamu wa Rayon Sports awusunikira mu izamu rye, biba Gicumbi 1-0 bwa Rayon.
Igice cya mbere cyarangiye Gicumbi FC iri imbere 1-0.
Mu gice cya kabiri ku munota wa 52′ Gasongo Jean Pierre wa Gicumbi FC yahawe ikarita y’umuhondo ya Kabiri nyuma yo gusunikana na Kimenyi Yves urindira Rayon wari ugiye gutanga umupira imbere.
Gasongo wari ufite iyindi karita yahise yerekwa ikarita y’umutuku ava mu kibuga.
Nyuma y’uko Gicumbi ibonye ikarita y’umutuku bakoze impinduka bakuramo abakinnyi batatu bashyiramo abandi, naho Rayon Sports Ishyira Rugwiro Herve ukina inyuma mu basatira izamu.
Rayon Sports yagerageje uburyo butatu bwashoboraga kuvamo igitego ariko umuzamu Mbarushimana Emile wa Gicumbi FC akitwara neza.
Ku munota wa 95′ Sugira Erinest yatsinze igitego cya Rayon Sports kitishimiwe n’abakinnyi ba Gicumbi FC bavuga ko yakoreye ikosa umunyezamu wabo mbere yo kugitsinda ariko kiremerwa.
Shabani wa Gicumbi yeretse ikarita y’umutuku nyuma yo guhirika umusifuzi.
Umukino warangiye Rayon Sports inganyije na Gicumbi FC 1-1.
 
Abakinnyi babanje mu kibuga
Gicumbi FC: Mbarushimana Emile, Nzitonda Eric, Muhumure Omar, Harerimana Fidel
Simwanza Emmanuel, Rwigema Yves, Ndacyayisenga Ally, Magumba Farouk, Shabani, Gasongo Jean Pierre, Bruno Alain Bati na Uwimana Emmanuel.
Rayon Sports: Kimenyi Yves, Rugwiro Herve, Ndizeye Samuel, Rutanga Eric, Iradukunda Eric Radu, Niyonzima Ally, Mugheni Kakue Fabrice, Mugisha Gilbert, Sarpong Micheal, Sugira Ernest na Sekamana Maxime.
Uko imikino yagenze kuri uyu wa Gatandatu:
HeroesFC 2-2 SunriseFC
Mukura 2-1 Bugesera FC
MusanzeFC 0-0 Gasogi United
Rayon Sports FC 1-1 Gicumbi FC

Jean Paul MUGABE

Title: Nta bafana bemerewe kujya ku bibuga kubera Coronavirus- FERWAFA
Body:
Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda, FERWAFA, rimaze gutangaza ko nta bafana bemerewe kujya ku bibuga biberaho imikino muri shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda. Iki kemezo gifashwe nyuma y’itangazo Minisiteri y’ubuzima yasohoye rivuga ko hari umuntu wa mbere wagaragaweho iki cyorezo mu Rwanda.
Itangazo hari aho rigira riti: “Turamenyesha abantu bose ko imikino yose mu marushanwa yose ategurwa na FERWAFA  igomba gukinwa nta bafana bari ku kibuga uhereye uyu munsi kugeza igihe hazatangirwa andi mabwiriza.”
FERWAFA ivuga ko iri bukomeze gukorana n’izindi nzego kugira ngo  ingamba zafashwe mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 rikumirwe mu Rwanda.
Uko amakipe yari buzahure muri izi mpera z’Icyumweru:
Taliki 14, Werurwe, 2020 hari imikino ikurikira:
HeroesFC Vs SunriseFC(3:00PM,BugeseraStadium)
MukuraVS Vs Bugesera FC(3:00PM, HuyeStadium)
MusanzeFC Vs Gasogi United(3:00PM, Ubworoherane Stadium,)
Rayon Sports FC Vs Gicumbi FC (3:00 PM, Kigali Stadium)
Ku Cyumweru taliki 15, Werurwe, 2020 hazakina:
Espoir FC vs APR FC(3:00PM, Rusizi Stadium)
SC Kiyovu vs AS Kigali(3:00PM, Mumena Stadium)
AS Muhanga vs Marines FC(3:00PM, Muhanga Stadium)
Police FC vs Etincelles FC (3:00 PM, Kigali Stadium)
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA

Title: Mikel Arteta utoza Arsenal bamusanzemo Coronavirus
Body:
Ubuyobozi bwa Arsenal buratangaza ko bwafunze ikibuga cy’imyitozo cy’iyi kipe n’imikino yari ifite nyuma y’uko umutoza wayo Mikel Arteta bamusanzemo ubwandu bwa COVID-19.
Ubuyobozi bwa Arsenal kandi buvuga ko ubu Mikel Arteta yashyizwe mu kato ndetse bikaza no gukorwa ku bantu bose baba barahuye na we barimo abagize itsinda ry’abatoza b’iyi kipe.
Umuyobozi mukuru wa Arsenal, Vinai Venkatesham yagize ati “Ubuzima bw’abantu bacu ndetse n’ubw’abandi muri rusange tubiha agaciro ndetse ubu ni ho twerekejeho umutima.”
Uyu muyobozi wa Arsenal avuga ko ubu batangiye ibiganiro n’abantu bizewe bashobora gusubiza mu murongo iki kibazo.
Ati “Turabizeza kugaruka mu myitozo no mu mikino mu gihe cya vuba.”
Umuyobozi w’abatoza b’iyi kipe, Raul Sanllehi avuga ko Mikel ndetse n’abandi bose bagize iriya kipe barimo abakozi n’abakinnyi bagiye kwitabwaho ariko ko uwo bashyizeho amaso cyane ari uriya mutoza.
Avuga ko bagiye gukorana n’Inzego za Leta zishinzwe ubuzima kugira ngo zite ku bakozi b’iyi kipe ndetse n’izishinzwe imikino mu Bwongereza kugira ngo basubike imikino yari iyi kipe yari ifite.
Mikel na we ubwe yagize icyo atangaza kuri iri sanganya yahuye na ryo, avuga ko yagiye kwisuzumisha nyuma yo kumva yacitse intege ariko ko yaciwe intege no gusanga arwaye iki cyorezo cyugarije Isi.
Yizeje abakunzi b’iyi kipe isanzwe inafitanye imikoranire n’u Rwanda ko azagaruka mu kazi mu gihe cya vuba.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Siporo rusange: Iby’ikivunge no guhurira kuri site byavuyeho
Body:
Mu rwego rwo gukumira icyorezo Coronavirus, ubuyobozi bw’Umujyi wa Kigali buratangaza impinduka muri Siporo rusange isanzwe iba kabiri mu kwezi. Buvuga ko nk’ibisanzwe imihanda isanzwe ifungwa kuri iriya minsi n’ubundi izajya ifungwa ariko abantu bakirinda gukorera mu kivunge.
Ubuyobozi bw’Umujyi wa Kigali buherutse gutanga ubu butumwa bw’umuburo, buvuga ko mu rwego rwo gukomeza gukumira icyorezo Coronavirus (COVID-19), Siporo rusange yahinduye isura.
Ubusanzwe abitabiraga iyi myitozo ngororamubiri imaze kuba umuco mu mujyi wa Kigali, bahuriraga kuri site zitandukanye nko ku biro bya RRA, IPRC-Kigali, kuri ULK no ku Kimisagara.
Ubuyobozi bw’Umujyi wa Kigali bwatangaje ko ibyo guhurira kuri izi site zari byavuyeho ariko ko nk’ibisanzwe imihanda izajya ifungwa ku minsi yagenewe iriya siporo.
Uyu munsi ubuyobozi bw’Umujyi wa Kigali bwibukije aya mabwiriza ko muri Siporo rusange izaba kuri iki cyumweru tariki ya 15 Werurwe nta by’ikivunge bizabaho ahubwo ko hagati y’umuntu n’undi hagomba kuba harimo nibura Metero imwe.
Ubuyobozi bw’umujyi wa Kigali kandi buherutse guhagarika ibirori rusange nk’ibitaramo byagombaga guhuriramo abahanzi bakomeye barimo Cecile Kayirebwa.
Ingamba zo gukumira iki cyorezo gikomeje kuyogoza Isi kinatwara ubuzima bwa benshi, Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yashyizeho amabwiriza atandukanye arimo kugira inama abaturage kutaramukanya baherezanya ibiganza cyangwa imisaya.
Ejo hashize kandi Minisiteri ya Siporo yaburiye amakipe y’u Rwanda kutazitabira imikino y’amarushanwa mpuzahamahanga.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: FERWAFA iraganira na MINISPORTS ku ngamba zafatirwa COVID-19
Body:
Ubuyobozi bw’Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA) n’ubwa Minisiteri ya Siporo (MINISPORTS) baragirana ibiganiro bigamije kunoza no gushyira mu bikorwa amabwiriza y’iyi Minisiteri ajyanye no gukumira icyorezo Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Ejo hashize Minisitero ya Siporo yashyize hanze itangazo rikubiyemo amabwiriza agira inama Federasiyo z’imikino itandukanye mu Rwanda kutazitabira amarushanwa ateganyijwe hanze y’u Rwanda.
Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda FERWAFA na ryo rirebwa n’ariya mabwiriza, biteganyijwe ko uyu munsi rihura na Minisiteri ya Siporo kugira ngo bayaganireho.
Imwe mu ngingo ziza kuganirwaho ni uguhagarika gahunda zose zo kwitabira imikino mpuzamahanga izakinirwa hanze y’u Rwanda mu rwego rwo kwirinda no gukumira icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze gukwira henshi ku isi.
U Rwanda rwagombaga kujya muri Cap Vert mu mukino w’amajonjora yo gushaka itike yo kujya muri CAN 2021 ndetse no mu gikombe cya Afurika cy’abakinnyi bakina imbere mu gihugu CHAN 2020 izabera muri Cameroon.
Muri ibi biganiro kandi barasuzuma niba Shampiyona y’u Rwanda yazajya ikinwa nta bafana bari ku kibuga mu rwego rwo gukumira iki cyorezo.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: MINISPORTS yaburiye amakipe kutitabira amarushanwa yo hanze
Body:
Minisiteri y’imikino mu Rwanda iraburira amakipe yose y’igihugu kutazitabira amarushanwa yari kuzitabira hanze y’igihugu mu rwego rwo kurinda abakinnyi n’abafana ko bakwandura coronavirus. 
Itangazo ryashyizwe hanze na Minisiteri ya Siporo, rivuga ko amarushanwa ari kubera mu Rwanda yo agomba gukomeza ariko ko abakinnyi n’abafana bagomba gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza agamije kurinda ko hari aho bahurira na coronavirus.
Iyi Minisiteri kandi isaba za Federasiyo z’imikino kwicara zigasuzuma niba imikino yari iteganyijwe kuzakinirwa mu Rwanda bikiri ngombwa ko ikinwa, zasanga bitari ngombwa ikaba yahagarikwa cyangwa amataliki yari bizabereho akimurwa.
Ririya tangazo rivuga ko abantu bose bajya ku kibuga kureba umukino runaka bagomba kujya basuzumwa bakinjira, bagakaraba intoki, ndetse bakubahiriza amabwiriza yose atangwa n’abaganga mu kwirinda kwandura kiriya cyorezo ubu kiri ku migabane yose y’isi.
Izi ngamba zigomba gushyirwa mu bikorwa kugeza hasohotse andi mabwiriza mashya.
Iyi Minisiteri itangaje ibi nyuma y’uko kuri uyu wa Gatatu taliki 11, Werurwe, 2020 Minisiteri y’uburezi nayo yasabye ibigo by’amashuri kutazongera guhuriza abana hamwe mu gitondo ngo bahabwe amabwiriza, ibyo bita ‘morning assemblies.’
Kiliziya gatulika nayo yasabye abayoboke bayo kutazongera guhana amahoro ya Kirisitu bahoberana cyangwa bahana ibiganza ahubwo bakajya barebana mu maso bakabyifurizanya.
ITANGAZO RYA MINISITERI YA SIPORO:
 

Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: APR FC yujuje imikino 23 itaratsindwa yatsinze Kiyovu SC 1-0
Body:
APR FC yatsinze Kiyovu yuzuza imikino 23 idatsinzwe. Umukino w’umunsi wa 23 muri Shampiyona y’ikiciro cya mbere wabereye kuri Stade ya Kigali, urangira APR FC itsinze Kiyovu SC 1-0.
I Rubavu Rayon Sports yatsinze Marines FC 1-0 cyabonetse ku munota wa 89 gitsinzwe na Niyonzima Ally winjiye mu kibuga asimbuye Nizeyimana Mirafa ku munota 74′.
Ku mukino wo kuri Stade ya Kigali APR FC ya mbere ku rutonde rw’agateganyo ikaba inahabwa amahirwe yo gutwa igikombe cya Shampiyona ni yo yari yakiriye Kiyovu SC yo iri ku mwanya wa gatanu.
APR F C yagiye gukina itaratsindwa umukino n’umwe muri 22 yari imaze gukina.
Ku isaha ya saa kenda umukino watangiye Kiyovu Sports ikina neza, mu minota 15′ abakipe yombi yabonye uburyo bumwe bugana mu izamu.
Ku munota wa 18′ APR FC yatsenze igitego cya Nshuti Innocent ku mupira yahawe na Mangwende.
Umunyezamu Nzeyurwanda Djihad ntiyamenya aho umupira unyuze.
Kiyovu yagerageje gushaka kwishyura ariko abakinnyi bo hagati ntibageze imipira imbere, igice cya mbere cyirangira APR iri imbere 1-0.
Mu gice cya kabiri Kiyovu Sports yagerageje n’ubundi gushaka igitego biranga umukino urangira APR FC ibonye amanota atatu.
Umukino urangiye Bukuru Christopher yahawe ikarita y’umutuku ndetse n’umutoza wungirije wa Kiyovu SC Mutarambirwa Djabil.
Abakinnyi 11 babanjemo kumpande zombi:
APR FC: Rwabugiri Omar, Manzi Thierry, Rwabuhihi Aime Placide, Imanishimwe Emmanuel, Mangwende, Omborenga Fitina, Buregeya Prince, Niyonzima Olivier Sefu, Manishimwe Djabel, Bukuru Christophe, Nshuti Innocent na Usengimana Danny.
Kiyovu SC: Nzeyurwanda Djihad, Serumogo Ali, Mutangana Derrick Mbogo Ali, Habamahoro Vincent, Twizeyimana Martin Fabrice, Nizeyimana Jean Claude, Saba Robert, Armel Gislain, Nsengiyumva Mustaf na Mbonyinabo Regis.
Uko imikino y’umunsi wa 23 wa Shampiyona yagenze:
APR FC 1-0 Kiyovu SC Espoir FC 1-1 Heroes FC Marines FC 0- 1 Rayon Sports Musanze FC 2-0 Gicumbi FC. Sunrise FC 1-1 Gasogi United
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Munyaneza ‘MBAPE’ uherutse gupfusha imfura ashima abo mu ikipe bahanganye bamusuye
Body:
Ikipe ya Skol Adrien Cyling Academy (SACA) yasuye Munyaneza Didier bakunda kwita Mbape ukinira Benediction Ignite uherutse gupfusha umwana w’imfura. Munyaneza yashimye umutima wa kivandimwe bagenzi be bo mu kipe bahangana bamweretse.
Umukinnyi w’amagare, Munyaneza Didier uherutse kubona igihembo mu irushanwa rya Tour du Rwanda, yapfushije imfura ye yari irwariye mu bitaro bya Kigali CHUK tariki ya 04 Werurwe 2020.
Kuri uyu wa mbere 09, Werurwe, 2020  nibwo  abakinnyi bo mu kipe yitwa SACA( ibamo abakinnyi bakomeye nka Moise Mugisha wabaye uwa kabiri muri Tour du Rwanda 2020) basuye mugenzi wabo baramwihanganisha.
Munyaneza Didier avuga ko yatunguwe no kubona abo mu ikipe bahanganye bamusuye ariko ngo byanamweretse ko abakora siporo yo kunyonga igare bifitemo umutima wa kimuntu kandi bagize umuryango mugari.
Ati: “Ni ibintu byantunguye bikomeza kunyereka ko ntari njyenyine. Kuba ikipe ifata umwanya ikava i Kigali ikaza i Rubavu  kunsura byanshimishije kandi byereka  n’abandi ko  mfite umuryango mugari.”
Didier Munyaneza ashima abamubaye hafi mu bihe avuga ko bitoroshye harimo abakinnyi bagenzi be ndetse n’ubuyobozi bwa FERWACY.
Uyu mukinnyi ari mu bitwaye neza muri Tour du Rwanda 2020 kuko yahembwe nk’umukinnyi warushije abandi guhatana.
Mu Ugushyingo 2019, Munyaneza Didier yegukanye Tour du Senegal 2019 yaberaga muri Senegal.
Uyu mukinnyi yapfushije  imfura ye nyuma gato y’uko akoze ubukwe.
Ubukwe bwe bwatashywe na bagenzi be bazwi mu mukino wo gutwara igare nka Areruya Joseph na Mugisha Samuel bombi batwaye Tour du Rwanda ikiri ku rwego 2.2.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: AS Kigali ni yo itahanye insinzi ku mukino ukomeye yakinnye na Police FC (2-0)
Body:
Umukino wa nyuma w’umunsi wa 22 wa Shampiyona y’u Rwanda, AS Kigali yatsinze Police 2-0, umukino wabereye kuri Stade ya Kigali.
As Kigali yatangiye isatira izamu rya Police ku munota wa 1′ babonye koronali bayiteye ntibabyiza umusaruro.
Iminota 30′ ya mbere amakipe yasatiranaga kureba mu izamu bikanga.
Ku munota wa 37′ Nsabimana Eric bita Zidane yafunguye amazamu AS Kigali itsinda igitego cya mbere nyuma y’ishoti rikomeye, umupira uruhukira mu nshundura.
Igice cya mbere cyarangiye AS Kigali iri imbere 1-0.
Mu  gice cya kabiri As Kigali yagarutse isatira ishaka gutsinda umukino ngo ibone amanota atatu.
Iminota 90′ yarangiye umusifuzi ashyiraho iminota y’inyongera ku munota wa 94′ AS Kigali ibona igitego cya kabiri cyatsinzwe na Kayitaba Jean Bosco wari wasimbuye Alexis Ortamal, umupira yawuhawe na Ndekwe Felix aroba umuzamu Gahungu umupira uruhukira mu nshundura.
Umukino warangiye AS kigali itsinzi Police FC 2-0 ibona amanota atatu y’umunsi wa 22 wa Shampiyona. Police FC yagumye ku mwanya wa gatatu n’amanota 43, naho As Kigali yakomeje umwanya wa 6 n’amanota 32.
 
Abakinnyi babanjemo ku mpanze zombi:
Police FC: Habarurema Gahungu, Nsabimana Aimable, Muvandimwe JMV, Musa Omar, Mucyo Aime Derrick, Ngendahimana Eric, Iyabivuze Osee, Munyakazi Yusufu Rule, Ndayishimiye Antoine Dominic, Mico Justin na Nshuti D. Savio.
AS Kigali: Ndayishimiye Eric Bakame, Ntamuhanga Tumain, Ishimwe Christian, Rusheshangoga Michel, Rurangwa Mossi, Bishira Latif, Nsabimana Eric Zidane, Kalisa Rachid, Allongomba, Rick Martel, Benedata Janvier, Olotomal Alex na Eric Nshimiyimana.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Sugira na Sarpong bafashije Rayon Sports gutsinda Musanze FC 2-1
Body:
Rayon Sports yatsinze Musanze FC 2-1, Sugira yatsinzemo igitego mu mukino wabereye kuri Stade ya Kigali.
Rutahizamu Michael Sarpong wari umaze igihe mu Bushinwa nyuma yo kugaruka kubera Coronavirus yahagaritse ibikirwa byose by’imikino hariya, uyu munsi yakiniye Rayon Sports.
Umukino watangiye saa kenda (15:00′), i Nyamirambo ahari abafana benshi baje kureba uyu mukino.
Ku munota wa 5′ Rayon Sports yafunguye amazamu igitego cya mbere cya Sugira Erineste nyuma y’umupira yahawe na Michael Sarpong.
Umunyezamu Ndoli Jean Claude ntiyamenya aho umupira unyuze.
Ku munota wa 30′ Musanze FC yishyuye igitego ku mupira wahushijwe na Kimenyi Yves utumvikanye na ba myugariro be, Twizerimana Onesme awushyira mu izamu.
Igice cya mbere cyarangiye amakipe yombi anganyije 1-1,
Mu gice cya kabiri Rayon Sports yagarutse isatira izamu rya Musanze ishaka amanota atatu.
Ku munota wa 50′ Rayon Sports yabonye Penaliti nyuma y’ikosa ryakorewe Nshimiyimana Amran mu rubuga rw’amahina na Nyandwi Saddam.
Michael Sarpong ni we wateye penaliti neza atsindira Rayon Sports igitego cya kabiri.
Musanze yakomeje gusatira ishaka igitego cyo kwishyura nibura ngo ibone inota rimwe biranga.
Umukino warangiye Rayon Sports ibonye amanota y’umunsi wa 22 wa Shampiyona, itsinze Musanze FC 2-1.
 
Abakinnyi 11 babanjemo ku mpande zombi:
Rayon Sports: Kimenyi Yves, Iradukunda Eric Radu, Rutanga Eric (c), Kayumba Soter , Rugwiro Herve, Amran Nshimiyimana, Niyonzima Ally, Ciza Hussein, Sekamana Maxime, Michael Sarpong na Sugira Ernest.
Musanze FC: Ndoli, Sova Ally 10 (C) Dushimumugenzi 24, Mugenzi Cedric 22, Okwechuku 13, Twizerimana Onesme 9,Maombi Jen Pierre 5, Nshimiyimana Clement 12,Tresor Muhoza 19,Nyandwi Saddam 16 na Mwiseneza Daniel 4.
     
Amafoto @KUBWAYO Adrien/UMUSEKE
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: APR FC yasanze Mukura VS i Huye iyitsinda ibitego 4-0
Body:
Umukino wabereye kuri Stade ya Huye, APR FC yatsinze Mukura VS ibitego 4-0, Kiyovu SC na yo inyagira Heroes FC 5-0 Rayon Sports itsinda Musanze FC 2-1.
Ni imikino y’umunsi wa 22 ya Shampiyona yakomeje. I Huye, Mukura yari yakiriye APR FC imbere y’abakunzi benshi b’aya makipe baje kuyashyagikira, Stade mpuzamahanga ya Huye yendaga kuzura.
Saa kenda (15:00′) umukino watangiye APR FC isatira izamu rya Mukura, iminota 15′ ya mbere yagerageje uburyo butatu mu izamu ariko ntibwavamo igitego.
Ku  munota wa 15′ APR FC yatsinze igitego cya mbere cya Nshuti Innocent ku mupira watewe na Byiringiro Lague umuzamu awukuraho awukubise ibipfunsi uhura na Nshuti Innocent ahagaze mu rubuga rw’amahina awusubiza mu izamu.
APR FC na Mukura VS zakomeje gusatirana, ariko igice cya mbere cyirangiye APR FC iri imbere n’igitego 1-0.
Mu gice cya kabiri APR yagarutse isatira Mukura VS, itsinda igitego cya kabiri ku munota wa 49′ cya Byiringiro Lague ku makosa y’umuzamu Iratugeneye Edouard wasohotse nabi, Lague ahita awushyirishamo umutwe.
Ibintu byaje kuba bibi kuri Mukura VS ubwo ku munota wa 60′ Kapiteni Ramadhan Niyonkuru yahawe ikarita y’umutuku amaze gukorera ikosa Anicet.
Umusifuzi yamuhaye ikarita y’umuhondo agerageza kumuburanya amwereka umutuku.
Ku munota wa 74′ APR FC yongeye kubona izamu igitego cya gatatu cyatsinzwe na Ishimwe Kevin ku ishoti rikomeye yateye umuzamu, umupira uruhukira mu nshundura.
Ku munota wa 91′ Omborenga Fitina yatsinze igitego cya kane ku mupira yari ahawe na Ishimwe Kevin. Umukino urangira APR FC inyagiye Mukura 4-0.
 
Abakinnyi 11 babanjemo ku mpande zombi:
APR FC: Rwabugiri Omar, Manzi Thierry, Imanishimwe emmanuel Mangwende, Omborenga Fitina, Buregya Prince, Niyonzima Oliver Sefu, Bukuru Christophe, Manishimwe, Djabel, Byiringiro Lague, Nshuti Innocent na Ishimwe Kevin.
Mukura: Iratugeneye Eduard, Manzi Aimable, Uwihoreye Jean Paul , Hassan Rugirayabo, Janvier Mutijima, Birababoneye Adolphe, Ramadhan Niyonkuru, Hakim Mutabazi, Ntwali Evode, Muniru Abdul na Iradukunda Bertrand.

Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Imikino yo kwizihiza umunsi w’umugore RP-IPRC Huye yanyagiye UR Huye 100-26
Body:
Iri rushanwa ryo kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga w’umugore mu mukino wa Basketball RP-IPRC Huye yatsinze ibitego byinshi ikipe ya Kaminuza y’u Rwanda ishami rya Huye. Yaritsinze ku  manota 100-26.
Buri mwaka mu Rwanda hategurwa irushanwa ngarukamwaka ryo kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe umugore ku isi uba tariki ya 08 Werurwe.
Umukino w’abagore wabanjirije uriya wahuje Ubumwe WBBC na APR WBBC, APR ibona itsinzi n’amanota 62-59.
Nyuma hakurikiyeho uriya wahuje  RP-IPRC Huye na  UR Huye urangira iyi kipe ya Kaminuza y’u Rwanda itsindiwe ku manota menshi.
Uko imikino y’umunsi wa mbere yagenze:
FT: RP IPRC-HUYE 100-26 UR HUYE
FT: APR 59-62 UBUMWE
Uko imikino yo ku munsi wa kabiri iteganyijwe:
 
9h:00: RSSB Vs Women Vet NT Veterans /AMAHORO.

Jean Paul MUGABE 
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Coronavirus yageze muri Cameroon ahateganyijwe imikino ya CHAN n’Amavubi azakina
Body:
Coronavirus yageze mu gihugu cya Cameroon kizaberamo imikino ya nyuma ya CHAN 2020 n’ikipe y’Igihugu Amavubi izitabira, Itangazo rya Minisiteri ya Siporo mu Rwanda mu bijyanye no gukumira iriya ndwara, rivuga ko abakinnyi bakwirinda kujya mu bihugu birimo iriya ndwara.
Kuva tariki ya 04 Mata 2020, muri Cameroon hateganyijwe imikino y’igikombe cya Africa cy’abakina imbere mu gihugu, CHAN.
Kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki ya 06 Werurwe Minisitiri w’Ubuzima muri Cameroon yasohoye itangazo rivuga ko Coronavirus yamaze kugera mu gihugu.
Ni umugabo w’Umufaransa w’imyaka 58 wayizanye avuye iwabo.
Ibi byagiye hanze nyuma y’itangazo rya Minisiteri ya Siporo rikubiyemo uburyo bwo kurwanya Coronavirus mu bikorwa bya Siporo.
Muri iri tangazo Minisiteri ya Siporo ivuga ko amakipe cyangwa Abakinnyi batazitabira imikino mu bihugu birimo Coronavirus.
Amavubi ashobora kutitabira imikino ya CHAN2020 izabera muri Cameroon, igihugu cyagarahayemo Cronavirus?.
Coronavirus imaze kugira ingaruka ku bikorwa byinshi bya Siporo mu bihugu bitandukanye, mu Butalitane amakipe yatangiye gukina nta bafana bari ku bibuga imikino imwe irasubikwa.
Mu Bwongereza bamaze gukuraho gusuhuzanya ku bakinnyi byakorwaga mbere y’umukino, mu Buyapani imikino mpuzamahanga ya Olympic yari iteganyijwe yamaze kwimurwa, naho mu Bushinwa aho icyorezo cyatangiriye ibikorwa byose bya Siporo bihuza abantu benshi byamaze guhagarikwa.

Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Gasogi United iraye ku mwanya wa 7 nyuma yo gutsinda Espoir FC 1-0
Body:
Gasogi United itsinze Espoir FC 1-0, ikipe y’i Rusizi ikomeje kugana ahabi nyuma y’umukino wabereye kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo.
Ni umukino ubanziriza indi yo ku munsi wa 22 ya Shampiyona y’u Rwanda, Gasogi United yakiriye Espoir FC, ku kibuga abafana babarirwaga ku mitwe y’intoki.
Gasogi United yatangiye isatari izamu rya Espoir FC mu minota 15′ ya mbere yabonye uburyo butatu bufunguye ariko ba rutahizamu ntibabubyaza umusaruro.
Ku munota wa 36 myugariro wa Gasogi United yakoze umupira n’akabobo umusifuzi avuga ko nta penaliti ihari, ikemezo ke nticyakiriwe neza n’abakinnyi, umutoza kimwe n’abafana ba Espoir FC.
Igice cya mbere cyarangiye ari 0-0.
Mu gice cya kabiri Espoir FC yagarutse ikina neza irusha Gasogi United guhererekanya umupira ariko uburyo babonye ntibuvemo igitego.
Ku munota wa 78′ Gasogi United yatsinze igitego cya Kikoyu Hassan kuri Penaliti, ku ikosa Uwineza Jean Dier yamukoreye mu rubuga rw’amahina.
Umukino warangiye Gasogi United ibonye amanota atatu nyuma yo gutsinda Espoir 1-0. Gasogi United ifashe umwanya wa 7 n’amanota 28 inyuma ya As Kigali ifite amanota 29.
Espoir FC igumye ku mwanya wa 14 n’amanota 16 mu gihe Gicumbi na Heroes zatsinda zahita ziyicaho kuko buri imwe ifite amanota 15.
 
Abakinnyi 11 babanjemo ku mpande zombi:
Gasogi United: Kwizera Olivier (30), Kaneza Augustin (9), Ndabarasa Tresor (4), Nkubana Marc (2), Kazindu Guy (6), Kikoyu Hassan (12), Dusabe Claude (3), Herron Scarla (5), Byumvuhore Tresor (20), Habimana Yves (10), Ndikumana Tresor (8)
Umutoza Guy Bukasa.
Espoir FC: Bihoyiki Hassan (1), Kyambade Fred (4), Uwineza Jean de Dieu (15), Buregeya Rodrigue (3), Nshimiyimana Elyse (14), Wilondja Jacques (5), Kayiranga Moussa (6), Uzayisenga Maurice (8), Nkunzimana Sadi (9), Niyitanga Yussuf (10) na Musasizi Jonh (13).
 
Ku wa Gatandatu taliki ya 07 Werurwe 2020
Heroes FC vs Kiyovu SC (Bugesera Stadium, 3:00 PM)
Gicumbi FC vs Sunrise FC (Gicumbi Stadium, 3:00 PM)
Mukura VS&L vs APR FC (Huye Stadium, 3:00 PM)

AS Muhanga vs Bugesera FC (Muhanga Stadium, 3:00 PM)
