Ku Cyumweru Werurwe Tariki ya 8, 2020
Police FC vs AS Kigali (Kigali Stadium, 3:00 PM)
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Police FC irashaka ubutabera yandikiye FERWAFA imenyesha akarengane
Body:
Ubuyobozi bw’ikipe ya Police FC bwandikiye Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA) burisaba kurenganurwa ku karengane bavuga ko iriya kipe yakorewe ubwo yatsindwa na APR FC 1-0. Iriya ntsinzi ya APR FC yabonetse mu mikino y’umunsi wa 21 wa shampiyona yabaye  tariki ya 04 Werurwe ubwo Police FC yari yasuye APR FC ikayitsinda.
Ubuyobozi bwa Police FC butishimiye imisifurire y’uriya mukino, bwandikiye FERWAFA buyisaba kubarenganura.
Iriya baruwa yashyizweho umukono n’umuyobozi wa Police FC, CIP Maurice Karangwa ivuga ko hari amakosa menshi yakozwe n’umusifuzi Abdul Twagiramukiza wahinduwe ku munota wa nyuma, aho abakinnyi batandukanye bagiye bakora amakosa bakihanangirwa inshuro zirenga enye.
Muri iyi baruwa Police FC, irasaba ko habaho gusuzumana ubushishozi ikosa ryakozwe n’uyu musifuzi (Twagirumukiza) akaba yanafatirwa ibihano kuko bavuga ko imisifurire babonye ntaho yageza ruhago y’u Rwanda mu gihe ababishinzwe batagize icyo bakora.
Ibi kandi byagarutsweho n’umunyamabanga wa Leta muri ministeri y’ububanyi n’amahanga Amb Nduhungirehe, abicishije kuri Twitter yagize ati: “Abasifuzi bamaze imyaka myinshi bica umupira w’amaguru wacu twese tubireba.”
Imisifurire ikomeje kuba ikibazo kuko ku munsi wa 21 wa shampiyona amakipe abiri amaze kwandikira Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda FERWAFA arisaba guhafatira ibihano abasifuzi, aho tariki ya 03 Werurwe 2020, Espoir FC yandikiye FERWAFA iyisaba gufatira umusifuzi wasifuye umukino wayihuje na Gicumbi FC ibihano.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Shabani watozaga As Kigali y’abagore bamusezereye bamwifuriza amahirwe
Body:
AS Kigali WFC yandikiye Mbarushimana Shabani wari umutoza wayo imumenyesha ko amasezerano yarangiye kandi batazayongera bamwifuriza amahirwe masa.
Ibaruwa yashyizweho umukono n’umuyozi wa AS Kigali WFC, Gacinya Teddy imenyesha Shabani ko amasezerano ye y’akazi yarangiye tariki ya 02 Werurwe 2020 kandi ko atazongerwa, bamwifuriza amahirwe masa mu kandi kazi yabona.
Ati “Ubuyobozi bwa AS Kigali WFC bukwandikiye iyi baruwa bukumenyesha ko amasezerano yawe yarangiye tariki ya 02 Werurwe 2020 kandi ko atari bwongerwe.”
Shabani asezerewe na AS Kigali nyuma yo kudatwara igikombe cya shampiyona cy’umwaka ushize cyatwawe na Scandinavia WFC, mu gihe muri uyu mwaka wa 2020 nabwo batakaje igikombe cy’Intwari, nabwo batsinzwe na Scandinavia WFC ku mukino wa nyuma.
Mbarushimana Shabani yaje muri AS Kigali WFC asimbuye Nyinawumuntu Grace nyuma y’ibibazo byari byavuzwe kuri Grace ubuyobozi bufata icyemezo cyo kumusimbuza Shabani wabaga muri AS Kigali FC (y’abagabo), cyane ko yanayikiniye.
Shabani yatwaye ibikombe bine mu myaka itatu yari ahamaze, harimo ibikombe bibiri bya shampiyona, hakabamo igikombe kimwe cy’Amahoro ndetse n’igikombe kimwe cy’Intwari uyu mutoza yatwaye umwaka ushize.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Munyaneza Didier wahembwe muri TdRwanda yapfushije imfura ye
Body:
Umukinnyi w’amagare, Munyaneza Didier uherutse kubona igihembo mu irushanwa rya Tour du Rwanda, yapfushije imfura ye yari irwariye mu bitaro bya Kigali CHUK.
Uyu mukinnyi wa Dimension Ignite, yitwaye neza mu irushanwa ry’amagare rikomeye rya Tour du Rwanda kuko yanahembwe nk’umukinnyi warushije abandi guhatana.
Ubwo iri rushanwa ryasozwaga amaze no guhabwa kiriya gihembo, Munyaneza Didier yabwiye Ikigo k’Igihugu k’Itangazamakuru RBA ko yaje gukina imfura ye irembeye muri CHUK ariko ko yiyemeje kuza muri ririya rushanwa kubera urukundo afitiye igihugu.
Ishyirahamwe ry’Umukino w’Amagare mu Rwanda, FERWACY  ryihanganirishije uyu mukinnyi kuri ibi byago byo kubura umwa we wa mbere.
Mu butumwa bwanyujijwe kuri twitter, FERWACY yamenyesheje abaturarwanda n’abakunzi b’umukino w’amagare ko Munyaneza yapfushije umwana we.
FERWACY Iti “Dukomeze gufata mu mugongo uyu muryango.”
Mu kwezi k’Ugushyingo 2019, Munyaneza Didier yegukanye Tour du Senegal 2019 yaberaga muri Senegal.
Uyu mukinnyi upfushijije imfura ye, yari yakoze ubukwe mu mpera za 2019 mu bukwe yambariwemo n’abakinnyi bakomeye mu mukino w’amagare mu Rwanda barimo Areruya Joseph na Mugisha Samuel bombi batwaye Tour du Rwanda ikiri kuri 2.2.
Buriya bukwe kandi bwanatashywe na Perezida w’Ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wo gusiganwa ku magare, Murenzi Abdallah.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Sugira afashije Rayon kubona amanota 3…Yatsinze 2-1 Etincelles
Body:
Rutahizamu Sugira Ernest yafashije Rayon Sports kubona amanota atatu itsinda Etincelles 2-1 ku gitego yatsinze mu minota ya nyuma.
Etincelles FC yari yakiriye Rayon Sports kuri Stade Umuganda i Rubavu saa 15:00’. Rayon Sports yashakaga gutsinda uyu mukino kugira ngo ikomeza kwegera APR FC ya mbere iyirusha amanota 7.
Etincelles FC yatangiye umukino isatira cyane ariko Rayon Sports igashaka kuyinyura muri humye ishaka igitego hakiri kare.
Uku gusatira byaje guha Etincelles FC igitego cya mbere ku munota wa 15’ gitsinzwe na Itangishaka Ibrahim.
Nyuma y’iki gitego umutoza Cassa Mbungo Andre yakoze impinduka havamo Nizeyimana Mirafa hinjiramo Bizimana Yannick.
Uyu musore na we ntiyasoje igice cya mbere kuko yaje kuvunika ahita asimburwa na Mugisha Gilbert. Igice cya mbere cyarangiye nta zindi mpinduka zibaye.
Rayon Sports yatangiye igice cya kabiri isatira cyane, icurika ikibuga ndetse igenda ibona amahirwe ariko kuyabyaza umusaruro bibanza kwanga.
Ku munota wa 72’ Sekamana Maxime yabonyeye  Rayon Sports igitego cyo kwishyura ku ishoti rikomeye yatereye inyuma y’urubuga rw’amahina ku mupira yari ahawe na Mugisha Gilbert.
Sugira Ernest wari wagoye ubwugarizi bwa Etincelles, yaboneye Rayon Sports igitego cya kabiri ku mupira yari ahawe na Sekamana Maxime. Umukino warangiye ari 2-1.
Mu mikino yabaye ku munsi w’ejo, Mukura VS yatsinze Heroes FC 1-0 cya Iradukunda Betrand ku munota wa 37. AS Kigali yatsinze AS Muhanga 1-0 cya Ishimwe Christian ku munota wa 70, ni mu gihe Gicumbi FC yatsindiye Espoir FC i Rusizi.
Imikino yabaye uyu munsi, APR FC 1-0 Police FC, Etincelles 1-2 Rayon Sports, Sunrise FC 1-2 Musanze FC, Bugesera FC 0-1 Marines.
Nyuma y’umunsi wa 21, APR FC iyoboye urutonde n’amanota 51, Rayon Sports 44, Police FC 43, Mukura VS 37 mu gihe Kiyovu Sports ifite 32.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: APR yatsinze Police 1-0 Ikomeza kuyobora Shampiyona
Body:
Mu mikino y’umunsi wa 21 wa Shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda (Rwanda Premier League) APR FC yatsinze Police FC 1-0, ikomeza kuyobora urutonde rwa shampiyona.
Muri uyu mukino wabereye kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo, APR FC yabonye iki gitego ku munota wa 16’ kiba ari na cyo rukumbi kibonetse muri uyu mukino wahuzaga amakipe y’inzego z’Umutekano zikomeye mu Rwanda.
Iki gitego cyatsinzwe na Danny Usengimana nyuma y’umupira yari ahawe na Niyomugabo Claude, Danny atsinda igitego ntiyakishimira kubera guha icyubahiro Police FC yahoze akinira.
Ku munota wa 20′ Nshutiti Dominique Savio yahinduye umupira neza mu rubuga rw’amahina, abarebaga umupira bavuga ko Buregeye Price yakoze n’intoki ariko Umusifuzi avuga ko nta kosa ryabaye. Icyemezo kitishimiwe n’Abakinnyi, abafana ndetse n’umutoza wa Police Rwabugiri.
Mu gice cya kabiri Police yakoze impinduka Kubwimana Cedric asimburwa na Bigirimana Issa, Ngendahimana Eric asimburwa na Ntirushwa Aime ku ruhande rwa APR Bukuru Christopher yasimbuwe na Andrew Butera.
Muri iki gice cya kabiri amakipe yombi yasatarinaga umukino urangira APR FC ibonye amanota atatu ku nsinzi 1-0.
Imyaka ibaye umunani, Police FC itabasha gutsinda APR FC kuko no mu mukino ubanza w’iyi shampiyona zari zanganyije 0-0.
 
Abakinnyi 11 babanjemo ku mpande zombi:
APR FC: Rwabugiri Umar, Buregeya Prince, Imanishimwe Emmanuel, Manzi Thierry (c),Rwabuhihi Placide, Niyonzima Olivier Sefu, Bukuru Christophe, Manishimwe Djabel, Byiringiro Lague, Usengimana Danny na Niyomugabo Claude.
 
Plice FC: Habarurema Gahungu, Nsabimana Aimable, Moussa Omar, Mpozembizi Mohamed Munyakazi Lule, Nshuti Dominique Savio, Kubwimana Cedric, Iyabivuze Osee,Ngendahimana Eric, Ndayishimiye Celestin na Mico Justin.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Espoir ngo Gicumbi FC yabatsinze kubera amakosa y’abasifuzi none bandikiye FERWAFA
Body:
Ubuyobozi bw’ikipe ya Espoir FC bwandikiye Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA) burisaba kurenganurwa  ku karengane bavuga ko iriya kipe yakorewe ubwo ejo hashize yakinaga na Gicumbi FC ikayitsinda 1-0.
Iriya nsinzi ya Gicumbi FC yabonetse mu mikino y’umunsi wa 21 wa shampiyona yabaye ejo tariki ya 03 Werurwe ubwo Gicumbi FC yari yasuye Espoir FC ikayitsindira iwabo.
Ubuyobozi bwa Espori butishimiye imisifurire y’uriya mukino, bwandikiye FERWAFA buyisaba kubarenganura.
Iriya baruwa yashyizweho umukono n’umuyobozi wa Espoir, Kamuzinzi Godefroid ivuga ko batabaza kugira ngo FERWAFA ibarenganure ku byabaye muri uyu mukino.
Iriya baruwa ikubiyemo ingingo enye ngo zigaragaza akarengane kakorewe iriya Kipe y’i Rusizi mu Burengerazuba bw’u Rwanda.
Espoir FC ivuga ko abasifuzi bo ku ruhande batagiye bahuza n’uwo hagati ku byemezo bafashe.
Icya kabiri ngo ni uko penaliti zatanzwe mu buryo butabanyuze, kureka umukino ugakomeza mu gihe umusifuzi yabaga ari guhana abakoze amakosa ndetse no kudaha agaciro iminota yabaga yagiye mu guhana no guhanura abakinnyi.
Ubuyobozi  bwa Espoir buvuga ko ibyo byose byabaviriyemo kubura amanota atatu kandi yari ingenzi cyane kuri bo, basaba ubuyobizi bwa FERWAFA ko bwabarenganura ndetse hagahanwa uwabigizemo uruhare wese.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Djorkaeff yagiriye inama abana b’Abanyarwanda bashaka kuba ibyamamare muri Football
Body:
Umufaransa Youri Djorkaeff wamenyekanye mu mupira  w’amaguru mu makipe akomeye ku mu gabane w’i Burayi arimo Paris Saint-Germain, yasangije ubuzima bwe abana b’abanyarwanda anabagira inama zabafasha gukabya inzozi zabo mu mukino wa Football.
Iki kiganiro cyabaye ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki ya 03 Werurwe 2020, Youri Djorkaeff umaze iminsi ine mu Rwanda muri gahunda ya Visit Rwanda ku bufatante bw’u Rwanda na Paris Saint-Germain Youri, yaganirije abana b’u Rwanda abaha impanururo.
Youri Djorkaeff yavuze ko yakuze se umubyara akinira Paris Saint-Germain, akamujyana ku kibuga kuva afite imyaka itandatu bituma na we atangira gukunda iyi kipe.
Yasabye abana b’Abanyarwanda kugira umuhate mu byo bakora no kumvira ababyeyi babo kuko ari byo bizabafasha kugera ku byo bifuza.
Ati “Mbona ko mukiri bato kandi ndakeka ko icy’ingenzi cyakabashishikaje atari njye, ahubwo iyi kipe iri hano, Paris Sanit-Germain.”
Yakomeje agira inama aba bajyambere ko batagomba gucika intege.
Ati “Iyo ufite inzozi n’umuhate wo gukora ikintu nubwo hari abakubwira ko bidashoboka, wowe jya wumva ko bishoboka. Niba wizeye ko bishoboka nta muntu wakakubwiye ko bitakunda. Icy’ingenzi ni ukwigirira icyizere, kubaha no kumvira ababyeyi, abatoza cyangwa abarimu kuko baba bakwifuriza icyiza.”
Iki cyamamare muri ruhago mpuzamahanga, yanatembereye u Rwanda mu bice nyaburanga by’iki gihugu birimo Ibirunga areba ingagi zaho.
Ngo yishimiye u Rwanda n’abanyarwanda muri rusange kuko batanga ikizere cyo gukomeza guteza imbere igihugu cyabo.
Ati “Nishimiye kubona Abanyarwanda kandi nasanze abenshi ari urubyiruko.”
Youri Raffi Djorkaeff ufite imyaka 51 y’amavuko, yakiniye ikipe y’igihugu y’Ubufaransa atwarana na yo ibikombe bitatu bikomeye birimo igikombe cy’Isi mu 1998, igikombe cy’Uburayi mu 2000 ndetse na, FIFA Confederations Cup mu 2001.
Yakiniye kandi amakipe arimo Grenoble, Strasbourg, Monaco, Inter Milan, Kaiserslauten, Bolton Wanderers, Blackburn Rovers na New York Red Bulls.

Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Gasogi yasuye Kiyovu iyitsindira ku Mumena 1-0
Body:
Shampiyona y’ikiciro cya mbere mu Rwanda yakomeje hakinwa imikino y’umunsi wa 21, Gasogi United yari yasuye Kiyovu Sports ndetse iyitsindira kuri Stade Mumena 1-0.
Uyu mukino wabanjirijwe n’amagambo yo ku mpande zombi zirahirira kwegukana amanota atatu, wari utegerejwe na benshi.
Igice cya mbere cy’umukino cyarangiye nta kipe ibashije kureba mu izamu ry’indi n’ubwo yagiye abona amahirwe bananiwe kubyaza umusaruro.
Uyu mukino waranzwe n’imvura nyinshi yaguye hirya no hino mu mugi wa Kigali no kuri sitade ya Mumena.
Mu gice cya kabiri byabanje kugorana ndetse benshi bakeka ko umukino ugiye kurangira ari 0-0, gusa ku munota wa 88, Kaneza Augustin yatsindiye Gasogi United igitego kuri coup-Franc, umukino urangira ari 1-0.
Mu yindi mikino, Mukura VS yatsinze Heroes FC 1-0 igitego cyatsinzwe na Iradukunda Betrand ku munota wa 37″, AS Kigali yatsinze AS Muhanga 1-0 igitego cyatsinzwe na Ishimwe Christian ku munota wa 70″, naho Gicumbi FC yatsindiye Espoir FC i Rusizi.
Indi mikino ya shampiyona izakomeza ejo, APR FC yakira Police FC, Etincelles na Rayon Sports, Sunrise FC yakire Musanze FC naho Bugesera FC izakira Marine.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Sadate mu magambo aryohereye ku isabukuru y’umugore we, Bamporiki yungamo n’Ikinyarwanda gihanitse
Body:
Perezida wa Rayon Sports, Sadate Munyakazi yateye imitoma umugore we amwifuriza kugira isabukuru nziza, Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Edouard Bamporiki na we abifuriza ibyiza mu magambo y’Ikinyarwanda gihanitse.
Abinyujije kuri Twitter ye, Sadate Munyakazi yagaragaje ko umugore we uyu munsi yagize isabukuru y’amavuko, amushimira akoresheje imvugo yuje amagambo aryohereye.
Mu butumwa buherekejwe n’amafoto ane, agaragaza Sadate ubwe n’umugore we bari mu bihe byiza binyuranye, yavuze ko uyu munsi w’isabukuru ye usobanuye byinshi ku buzima bwa bombi we n’umufasha we.
Yagize ati “Umunsi w’amavuko yawe niwo munsi w’Ingabire zanjye, wambereye Umugisha kuva mu Bwana bwacu reka mvuge nti warakoze, urabizi neza ko Ari ukugera ku ndunduro mugore mwiza  Mama w’abana banjye, ni wowe nkesha ibyishimo warakoze. Joyeux anniversaire ma très chère épouse byishimooooo.”
Mu batanze ibitekerezo kuri ubu butumwa basanzwe bakoresha uru rubuga nkoranyambaga rwa Twitter, harimo n’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Hon Edouard Bamporiki.
Uyu muyobozi usanzwe akoresha amagambo y’Ikinyarwanda kiri hafi y’inshoberamahanga, yifurije ibyiza uyu muryango wa Sadate n’umugore we.
Hon Bamporiki yagize ati “Iyaduhanze nibahunde kurambana, mubyarire u Rwanda abakogoto bazarurasanira ngo rwande n’ejo. Indunduro y’urukunda ni Nkunda na nyuma yejo. Nimwishyuke.”
Mu bandi batanze ibitekerezo, barimo abagarutse kuri ariya magambo asize umunyu, Sadare yabwiye umufasha we, nk’uwitwa Tuyizere Eugene wagize ati “Kabisa imitoma iraha! Anyway, happy birth day to HER!!”
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Djorkaeff wakiniye PSG ari mu Rwanda yakoze imyitozo kuri Stade Amahoro n’abana
Body:
Umufaransa Youri Djorkaeff wamenyekanye mu mupira  w’amaguru mu makipe akomeye ku mu gabane w’i Burayi arimo Paris Saint-Germain, ari mu Rwanda ejo hashize akaba yakoranye imyitozo n’abana kuri Stade Amahoro.
Djorkaeff wabaye igihangange mu mupira w’amaguru kuko yatwaranye igikombe cy’Isi n’ikipe y’igihugu y’Ubufaransa mu 1998, ubu ni inshuro ya kabiri aje mu Rwanda kuko n’umwaka ushize yari yaje.
Uruzinduko rwa Youri Djorkaeff mu Rwanda ruri muri gahunda y’ubufatanye iki gihugu giherutse kugirana n’ikipe ya PSG yo mu cyiciro cya mbere mu Bufaransa bugamije guhamagarira Isi gusura u Rwanda mu bukangurambaga buzwi nka Visit Rwanda.
Muri ubu bufatanye kandi, abakiniye iyi kipe ndetse n’abayikinira ubu bazajya basura u Rwanda kenshi.
Bimwe mu byari bigize uruzinduko rwa Djorkaeff rw’iminsi ine mu Rwanda, harimo guhura n’abakinnyi bakiri bato bari mu mujyi wa Kigali, akanaganira n’abakunzi b’umupira w’amaguru by’umwihariko abafana ba Paris Saint Germain, ndetse akanasura ibice bitandukanye by’igihugu harimo gusura Pariki y’Ibirunga na Pariki y’Akagera.
Youri Djorkaef yaje mu Rwana nyuma y’abakinnyi bakomeye baheruka gusura u Rwanda mu mwaka ushize harimo Maria Sharapova wamamaye muri Tennis uherutse mu Rwanda mu mpera z’umwaka ushize.
Youri Raffi Djorkaeff w’imyaka 51, yakiniye ikipe y’igihugu y’Ubufaransa atwarana na yo ibikombe bitatu bikomeye birimo igikombe cy’Isi mu 1998, igikombe cy’Uburayi mu 2000 ndetse na, FIFA Confederations Cup mu 2001.
Yakiniye kandi amakipe arimo Grenoble, Strasbourg, Monaco, Inter Milan, Kaiserslauten, Bolton Wanderers, Blackburn Rovers na New York Red Bulls.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Tour du Rwanda 2020  ITWAWE na Tesfazione Natael wo muri Eritrea
Body:
Agace ka nyuma ka Tour du Rwanda 2020, kari gukinirwa mu mugi wa Kigali mu ntera ya Kilometero 89 na Metero 300 karatangiye. Kugeza ubu bamaze kugenda ibilometero 37. Patrick Byukusenge n’abandi banyarwanda bari gusigwa n’ubari imbere ho metero 50…
Ni agace Umunyarwanda Mugisha Moïse agiye gukina ari ku mwanya wa kabiri aho arushwa n’ufite umwenda w’umuhondo umunota 1’30”.
Imihanda Abakinnyi banyuramo:
 
Kigali Expo-Ground-Rwandex-Rond Point, Kanogo-Cercle Sportif-Mburabuturo-Gikondo-Montée Pavée-Rebero (Finish Line)-Nyamirambo-SP Nyamirambo-Tapis Rouge-Kimisagara-Nyabugogo-Giti cy’inyoni-Nouvelle Route direction Mont Kigali -Norvege-Mont Kigali-Stade Regionale de Nyamirambo-Tapis Rouge-Kimisagara-Mur de Kigali (Chez Mutwe)-Prison 1930-Apacope-Carrefour Yamaha-Kinamba-Route des Poids Lourds-Rondpoint Kanogo-Cercle Sportif-Mburabuturo-Gikondo-Montée Pavée-Rebero (Finish Line)+ 1 Lap
 09:40-10:20  Abakinnyi bari gusinya no kureba ko bujuje ibisabwa kugirango Abakinnyi babone gutangira.
10:30- Nibwo Abakinnyi bahagarutse i Gikondo ahajwi nko kuri Expo Ground.
10:45- Abakinnyi bamaze kugenda Kilometero 9 Tasrame arikubasiga amasegonda 42”
10: 57  Taaramae niwe utwaye amanota y’akazamuka ka mbere Umunyarwanda Manizabayo aza ku mwanya wa kabiri
11:00- Abakinnyi bamaze kugenda Kilometero 18 Hailu umunya- Ethiopie asohotse mu gikundi (Peloton) aho bari gusiga igikundi 1:30”.
11:10-Abakinnyi bamaze kunyonga kilometero 24  Hailu niwe uyoboye arasiga abandi umunota umwe n’amasegonda 20”.
11:13″ Hailu amaze gusiga igikundi ho umunota n’amasegonda 34″ akanasiga igikundi kinini ho umunota n’amasegonda 55″.
11:26: Taaramae asoje kuzamuka Mt Kigali.
11:33 – Bamaze kunyonga Kilometero 37 – Byukusenge Patrick n’abakinnyi batatu bari gusigwa metero 50 n’umukinnyi uri imbere.
12:45 :Mugisha Moise afashe umwanzuro ava mu gikundi ari kubasiga amasegonda 30′
12:48: Hasigaye Kilometero 10  Moise Mugisha ari imbere aramakurikiye Manizabayo.
12: 53: Mugisha Moise ari imbere ari gusiga ufite  umwambaro w’umuhondo amasegonda 24 Hasigaye ibimetero 5.
13:07: Nibwo Tesfazione Natael umunya-Eritrea yari atwaye Tour du Rwanda 2020.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Umunya-Colombia aciye agahigo atwara etape nyinshi muri TdRda…Amahirwe y’Abanyarwanda yagabanutse
Body:
Umunya-Clombia RESTREPO Valencia Jhonatan ukinira Adroni Giocttoli, yegukanye agace ka karindwi ka Tour du Rwanda 2020, ahita yinjira mu baciye agahigo ko gutwara etape nyinshi kuko undi wazitwaye ari Umunyamerika Leijnen Kiel na we watwaye enye muri 2011, ariko uyu munya-Colombia we akaba azitwaye kuva Tour du Rwanda yashyirwa kuri 2.1.
Umunyarwanda Nsengimana Jean Bosco na we uri ku rutonde rw’abatwaye etape nyinshi, akaba yaratwaye eshatu muri 2015 ubwo yanegukanaga iri siganwa ryari rikiri kuri 2.2.
Aka gace Abanyarwanda bagiye gukina bafite ikizere cyo kugabanya ikinyuranyo cyari hagati ya Mugisha Moise wa kabiri ku rutonde rusange na Tesfazion Natnael wari ufite umwenda w’umuhondo.
Aka gace kari intera y’Ibilometero 4,5, umukinnyi akagakina asiganwa n’ibihe ibyo bita ‘Individual Time Trial’.
Abakinnyi 67 ni bo basigaye mu isiganwa rigeze ku munsi waryo wa karindwi mu duce umunani tugomba gukinwa mu gihe batangiye ari 80, bivuze ko 13 bamaze kuvamo.
Umukinnyi  wa mbere yahagurutse ku Ntwari saa 14h:00 agakomeza kuri Tapis rouge – Nyakabanda – Kwa Mutwe agasoreza kuri 40 i Nyamirambo.
Umunyarwanda waje hafi muri iyi etape nto ni Areruya Joseph wabaye uwa 11 wakoresheje iminota 06’55”13, agakurikirwa na Mugisha Samuel wabaye uwa 22, akaba yakoresheje iminota 07’00”45.
Umunya-Eritrea TESFAZION Natnael uyoboye iri siganwa we yaje ku mwanya wa 21 yakoresheje iminota 06’59”77 akomeza kwambara umwenda w’umuhondo.
Ku rutonde rusange, Mugisha Moise utahiriwe n’aka gace kuko yakoresheje iminota 07’21”, ikizere cyo gukomeza kugabanya ibihe biri hagati ye n’Umunya-Eritrea uyoboye iri siganwa cyayoyotse kuko ahubwo ikinyuranyo cyazamutse kuko ubu amurusha umunota 01’30” mu gihe ejo hari hasigayemo umunota 01’18”.
Etape 7: Uko abakinnyi bakurikiranye

 
Urutonde rusange

UKO ETAPE YA 7 YAGENZE MU MAFOTO:
  
          
  
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Uwa Gicuti: Amavubi yongeye kunganya, yo na Congo Brazzaville banganyije 0-0
Body:
Umukino wa Gicuti wahuje ikipe y’Igihugu, Amavubi na Congo-Brazzaville kuri Sitade Amahoro, urangiye nta kipe ibashije kubona mu izamu ry’indi bingaya 0-0.
Ni umukino wa Gicuti wo gufasha aya makipe kwitegura imikino y’igikombe cya Africa cy’abakina imbere mu gihugu CHAN2020 kizaba muri Mata 2020 muri Cameroon.
Uyu mukino wa Gicuti, Amavubi yaherukaga kunganya Cameroon 0-0 mu gihe Congo yo yari yatsinnzwe na Cameroon 1-0.
Abakinnyi b’ikipe ya Congo batangiye basatira kuko mu minota 30′ ya mbere yose iyi kipe yihariye umukino.
Ku munota wa 41′, Congo yabonye uburyo bufunguye bwashoboraga kuvamo igitego, ariko Kimenyi Yves yihagararaho akuramo ishoti ryatewe na Racine umupira uhita ujya muri koroneri.
Igice cya mbere cyarangiye amakipe yombi anganya 0-0, na none igice cya kabiri cyatangiye Congo isatira izamu ry’Amavubi.
Ku munota wa 53′ Obongo Prince wa Congo yahaye umupira Binguila Hardly ateye umupira unyura hejuru y’izamu.
Ku munota wa 56′ Amavubi na yo yagerageje amahirwe, Eric Nzabimana bakunda kwita Zidane yahaye umupira Danny Usengimana asigaranye n’umunyezamu wenyine awutera hejuru y’izamu.
Amakipe yombi yahise akora impinduka ku ruhande rwa Congo, Obossi Bersyl, Lavamba J. Racine na Massanga Chandrel basimburwa na Oyah Roh, Makombo Yamn  na Etou Mignom.
Ku ruhande rw’Amavubi, Danny Usengimana, Eric Ngendahimana na Sugira Erneste basimbuwe na Nshuti Dominique Savio, Ndekwe Flex na Iyabivuze Osee.
Igice cya kabiri cyakiniwe mu kibuga hagati nta kipe n’imwe yasatiraga indi ku buryo bwari kuvamo igitego.
Ku munota wa 85′, Ndekwe yazamutse wenyine ariko yanga gutanga umupira, agiye kuwutera mu izamu bawumukura ku kuguru. Umukino warangiye amakipe yombi anganyije 0-0.
 
Abakinnyi 11 babanjemo ku mpande zombi:
Congo-Brazabille: Ndila Paveth, Magmokele Dimitri (C), Moumdza Prince, Ondongo Julfin, Binguila Hardy, Obossi Bersyl, Ombongo Prince, Nsenga Francis, Massanga Chandrel, Etali Harvy na Lovamba J Racine.
 
Amazuvubi: Kimeynyi Yves, Manzi Thierry (C), Omborenga Fitina, Imanishimwe Emmanuel, Rugwiro Herve, Ngendahimana Eric, Niyonzima Olivier, Nsabimana Eric, Byiringiro Lague, Sugira Ernest na Usengimana Danny.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: TdRwanda2020: Ikizere ku Banyarwanda kiragarutse, Mugisha arasigwa umunota 1’18”
Body:
UPDATE: Umutoza Sempoma Felix yemeza ko ikipe y’u Rwanda ikomeye, ndetse ko Moise Mugisha ari umukinnyi ukomeye, wabashije gukuramo umunota wose mu bihe yasigwaga, akaba yemeza ko ku cyumweru ku munsi wa nyuma wo gusoza Tour du Rwanda hari ikezere ku Banyarwanda.
   
Ku rutonde rusange Mugisha Moise akuyemo amasegonda menshi cyane, we na Tesfazion Natnael hasigayemo ikinyuranyo cy’umunota 1’18”.


12:14 Igikundi cya mbere cyasize Tesfazion Natnael iminota 2’40”, Mugisha Moise w’Umunyarwanda umukurikira baramusiga umunota 1’20”.
 11:23’ Umunyarwanda Mugisha Moise, Restrepo wo muri Colombia, na Quintero baroboye abandi, bamaze kunyonga Km 94.
11H16 – Abakinnyi bamaze kwambuka Nyabarongo imvura ni nyinshi, hari abakoze impanuka, ntiyari impanuka ikomeye nta wakomeretse bahagurutse n’ubundi bashaka gusiganwa.
   
 
Ikaze mu gace ka 6 muri Tour du Rwanda 2020, bavuye i Musanze berekeza i Muhanga, ni intera ya Km 127 na Metero 300.
Dore uko ubu batanu ba mbere barushanya ku ruronde rusange (583.2 km)
1. Tesfazion Natnael 15h11’22”
2. Mugisha Moise 15h13’33”
3. Main Kent 15h14’37”
4. Ravanelli Simone 15h15’06”
5. Areruya Joseph 15h15’08”
Uko irushanwa riri kugenda:
07H50-08H 50 – Abakinnyi babanje gusinya kugira ngo hamenyekane umubare w’abahagurutse.
09H00 – Abakinnyi nibwo bahagarutse imbere y’isoko rya Musanze, babanza kunyonga batabarirwa ibihe.
09H04 – Abakinnyi batangiye gusiganwa babarirwa ibihe. Biteganyijwe ko bagera i Muhanga saa 12:30’26”.
09:30 – Munyaneza Didier yatwaye amanota y’akazamuka ka mbere ahitwa ku Kimonyi mu karere ka Musanze.
Uyu Munyaneza Didier yavuze ko gutwara Etape bishoboka ariko ngo biragoye cyane.
Ati “Ni Etape igoye, murabizi kuzamuka za Ngororero, cyane kuva hariya kuri Nyabarongo uzamuka ujya i Muhanga, uzamutse Buringa ni ahantu hakomeye cyane. Eritrea ifite abahungu bazi kuzamuka biragoye kuyambura umwenda w’umuhondo.”
09H53 – Bamaze kwinjira muri Nyabihu harakonje cyane ariko ntabwo imvura iri kugwa.
09H55 – Abakinnyi bamaze kunyonga ahareshya na Km 27 – Henttala ukinira Nordisk na Hailemichael wa Nippo ni bo bayoye isiganwa.
     
10H40 Rajovic wari wasize bagenze be yatobokesheje ipine y’igare bahita bamufata.
   
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: TdRwanda: UmunyaColombia yongeye kwegukana etape, Umunyarwanda uje hafi ni uwa 16
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Kane, irushanwa ryo gusiganwa ku magare Tour du Rwanda rya 2020 rirakomeza mu gace ka gatanu gaturuka i Rubavu kerekeza i Musanze ahazwi nko mu gicumbi cy’ubukerarugendo kubera Ingagi zihari zikurura ba mukerarugendo batagira ingano. Abanyarwanda ubu bafite intego yo kwegukana iri rushanwa. Aka gace kegukanywe n’Umunya-Colombia RESTREPO Valencia Jhonatan.

Umunyamakuru w’Umuseke uri gukurikirana iri rushanwa, yaganirije abakinnyi b’Abanyarwanda, bamubwira ko ubu intego bafite atari ukwegukana iyi etape ahubwo bashaka kwegukana Tour du Rwanda yamaze kuzamurwa ku rundi rwego.
Urutonde rusange ruratanga ikizere:
Ururonde rusange (583.2 km)
1. Tesfazion Natnael 15h11’22”
2. Mugisha Moise 15h13’33”
3. Main Kent 15h14’37”
4. Ravanelli Simone 15h15’06”
5. Areruya Joseph 15h15’08”
 
Uko irushanwa riri kugenda:
11:00– Abakinnyi basigaye mu irushanwa ari 71 bahagurutse i Rubavu bakaba bagiye kugenda ibilometero 84,7 kugira ngo bagere aho basoreza mu mugi wa Musanze.
Abakinnyi babanje kuzenguruka inshuro eshatu mu mugi wa Rubavu basusurukije abaturage benshi bari baje kwihera ijisho uburyo aba bakinnyi banyunga igare.
11:15- Abakinnyi bari kuzenguruka mu mugi wa Rubavu bamaze kugenda Kilometero 15.
11:25- Ubu bamaze gukora ibilometero 16, igikundi kiri imbere cyamaze gushyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’amasegonda 25”.
11:35- Abakinnyi bamaze kugenda ibilometero 23, bakaba bamaze gusohoka mu mugi wa Rubavu.
11:39- Igikundi kiri imbere kirimo Umunyarwanda Hakizimana wa SACCA, Mulueberhan (Erihrea) na Andemeskel (Israel).
11:40- Bamaze kugenda ibilometero 27, Umunyarwanda Munyaneza Didier amaze kuva mu gikundi ari gusiga abari inyuma 10”.
11:43- Igikundi cy’abakinnyi kigeze ahitwa ku Rugerero, imvura itangiye kugwa…
Umunya-Eritrea Yemane ni we wegukanye agaterera ka mbere (Sprint), agakurikirwa na Hailemicheal (Nippo), uwa gatatu akaba ari Schelling (Israel).
12:00- Bamaze kunyonga ibilometero 34, Byukusenge Patrick yatakiye ahitwa Mahoko, akaba ashyize ikinyuranyo cy’amasegonda 20”.
12:09- Byukusenge amaze gushyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’amasegonda 39” mu ntera iri hagati ye n’igikundi kimuri inyuma.
12:12- Abakinnyi bamaze kunyonga ibilometero 40, Joseph Areruya asanze Byukusenge Patrick bashyizemo ikinyuranyo cy’amasegonda 30”.
Areruya Joseph ariko ahise agaruka mu gikundi bigaragara ko abakinnyi b’Abanyarwanda uyu munsi bari gukinana imibare myinshi.
12:19- Bamaze kugenda ibilometero 42, Byukusenge Patrick akomeje kuyobora, ubu amaze gushyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’amasegonda 53”.
12:22- Ibilometero 44 Byukusenge aki imbere, akaba amaze gushyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’umunota 1’05”.
12:31- Bamaze kugenda Ibilometero 46, ikinyuranyo gikomeye kwiyongera mu gihe ikipe ya Eritrea ifite umwambaro w’umuhondo ikomeje kuguma mu gikundi ngo bakomeze kurinda Tesfazion ufite uyu mwenda.
12:33- Abakinnyi bageze ahitwa i Kora ahavuka abakinnyi benshi barimo Manizabayo Eric, Munyaneza Didier, Byukusenge Patric n’abandi aho hari abafana benshi bazanye ibyapa.
12:34- Bamaze kugenda ibilometero 51, Byukusenge Patrick amaze gushyiramo ikinyuranyo k’iminota 2’12” mu gihe  umunya-Ethiopia Buru wamwatatse amaze gushyiramo 1’30”.
12:47- Abakinnyi bamaze kugera mu karere ka Musanze, Byukusenge Patrick aracyayoboye.
Umunyamakuru w’Umuseke watangiranye n’iri rushanwa, aravuga ko mu nzira banyuzemo mu gace k’uyu munsi ari ho hagaragaye abafana benshi kuva batangira.
Abakinnyi b’Abanyarwanda basanzwe banitoreza muri biriya bice kuko banafite ikigo cyabo kiri mu karere ka Musanze, benshi muri bo banavuka muri iriya ntara y’Amajyaruguru.
12:53- Agasozi ka kabiri kegukanywe na Byukusenge Patrick, agakurikirwa na Buru ndetse na Yemane wabaye uwa gatatu.
12:55- Bamaze kugenda ibilometero 69, ikinyuranyo cyatangiye kugabanuka kuko ubu hasigayemo umunota umwe gusa.
Ikinyuranyo gikomeje kugabanuka ubu hasigayemo amasegonda 16” gusa.
13:03- Ubu basigaje ibilometero bitanu gusa ngo bagere aho bagomba gusoreza mu mugi wa Musanze.
13:06- Byukusenge Patrick yamaze gushyikirwa n’igikundi yakomeje gusiga.
13:10- Umunya-Colombia RESTREPO Valencia Jhonatan ukinira ikipe ya AndroniGiocatto ni we wegukanye aka gace ka Rubavu-Musanze. Uyu kandi yari yegukanye agace ka Huye Rusizi.
Umunyarwanda uje hafi ni Mugisha Moise uje ari uwa 16 arushwa amasegonda 04” n’uwa mbere.
Urutonde rwa Etape ya Rubavu-Musanze

Urutonde rusange:

   
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Rayon Sports FC yamaze kugira Cassa Mbungo umutoza mukuru
Body:
Cassa Mbungo uherutse gutandukana na AFC Leopard yamaze kugirwa umutoza wa Rayon Sports FC yatandukanye na Espinoza Martinez.
Babinyujie kuri Twitter, Rayon Sports yahaye ikaze Cassa.
Kuri Twitter banditse ngo “Twishimiye kubamenyesha ko uwahoze ari umutoza wa AS Kigali, Police FC, Kiyovu SC na AFC Leopard yo muri Kenya, Cassa Mbungo Andre ari umutoza mukuru wa Rayon Sports guhera kuri uyu wa Gatatu”
Cassa yasinye amasezerano yo gutoza Rayon Sports muri uyu umwaka w’imikino urimo kwicuma kuko Shampiyona y’ikiciro cya mbere mu Rwanda igeze ku munsi wa 21.
Igikombe cy’Amahoro cyo bageze muri 1/8 k’irangiza aho Rayon Sports FC izahura na Mukura VS.
Cassa Mbungo abaye umutoza wa kane utoje Rayon Sports mu myaka ibiri ishije,  hari Olivier Ovambe, Roberto Oliviera (Robertinho), na Javier Martinez Espinoza bose bamaze gutandukana n’iyi kipe.

Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Etape 4: Abanyarwanda bakoze iyo bwabaga, MUGISHA Moise abaye uwa 3
Body:
Agace ka kane ka Tour du Rwanda Rusizi-Rubavu akaba ari na ko karekare kurusha utundi twose kuko gafite ibilometero 206,3. Abakinnyi bahagurutse mu mugi wa Rusizi berekeza mu mugi wa Gisenyi. Umunya-Eritrea, Tesfazion yegukanye aka gace kagoye abakinnyi kubera uburebure bwako. Mugisha Moise wa SACA we abaye uwa Gatatu akaba anabaye Umunyarwanda uje ku mwanya wa hafi muri iri siganwa.
Uko Etape 4 yagenze umunota ku wundi:
06:50- Abakinnyi bari batangiye gusinya kugiri ngo hamenyekane umubare w’abakinnyi bitabira aka gace gasumba utundi twose tuzakinwa muri iyi Tour du Rwanda ya 2020.
08:00- Abakinnyi 75 bahagurutse mu mugi wa Rusizi berekeza i Rubavu ku ntera ya Kilometero 206,3.
08:06- Ni bwo abakinnyi batangiye kubabari ibihe kugira ngo haze kumenyekana uwegukanye aka gace.
08:39- Bamaze kugenda ibilometero 11, abakinnyi batanu barimo Byukusenge wa Benediction, umunya-Eritrea, Tesfom n’Umunya-Ethiopia Buru bamaze kuva mu bandi ni bo bayoboye.
08:41- Bamaze kugenda ibilometero 18, Peloton na yo imaze gucikamo ibice.
08:43- Bamaze kugenda ibilometero 21, abandi bakinnyi barindwi baratatse barimo Ligthart (Total), Tesfazion (Erythrée), Main (Pro Touch), Ravanelli (Androni), Gahemba (Rwanda), Ovett (Israel) na Araujo (BAI).
08:46- Bamaze kugenda ibilometero 24, abandi bakinnyi 8 bamaze gufata breakaway.
09:00- Bamaze kugenda ibilometero 30, ubu igikundi cy’imbere kirimo abakinnyi 19.
09:01- Agasozi ka mbere (Sprint) kegukanywe na Buru (Ethiopia) akurikirwa na Araujo (BAI), ku mwanya wa gatatu haje Basson (Pro Touch).
09:05- Abakinnyi bamaze kugenda intera ya Kilometero 37 Abakinnyi barasiga peloton (igikundi) 2’20” nta munyarwanda n’umwe urimo.
09:11- Igikundi cy’imbere (breakaway) kimaze gushyiramo 5’55”, kikaba kirimo Abanyarwanda batatu ari bo Areruya Joseph, Manizabayo na Mugisha Moise kirimo kandi Pim Ligthart na Paul Ourselin ba Total, Umunya-Eritrea Tesfazion, n’abandi.
09:27- Bamaze kugenda kilometero 50, umunya Eritrea, Debesay ukinira Bike Aid afashe igikundi kiri imbere baba 20 bari imbere harimo Abanyarwanda batatu.
09:37- Abakinnyi bamaze kugenda ibilometero 51, ubu breakaway imaze gushyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’iminota 7’30”.
09:37- Bamaze kugenda Kilometero 65 abakinnyi 20 barimo abanyarwanda batatu bashyizemo ikinyuranyo cy’iminota 8’.
10:12- Abakinnyi 20 bageze ahitwa ku Mugonero bashyizemo ikinyuranyo cy’iminota 10’45”. Barimo Areruya Joseph na Mugisha Moise.
11:30- Bruno Araujo (BAI) yegukanye amanota y’akazamuka ka kabiri, Buru aba uwa kabiri naho Debesay aba uwa gatatu.
13:00- Bageze i Rubavu bamaze kunyonga Km 164 hagati y’abakinnyi bari imbere n’ufite umupira w’umuhondo harimo iminota 4’10”.
13:15- Basigaje ibilometero 20 ngo basoze aka gace gakomeye cyane, Abanyarwanda barimo Areruya Joseph na Manizabayo bari mu gikundi kiyoboye.
Bari kumwe kandi n’abandi bakinnyi bane ari bo Shtein, Buru, Ravanelli na Kruger.
13:29- Bamaze kugenda Ibilometero 191, guhatana cyane byatangiye.
13:32- Basigaje Ibilometero 9, abakinnyi batangiye guhangana cyane ubu igikundi cyari inyuma kimaze kugabanya ikinyuranyo kiri gahati yabo n’ikibari imbere, ubu hasigayemo iminota 2’35”.
13:35- Basigaje Ibilometero 5 ngo bagere aho bagomba kurangiriza aka gace.
13:38-Ubu harabura Ibilometero 3 ngo bagere ku murongo w’umweru, Areruya akaba akiri mu gikundo cy’imbere.
13:42- Umunya-Eritrea, Tesfazion yegukanye agace ka kane akurikirwa na Kent Main mu gihe Umunyarwanda Mugisha Moside wa SACA na we yahise aza ku mwanya wa gatatu akaba ari na we uje hafi mu Banyarwanda.
Tesfazion arahita anambara umwenda w’Umuhondo awambuye umunya-Colombia RESTREPO Valencia Jhonatan wari wawuraranye.
Aka gace karanzwe no guhangana cyane, Abakinnyi b’Abanyarwanda bakoze iyo bwabaga kuko abakinnyi barimo Areruya Joseph yakomeje kuba mu gikundi cyayoboye iri siganwa kugeza babura ibilometero nka 10 ngo basoze.
 


 

Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: TduRwanda2020: Etape 3 Huye-Rusizi, itwawe n’umunya-Colombia RESTREPO
Body:
UPDATE: Abanyarwanda bakomeje kugerageza guhatana n’ibihangange muri Tour du Rwanda, nta Etape baratwara, uri hafi ni Areruya Joseph uje ku mwanya wa 13. Etape itwawe na RESTREPO Valencia Jhonatan wo muri Colombia.
 
 
Saa 12h 50 Hasigaye Km 10 imvura itangiye kugwa i Rusizi, kugera aho basoreza birasaba umukinnyi ufite imbaraga
12:30 Abakinnyi ba mbere bamaze gusohoka muri Nyungwe, Mugisha na Yemena baracyari imbere.
12:06 Abakinnyi baracyari muri Nyungwe, Mugisha na Yemane ni bo bayoye abandi

Saa 11:50’ Abakinnyi bari mu makona ya Nyungwe
11:50 Abanyarwanda, Areruya Joseph na Munyaneza Didier bari gusiga igikundi iminota ine.
 
          
*Abakinnyi 5 bavuye mu irushanwa
 
Murakaza neza mu gace ka gatatu k’irushanwa mpuzamahanga ryo gusiganwa ku magare Tour du Rwanda 2020, abasiganwa ku magare bahaguruka mu Karere ka Huye berekeza Nyamasheke na Rusizi mu ntera ya Km 142.
Ibyo wamenya ku gace ka gatatu ka Tour du Rwanda
Ni agace gatangirira mu Ntara y’amagepfo kagasorezwa mu y’Iburengerazuba, kakanyura mu turere dutatu aritwo: Huye, Nyamagane na Rusizi.
Aka gace kagizwe na Km 142, kakaba karuta uduce tubiri tumaze gukinwa. Agace ka mbere (Kigali Arena – Kimironko) yari Km 114.4 naho agace ka kabiri (Kigali-Huye) ko kari Km 120.5.
Uko isiganwa riri kugenda:
08H20’- 09H 20’ – Abakinnyi uko ari 79 babanje gusinya ndetse no gusuzumwa ko bujuje ibisabwa ngo bakine agace ka gatatu ka Tour du Rwanda.
09H30’- Abakinnyi batangiye gusiganwa, bahagurukira i Huye kuri SP berekeza i Rusizi, gusa bari kugendana kuko bataratangira kubariwa ibihe.
09H35’ Abakinnyi batangiye kubarirwa ibihe, biteganyijwe ko bagera i Rusizi Saa 13:25’16’’.
Bitunguranye Abakinnyi babiri bahabwaga amahirwe ari bo Avili ukinira Israel  na Eyob ukinira Terengaganu bavuye mu irushanwa kugeza ubu abakinnyi basigayemo ni 75 mu minsi itatu hamaze kuvamo batanu.
Hamaze kuvamo 5:
Kuri Etape yambere havuyemo Chebalaoui Oussama (Algeria)
Etape 2 havuyemo babiri bakoze impanuka bageze i Huye ari bo Rochas Rémy (Delko) na Behringer Oliver Novo
Abandi babiri bavuyemo kuri Etape 3 itangiye none.
-Eyob Metke(Terengganu)
-Avili vanegas (Israel)
Saa 10:00 a.m:  Abakinnyi bamaze kugenda Km 19 bageze mu Karere ka Nyamagabe ahazwi nko mu Gasarenda.
Mu Gasarenda hari abakunzi benshi baje gushyigira Abanyarwanda.
Saa 10:38: Abakinnyi bari binjiye mu ishyamba rya Nyungwe. Didier Munyaneza ariwe uri imbere…
 
Jean Paul MUGABE 
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Amavubi yanganyije na Cameroun 0-0 mu mukino wa gicuti
Body:
Ikipe y’u Rwanda “Amavubi” yanganyije na Cameroun ubusa ku busa mu mukino wa gishuti wo kwitegura igikombe cy’ Africa cy’abakina imbere mu gihugu “CHAN 2020” waraye ubereye muri Cameroon. Ni umukino Amavubi yatangiye asatira izamu rya Cameroon mu minota ya mbere y’umukino. Rutahizamu w’Amavubi Sugira Ernest yabonye uburyo bwinshi bwashoboraga kuvamo igitego ariko biranga.
Mu buryo butandukanye n’indi mikino u Rwanda rwaherukaga gukinira hanze, abasore ba Mashami Vincent barushaga k’uburyo bugaraga ikipe ya Cameroon mu minota ya mbere.
Nyuma y’iminota 20’ ya mbere Cameroon idasatira izamu ry’Amavubi, yaje gutangira gusatira.
Biragaragara ko umutoza mukuru w’iyi kipe yari yabanje kwiga imikinire y’Amavubi.
Igice cya mbere cyarangiye amakipe yombi anganya 0-0.
Mu gice cya kabiri Amavubi yakoze impinduka havamo umunyezamu Kimenyi Yves, Manishimwe Djabel, Iradukunda Jean Bertrand na Sugira Ernest hinjiramo umunyezamu Kwizera Olivier, Ngendahimana Eric, Byiringiro Lague na Danny Usengimana.
Ku munota wa 61 Amavubi yabonye amahirwe ku murongo w’urubuga rw’amahina ku mupira Sefu yahaye Omborenga ariko awuteye unyura hejuru y’izamu.
Ku munota wa 64 Savio yasimbuwe na Iyabivuze Osé. Ku munota wa 86 Ally Niyonzima asimbura Niyonzima Olivier Sefu.
Ku munota wa 87 Byiringiro Lague yateye ishoti rikomeye ahagaze inyuma y’urubuga rw’amahina ariko umunyezamu wa Cameroun awukuramo, umukino urangira ari 0-0.
Uyu mukino w’Amavubi na Cameroon n’umwe mu mikino ya gicuti u Rwanda rwakinnye mbere y’uko bakina imikino mpuzamahanga y’Africa y’abakina imbere mu gihugu izaba muri Mata 2020.
Biteganyijwe ko Amavubi azagera i Kigali Tariki 25 Gashyantare ku i saa 21h00 agakomeza imyiteguro y’umukino wa kabiri wa gishuti bafitanye n’ikipe ya Congo Brazza Ville uzaba tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020 i Kigali.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Rutagambwa wirukanywe muri Rayon ati ‘simpakwa ku muntu udashobora kwihaka’
Body:
(AUDIO) Ari i Burayi i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi, Martin Rutagambwa wigeze kuba Visi Perezida wa Rayon Sports, akaba yirukanywe ku mwanya w’Umujyanama wihariye wa Munyakazi Sadate, yabwiye Umuseke ko azira inama yamugiriye amwereka ko umutoza ikipe ifite atari ku rwego rwayo. 
Guhagarikwa kwe ngo yabimenye ari i Burayi, akavuga ko bitamutunguye kubera ko n’ubundi atari umwanya yatorewe.
Ati “Namenye ko nahagaritswe, nta gitangaza kirimo kuko sinigeze niyamamaza, nta n’ibyo nigeze nsaba, buriya hari igihe umuntu aguhitamo afite ibyo agendeyeho cyangwa agendereye hanyuma no kuguhagarika akaba afite ibyo agendeyeho, 
gutanga inama ushobora kuzitanga hanyuma uwari wazigusabye yasanga zitagikenewe cyangwa zidafite akamaro akaguhagarika.”
Rutagambwa udakunda guca ku ruhande ibyo avuga, yabwiye Umuseke ko Rayon Sports ikunze kubamo amagambo y’uko harimo igice kirwanya ubuyobozi, ibyo ngo ni ukubeshya, kimwe n’abavuga ishyamba na byo ngo ni uguhimba.
Mu butumwa yandikiye Rayon Sports, yanengaga imikorere idahwitse kuko ngo igihe yaba idahindutse kubaka Rayon Sports ikomeye ntibizashoboka.
Ati “Ntabwo nabonye Sadate ayobora nabi mu miyoborere ye, ahubwo afite imivugururire mu buryo busanzwe mu by’ubuyobozi yagiye iba ndanze muri Rayon Sports,  ibindi bibazo ababitera Sadate na we arabazi kandi nta bundi bushobozi afite bwo kubigizayo.”
Rutagambwa avuga ko akiri muri Rayon Sports ndetse ko nta we uzayimukuramo kandi ngo ntibimusaba kuba mu buyobozi kugira ngo ahindure ibitagenda.
Yagize ati “Sinkina dipolomasi, simpakwa ku muntu na we utabasha kwihaka, si ndi mu bantu bashobora kugambanira Rayon Sports, nta n’ubwo nshobora kwihanganira benshi babamo mu buryo bugambanye, no mu ndonke z’ubusabusa ziba muri Rayon Sports, ntabwo ndi muri abo. 
Rero iyo duturanye simbihanganira, ariko bakora ibishoboka byose ngo banyigizeyo, gusa ikigoye ni kimwe, kunyigiza babigeraho gute? Icyo ni ikibazo abumva babyifuza bazicare babyigeho, kunyigizayo byo ntibishoboka, sinkeneye umwanya mu buyobozi kugira ngo nkorere Rayon Sports, sinshobora no guhindura ibitagenda ari uko ndi mu buyobozi gusa.”
 
Ubutumwa bwatumye Rutagambwa ahagarikwa:
“Président, ukikijwe n’abantu b’inkomamashyi kandi ntabwo bizana insinzi, 
1) Dufite staff ituzuye nakubwiye kenshi ko ntaho Kirasa yatugeza kuko ni umutoza mwiza ariko ni ‘Junior’ ntari ku rwego rwo guhanganira ibikombe.
Ejobundi nateje ubwega hano mbasaba kutemerera Kirasa kujya muri ‘négociations’ z’ikipe y’igihugu mubica amazi,
2semaine duhanganye na Ferwafa, concentration y’ikipe yose ntayo.
1) Ubuyobozi 
2) Staff technique 
3)  Abakinnyi
4) Abafana 
Résultat tubonye zirabisobanura, niba nk’Umuyobozi ushaka ko dutwara igikombe, hagomba gufatwa ingamba uhereye mu mbere kugera ku muharuro, kuko ibikombe biraharanirwa.
Ngaho mwihangane nimuhindura imyumvire izahindura imikorere. 
Bonne chance.”
Rayon Sports nyuma yo gutsindwa na Sunrise 2-0, ubu iri ku mwanya wa gatatu, n’amanota 41, APR FC ya mbere iyirusha amanota 7.
 
NKUNDINEZA Jean Paul 
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: TduRda: Etape ya 2 yegukanywe n’Umunya-Ethiopia, Munyaneza Didier aba uwa 4
Body:
Rimaze kwigarurira imitima y’abatari bake mu Rwanda, buri wese aba yifuza kurireba ku buryo icyamubuza cyaba gisa no kumunyaga imbyeyi…Ni Tour du Rwanda agace ka kabiri kagiye gutangirira mu mujyi wa Kigali aho akavura karamukiye ku muryango ariko ntikababuze kujya kwihera ijisho. Aka gace baragasoreza i Huye bakaza kuba bagenze Km 120,5. Aka gace keguhanwe n’Umunya-Ethiopia Lulu Kinfe Hailemicheal (Nippo-Delko).
Umunyamakuru w’Umuseke uri gukurikirana iri siganwa agendana n’amagare aho ari hose, aravuga ko mu mujyi rwagati ahahagurukiye abakinnyi ku nyubako ya MIC, hari akavura kajojoba ariko abantu baharamukiye ari benshi baje kwirebera uko ibi bihangange mu mukino w’amagare bihaguruka.
Ku isaaha ya saa 10h00 zuzuye, abakinnyi bahagurutse ariko bagenda gahoro kuko batangira kubarirwa ari uko barengze Nyabarongo.
Umunyamakuru wacu Jean Paul Mugabe yaganirije abakinnyi b’Abanyarwanda bari muri iri rushanwa, bamubwira ko bizeye kwegukana aka gace.
Bavuga ko babanje kwiga abakinnyu bitabiriye iri rushanwa kuko 42 muri bo ari bashya muri Tour du Rwanda ubu iri ku rwego rwa 2.1.
 
Uko irushanwa ryagenze umunota ku wundi:
10:15- Ubu abakinnyi bose uko ari 79 bamaze kurenga Nyabugogo baracyari mu kivunge bagenda gahoro gahoro kuko bataratangira kubarirwa.
10:23- Ubwo abakinnyi bari bamaze kurenga Nyabugogo, abarimo Umunyarwanda Didier Munyaneza bagerageje gucika igikundi ariko ntibyabahira.
Bisa nk’aho abakinnyi bakuye isomo ku byababayeho ejo bakaba badashaka ko hagira ubasiga intera ndende nk’uko ejo Yevgeniy Fedorov w’Umunya-Kazakhistan yaberetse igihandure bakarinda barangiza.
Munyaneza Didier kandi yegukanye amanota yo guterera agasozi ka mbere ari ko ka Ruyenzi werekeza Kamonyi akaba agize amanota atatu mu gihe Umunya-Eritrea, Mulueberhan yaje amukurikiye we akaba agize inota rimwe.
10:42- Ubu bageze ku Kamonyi ahazwi nko ku Masukabamaze kugenda Km 17, Igikundi cyamaze gucikamo ibice bibiri, Fedorov ari mu gice cya kabiri.
10:47- Abakinnyi bageze i Rugobagoba, Abanyarwanda batatu bayoboye, Byukusenge Patrick wa Benediction ni we uri imbere.
Inyuma ye kandi hari Manizabayo Eric na we wa Benediction ndetse na Mugisha Moise wa SACA.
11:00- Bamaze kugenda ibilometero 25, Batanu barimo Mugisha Samuel wa Team Rwanda bataka bagenzi babo babacitse.
11:04- Igikundi kiri imbere ubu kirimo Byukusenge, Manizabayo na Munyaneza ba Benediction ndetse Moise Mugisha wa SACA n’Umunya-Eritrea Yemane.
Iki gikundi kandi kirimo Mugisha Samuel, Umunya- Eritrea Tesfom, Avila wo muri Israel, Jurado (Terengganu) na Buru (Ethiopia).
11:12- Abiyatse igikundi bamaze gushyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’amasegonda 48’’, bakaba bagiye kwinjira mu mujyi wa Muhanga aho bamaze kugenda ibilometero 32.
11:17- Ubu bamaze gukora ibilometero 37, bakaba bamaze gushyiramo ikinyuranyo 1’30’’.
11:25- Abakinnyi bageze mu marembo y’Umugi wa Muhanga bakirwa n’imfungwa n’abagororwa bo muri gereza ya Muhanga na bo bari baje guhengereza ngo birebere uko iri rushanwa rimeze.
11:28- Igikundi cya mbere kimaze gushyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’iminota 2’10”, kikaba kiyobowe na Yemen ni we uri ku mwanya wa mbere muri Breakaway (agakundi ka mbere ) akaba akurikiwe Mugisha Moise bamaze kugenda.
11:31- Bamaze kugenda ibilometero 42, igikundi cya mbere noneho gishyizemo ikinyuranyo cy’iminota 2’55’’ kikaba kirimo abakinnyi batanu.
11:45- Igikundi cya mbere ubu kigeze ahitwa Buhanda mu karere ka Ruhango kikaba kimaze gushyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’iminota 3’5”.
12:00- Mu gasozi ka kabiri mu karere ka Ruhango, aho bagomba gutana bayobowe na Yemane, agakurikirwa na Abreha, naho Mugisha Moise akaza ku mwanya wa gatatu, bakaba babura ibilometero 53 ngo bagere aho barangiriza agace.
12:08- Abakinnyi bageze i Gatagara mu Karere ka Nyanza. Igikundi cya mbere kikaba kimaze gushyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’iminota 3’30” bakaba basigaje ibilometero 50 ngo bagere aho basoreza aka gace.
12:19-Bamaze kugenda ibirometero 76, igikundi cy’imbere kimaze gushyiramo intera y’iminota 4’.
Federov ejo wegukanye agace ka Kigali-Rwamagana, abakinnyi batatu bari imbere bari kumusigaho iminota 3’45”.
12:28- Abakinnyi b’amagare binjiye Mu Karere ka Huye ahaza gusorezwa iyi Etape. Bakaba bamaze kugenda ibilometero 84.
Igikundi cy’inyuma cyatangiye kugabanya ikinyuranyo kuko ubu hasigayemo iminota 3’10”.
12:33- Abakinnyi batangiye guhatana cyane, ubu ikinyuranyo cy’abakinnyi bari imbere gisigayemo umunota 1’20”.
Abakinnyi bageze i Rusatira mu karere ka Huye aho hasigaye ibilometero 30.
12:44- Bageze i Rubona mu karere ka Huye aho bamaze kugenda ibilometero 95 , hasigaye 25 abakinnyi bari imbere barisiga Ferdorv umunota 1’25”.
12:51- Bageze mu Rwabuye, Abanyarwanda babiri bari imbere. Abari mu gikundi k’imberere bari gusiga Federov amasegonda 52”.
13:03- Umunya- Ethiopia Abreha aratatse bigaragara ko yifuza kwegukana aka gace amaze gushyira ikinyuranyo cy’amasegonda 30” hagati ye na bagenzi be bari barikumwe.
13:09- Habura ibilometero bitanu, ikipe yaturutse mu bufaransa Total Direct Energie batatse bagabanya iminota iri hagati yabo na Abreha ubu hasigayemo 20’’.
13:16- Umunya-Ethiopia Lulu Kinfe Hailemicheal ukinira ikipe Team NIPPO DELKO yo mu Bufaransa yegukanye agace ka kabiri ka Kigali-Huye gafite 120,5Km.
Umunyarwanda Munyaneza Didier ukinira Benediction Ignite uje ku mwanya wa hafi, yabaye uwa Kane akaba anganya ibihe n’uyu utwaye aka gace kuko bahagereye rimwe.
Areruya Joseph wanatwaye iri rushanwa rya Tour du Rwanda ritarazamuka ku rundi rwego, ejo ni we munyarwanda wari waje hafi, uyu munsi yabaye uwa Kenda akaba ari we mu munyarwanda wa kabiri muri aka gace ka Kigali- Huye.
Byukusenge Patrick uyu munsi wahatanye cyane, we yaje ku mwanya wa 16 mu gihe Fedorov watwaye agace k’ejo we yaje ku mwanya wa 33.

Kuri MIC aho bahagurukiye nabwo ntibumvaga imvura      

 
  
   


Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: AMAGARE: Ride Rwanda igiye gukinwa ku nshuro ya kabiri
Body:
Isiganwa ku magare ku bakinnyi batabigize umwuga (Amateur) bise Ride Rwanda rigiye gukinwa ku ncuro ya kabiri.  Uyu mwaka bazakina uduce tune kandi utu duce turi mutwo  Tour du Rwanda izakinirwamo.
Ni irushanwa ry’abakinnyi batabigize umwuga rihuza Abanyarwanda  n’abanyamahanga hagamijwe kwereka abanyamahanga ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda.
Rriratangira kuri uyu wa mbere tariki ya 24, Gashyantare, 2020 rive  Kigali ryerekeza Huye.
Nkurunziza René uri mu bategura iri rushanwa avuga ko Ride Rwanda y’uyu mwaka ifite umwihariko, kuko  izanyura mu duce tune turi mutwo Tour du Rwanda izanyuramo.
Ati:”Ni amahirwe twagize yo gufatanya na Tour du Rwanda isiganwa rikomeye muri Africa rikaba ari naryo siganwa rigira abafana benshi kurusha andi muri Africa. Twahisemo gukorana n’iri rushanwa kugira ngo tumenyekanishe u Rwanda.”
Ngo umuntu ashobora kuba ari mu isiganwa yerekeza i Huye agasura ingoro y’umwami iNyanza cyangwa ibindi byiza nyaburanga biri mu Rwanda.
Nkurunziza Rene yerekanye umwenda bazakoresha muri Ride Rwanda 2020, asaba abanyarwanda bashaka gukora Siporo ko babegera bagakorana.
Izi nizo nzira za Ride Rwanda 2020 izacamo:
 
24 Gashyantare 2020: Kigali-Huye: 120, 5 Km
26 Gashyantare 2020: Rusizi-Rubavu: 206, 3 Km
27 Gashyantare 2020: Rubavu-Musanze: 84, 7 Km
28 Gashyantare 2020: Musanze-Muhanga: 127, 3 Km
 
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Fedorov watangiye neza TduRwanda yavuze uko yabonye Etape 1
Body:
Federov Yevgeny ukinira Astana Motors wegukanye agace ka mbere ka Tour du Rwanda 2020, yavuze ko yatunguwe no kwegukana aka gace ku nshuro ya mbere aje muri iri siganwa.
Umukinnyi wa Astana Motorsyatwaye Etape iva kuri Kigali Arena – Rwamagana – Kigali, intera ya Km 112 akoresheje 2h44’59″.
Aganira n’itangazamakuru, Federov yavuze ko yatunguwe no kwitabira iri rushanwa ku nshuro ya mbere agahita yegukana agace kamwe mu isiganwa.
Ati: “Agace karimo ihatana kuva dutangira kugeza  turangije, gusa ntwabwo nari nzi ko nashobora kwegukana aka gace birantunguye ku nshuro ya mbere nje muri Tour du Rwanda.”
Federv yavuze ko yabanje kugorwa na Metero 25 za mbere gusa biza kumugora nyuma y’uko yavaga mu gikundi bakamugarura.
Ati: ”Byari bigoye cyane kugendana n’igikundi cy’abandi bakinnyi by’umwihariko dutangira aho nagerageje gushaka gusiga Igikundi narindimo muri metelo 25 za mbere biranga, 
nyuma naje gukora ibishoboka nza kugira amahirwe ndatsinda. Mbere y’uko nza muri Tour du Rwanda nabanje gukorera hamwe n’ikipe yange imyitozo muri Espagne ndizereka ko tuzitwara neza.”
Federov yegukanye ibihembo binshi mu gace k’uyu munsi.
Ni we mukinnyi ukiri muto witwaye neza, Umwambaro w’umuhondo uhabwa umukinnyi uyoboye abandi mu irushanwa ni we uwufite, igihembo cy’uwahize abandi mu kuzamuka ndetse n’uwasize abandi mu duce tuba twasizwe mu nzira hagati (Sprint Intermediaires).
Uko bakurikiranye n’ibihe barutanwa:
Federov Yevgeniy – Vino Astana Motors 02h44’25″
Mulueberhan Henok- Eritrea + 15″
Hailu Biniam – Niko Delko Provence + 18″
Quintero Norena Carlos Julian +20″
Byukusenge Patrick- Benediction Ignite +21″
Schelling Patrick- Israel Start Up Nation +26″
Natnael Tesfazion- Israel Start Up Nation +26″
Areruya Joseph- Team Rwanda +26″
Main Kant- Pro Touch +29″
Munazo Giraldo Daniel Androni Giacottali + 29″
      

Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSKE.RW

Title: TdRwanda2020: Fedorov atwaye Etape1 ya Kigali-Rwamagana -Kigali
Body:
UPDATE: 13:24′ Fedorov ni we wegukanye agace ka mbere ka Tour du Rwanda2020 kavaga kuri Kigali Arena kereza i Rwamagana kagasorezwa Kimironko, uyu ni uwo muri Kazakhstan akinira Astana.
 

Uyu mukinnyi yitwa Yevgenyi Fedorov  akinira Vino-Astana Motors akaba ari na we wo mu giugu ke ukinnye ku nshuro ya mbere Tour du Rwanda.
13:15 Hasigaye ibirometero 8, Fedorov arasiga Uhiriwe na Mekseb bari ku mwanya wa kabiri iminota 2’08”
13:05 Fedorov ni we ukiyoboye aho asiga Uhiriwe Renus 1’20”, Uhiriwe Renus na we agasiga Mugisha Samueli uyoboye igikundi 1’20.
Habura ibilometero 20 uri ku mwanya wa mbere ni Fedorov Uhiriwe Renus umunyarwanda ari ku mwanya wa kabiri
Dore inzira za Tour du Rwanda 2020:
23 Gashyantare 2020: Kigali Arena-Kimironko: 114, 4 Km
24 Gashyantare 2020: Kigali-Huye: 120, 5 Km
25 Gashyantare 2020: Huye-Rusizi: 142, 0 Km
26 Gashyantare 2020: Rusizi-Rubavu: 206, 3 Km
27 Gashyantare 2020: Rubavu-Musanze: 84, 7 Km
28 Gashyantare 2020: Musanze-Muhanga: 127, 3 Km
29 Gashyantare 2020: Kigali-Kigali: 4, 5 Km
12:35′ Abasiganwa bageze i Rugende mu Karere ka Gasabo aho bamaze kunyonga ahareshya na Km 80 breakaway irimo Uhiwe Renus yashyizemo ikinyuranyo k’iminota 6’05”.
 
Murakaza neza mu Cyumweru k’ibirori by’umukino wo gusiganwa ku magare mu Rwanda. Tubakiriye mu minsi 8 yo kuryoherwa n’isiganwa mpuzamahanga rizenguruka u Rwanda, ‘Tour du Rwanda2020’ rigiye gukinwa ku nshuro ya 12.
Tour du Rwanda ikinwa muri uyu mwaka ni ku nshuro ya kabiri iri ku rwego rwa 2.1,  ni igikorwa k’imikino kigera mu Ntara zose z’u Rwanda kandi gikurikiranwa n’Abanyarwanda benshi badasabwe ikiguzi na gito.
Ku isaha ya saa 10:30 abakinnyi 80 bahagutse kuri Kigali Arena berekeza i Rwamagana aho u Rwanda ruhagarariwe n’abakinnyi 15.
Saa 10:40 abasiganwa bari bageze mu kilometero cya kabiri aho abakinnyi bose bari mu gikundi kimwe nta we urava mu bandi ngo abasige.
Saa 10:45 Uhiriwe wa Benediction na Jurado wa Terengganu bagerageje kuva mu gikundi ariko barabagarura.
Saa 10:40 abasiganwa bamaze kugenda ibiromotero 7.
(Peloton) igikundi cya mbere kirimo abakinnyi bane: Cole (BAI), Uhiriwe (Benediction), Hakizamana (Skol), Fedorov (Vino).
10:53  abayoboye isiganwa barenze i Kabuga aho hagati yabo n’igikundi kibari inyumaho amasegonda. Umuhanda wa Kabuga urimo abakunzi b’amagare benshi baje kureba uyu mukino.
11: 28 Abakinnyi bari imbere barimo na Uhiriwe Byiza Renus wa Benediction, bamaze gushyiramo iminota itandatu n’amasegonda 55. Igikundi kirimo abakinnyi benshi na cyo gikomeje kubakurikira.
11:45 Bene Youcef wari wasize igikundi iminota 6’40” cyamufata. Abakinnyi batatu bari imbere y’igikundi bashyizemo ikinyuranyo k’iminota 7.

11:56 Abakinnyi bageze i Rwamagana aho breakaway (abacomotse igikundi) basize abandi ikinyuranyo k’iminota 7″.
12:00 abasiganwa bamaze kugenda ibilometero 54, breakaway (Abacomotse mu gikundi) bayobowe n’umunyarwanda Uhiriwe Renus bari gusiga igikundi kibari inyuma iminota 7’15”.
UMUSEKE turakomeza kuba amakuru…..

      
AMAFOTO@KUBWAYO Adrien/UMUSEKE
MUGABE Jean Paul
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Patriots yatsinze UGB…REG BBC na yo yongera kubona insinzi
Body:
Patriots BBC yatsinze UGB BBC amanota 85-67 naho REG BBC itsinda Tigers amanota 73-57 ku  mikino y’umunsi wa 10 wa Shampiyona ya Basketball, yabaye kuri uyu wa Gatanu muri Petit Stade i Remera.
Patriots BBC ifite igikombe cya Shampiyona y’umwaka ushize w’imikino, itaragize intangiro nziza za Shampiyona yatangiye neza uyu mukino ndetse itsinda amanota umunani ya mbere UGB itarabona inota na rimwe.
Agace ka mbere k’umukino karangiye Patriots BBC iyoboye n’amanota 26-19 ya UGB. Patriots BBC ibifashijwemo n’abarimo Ruzigande Ally na Prince Eze Nmandi yashyizemo ikinyuranyo cy’amanota 15 (32-47), mu gace ka kabiri.
Agace ka gatatu Patriots BBC yarushije UGB ishyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’amanota 17 ndetse 20 (47-67), byagaraga ko yashaka gutsinda uyu mukino. Umukino warangiye Patriots BBC itsinze UGB harimo ikinyuranyo cy’amanota 18 (67-85).
Ni ubwo UGB yatsinzwe Muhizi Prince wa UGB BBC ni we watsinze amanota menshi (21) muri uyu mukino, akurikirwa na Umuhoza Jean De Dieu bakinana, we watsinze 17 mu gihe Hagumintwari Steve yatsinze amanota 16.
Undi mukino wahuje REG BBC na Tigers BBC, REG itratsinzwe umukino n’umwe kuva shampiyona yatangira uza kurangira ikomeje aka gahigo ko kudatsindwa yuzuza imikino 10 nyuma yo gustinda Tigers amanota 73-57.
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu, REG BBC irakina na UR-CMHS BBC mu gihe Patriots BBC izakina na Tigers BBC ejo ku Cyumweru.
 
      
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Benediction Ignite yahize kwegukana Tour du Rwanda 2020
Body:
Mu gihe habura amasaha make ngo Tour du Rwanda 2020 itangire, Benediction Ignite nk’imwe mu makipe ahagarariye u Rwanda muri iri siganwa berekanye abakinnyi batanu bazakoresha, umutoza w’iyi kipe Sempoma Flex avuga ko biteguye gutwara irushanwa.
Umutoza wa Benediction Sempoma Felix, yatangaje ko uyu mwaka ikipe ye ihagaze neza, kuko imyitozo bakoze mbere y’isiganwa itanga ikizere, bakaba binjiranye intego yo kwegukana iri siganwa n’ubwo azi neza ko n’andi makipe na yo yiteguye neza kandi na bo intego ari ukwegukana isiganwa.
Ati “Ikizere nabaha ni uko abakinnyi bange biteguye neza Kandi twiteguye kuyikina bitari ku nshuro ya mbere. Umwaka ushize amakosa twakoze twarayabonye tugiye kubikosora. 
Ni isiganwa rizamuka ariko abakinnyi bange bagiye banyura muri zimwe mu nzira zigize isiganwa bityo rero dufite ikizere ko tuzitwara neza.”
Sempoma yavuze ko kuri we agace ka Huye Rusizi ari ko gashobora kuzamugora kubera ko hari ahantu hazamuka cyane hahita hakurikirwa n’’ahamanuka cyane aho abakinnyi batazi kuzamuka bashobora kwisanga basizwe iminota myinshi.
 
Abakinnyi bazaserukira u Rwanda:
Team Rwanda: Mugisha Samuel, Areruya Joseph, Nsengimana Jean Bosco, Uwizeye Jean Claude na Gahemba Barnabe.
Benediction Ignite Team:  Munyaneza Didier, Uhiriwe Byiza Renus, Nzafashwanayo Jean Claude, Manizabayo Eric na Byukusenge Patrick.
SACA Team: Mugisha Moise, Hakizimana Seth, Habimana Jean Eric, Nsengiyumva Shemu na Dukuzumuremyi Ally.
