26 Gashyantare 2020: Rusizi-Rubavu: 206, 3 Km
27 Gashyantare 2020: Rubavu-Musanze: 84, 7 Km
28 Gashyantare 2020: Musanze-Muhanga: 127, 3 Km
29 Gashyantare 2020: Kigali-Kigali: 4, 5 Km
1 Werurwe 2020: Kigali Expo Ground-Rebero: 89, 3 Km

Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Masai ngo urukundo akunda P.Kagame rwatumye azana Giants of Africa Festival mu Rwanda
Body:
Umuyobozi w’icyubahiro wa Toronto Raptors ikina Shampiyona ya Basketball muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (NBA), Masai Ujiri washinze Giants of Africa yavuze ko icyatumye iserukiramuco ry’Umukino wa Basketball rizwi nka Giants of Africa Festival arizana mu Rwanda ari uko ari igihugu kiyobowe n’umuperezida akunda.
Iri serukiramuco rizaba kuva tariki ya 16-22 Kanama 2020, rikazabera i Kigali mu mikino y’abakiri bato bafite impano mu bihugu 11 byaAfrica.
Masai Ujiri yashimiye u Rwanda rwemeye kwakira ririya serukiramuco avuga ari umwanya urubyuruko rubonye ngo ruganire ku Mico y’ibihugu bitandukanye byo muri Africa.
Ati “Ni iby’agaciro kuba urubyiruko rwa Africa rufite imyitwarire myiza, tugerageza gushaka uburyo bwose bwafasha uru rubyuruko ngo rukure neza, twizera ko GOA (Giants of Africa) itagomba kubafasha gusa muri Basketball ahubwo igomba kubafasha mu Burezi, Umuco, Imyidagaduro ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa byose bifitanye isano na Siporo tubafasha kwibumbira hamwe.”
Yavuze ko icyamuteye guhitamo kuzana iri serukiramuco mu Rwanda ari ukuba yiyumvamo Perezeda w’u Rwanda, Paul Kagame.
Ati “Nakunze Perezida Paul Kagame turavugana buri gihe iyo yemeye ikintu aragikora, yaravuze ngo ngye kubaka Arena ahita ayubaka, ni yo mpamvu rero nange ngeraza kumwigiraho mu byo nkora.”
Ngo kiriya gikorwa kizatuma urubyiruko ruzakitabira rusangizanya byinshi birimo amateka y’umugabane wabibarutse.
Ati “Ibaze nawe umwana w’umukobwa cyangwa umuhungu waturutse mu Somali ari kugamira n’uwaturutse muri Nigeria cyangwa uwavuye Kenya, Senegal, Cameroon baganira n’uwo mu Rwanda ku mateka y’uyu mugabane, akenshi usanga ababa bana bazi umuco w’ibihugu bavukamo gusa. Bizaba bishimishije kubona aba bana baganira bungurana ibitekerezo.”
Avuga ko icyatumye ashinga uriya mushinga ‘Giants of Africa’ ari ibyo yakuriyemo mu gihugu k’iwabo muri Nigeria .
Masai wavukiye Zaria muri Leta ya Kaduna muri Nigeria mu 1970, avuga ko ubuzima yakuriyemo butamworoherezaga kuzamura impano ye kandi ko ibibazo nk’ibi biri mu bihugu byose muri Africa.
Uyu mushinga ‘Giants Of Africa’ watangiye muri 2003 ukorera muri Nigeria, muri 2014 Masai atangira kuwukwirakwiza no mu bindi bihugu birimo n’u Rwanda.
Iri serukiramuco ritegerejwe i Kigali rizahuza ibihugu 11 aribyo; u Rwanda, Kenya, Nigeria, Uganda, Senegal, Mali, DR Congo, South Sudan, Tanzania, Cameroon  na Somalia.
Photos © Kigali Today
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: U Rwanda rwagumye ku mwanya wa 131 ku rutonde rwa FIFA
Body:
Ikipe y’u Rwanda ‘Amavubi’ yagumye ku mwanya wa 131 ku rutonde ngarukakwezi rushyirwa hanze n’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Isi (FIFA).
U Rwanda ruje ku mwanya wa 131 ku Isi mu gihe ruri ku mwanya wa 36 ku mugabane wa Africa n’amanota 1 089 ari na yo rwari rufite mu kwezi gushize.
Uru rutonde ngarukakwezi rwa FIFA, Amavubi ari ku mwanya wa 131 muri Mutarama, mu gihe nta mukino n’umwe rwakinnye muri uku kwezi.
Muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, Uganda ni yo iri mbere ku mwanya wa 77 ku Isi n’amanota 1 321, Kenya iri ku mwanya wa 107, Tanzania iri ku mwanya wa 134, irarushwa n’u Rwanda amanota atatu, u Burundi buri ku mwanya wa 149.
U Bubiligi, u Bufaransa na Brazil byagumye ku myanya itatu ya mbere, u Bwongereza buri ku mwanya wa Kane, Uruguay ku mwanya wa Gatanu, Portugal ku wa karindwi, Espagne ku wa munani, Argentine ku wa cyenda naho Colombia iri ku wa 10.
Ibihugu 10 bya mbere muri Africa ni: Senegal (ya 20 ku Isi), Tunisia (27), Nigeria (31), Algérie (35), Maroc (43), Ghana (46), Misiri (51) Cameroun (53), Mali (56) na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (56).
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Siporo n’imyidagaduro bishobora gucira inzira urubyiruko rwa Africa bakaba ibihangange- P.Kagame
Body:
Perezida Kagame Paul wamuritse iserukiramuco ry’Ibihangange bya Africa (Giants of Africa) mu mukino w’amaboko Basketball rizaba muri Kanama uyu mwaka, yavuze ko Siporo, umuco n’imyidagaduro bicira inzira urubyiruko rwo muri Africa yo gukomeza kuba ibihangange.
Perezida Kagame wamuritse ku mugaragaro iri serukiramuco ‘Giants of Africa’ rizaba kuva tariki ya 16-22 Kanama 2020, yashimiye abashinze abanyafurika bashinze umuryango Giants of Africa bakinnye muri Shampiyona ya NBA barimo Masai Ujiri.
Ati “Mudutera ishema atari ku Rwanda gusa ahubwo ku mugabane wose kuba mwarakuye Giants of Africa [ibihangange bya Africa] mu bitekerezo mukayigira impamo.”
Perezida Paul Kagame usanzwe ari umukunzi w’umukino wa Basketball, avuga ko yishimira kuba ari umwe mu bari muri uru rugendo rwo kuzamura ibihangange bya Africa binyuze mu bikorwa binyuranye.
Ati “Yaba siporo, umuco, imyidagaduro n’ibindi byinshi, tubonamo inzira ifasha urubyiruko gukura ari ibihangange bakwiye kuba byo.”
Perezida Kagame yabwiye urubyiruko ko iyo bavuze ibihangange bya Africa ndetse n’iri serukiramuco rigiye kubera mu Rwanda, ari ibikorwa byo kubibutsa ko bazaba ibihangange ari uko babikoreye.
Ati “Bivuze ko hari akazi kenshi mugomba gukora kugira ngo mubyaza umusaruro amahirwe menshi mufite n’ayo mubona mu mugabane wacu.”
Umukuru w’Igihugu yavuze ko igikorwa nka Kiriya cy’iserukiramuco riri kubera mu Rwanda, ari ukwerekana ko Africa yifuza ko abana bayo bagera kuri ubwo buhangange babuharaniye.
Ati “Kandi nta kintu dushobora kugera tutagikoreye, tugomba kwizamurira ubushobozi ubwacu ubundi tugakora ibikenewe gukorwa by’umwahariko tugakoresha amahirwe duhawe nk’iri serukiramuco.”
Iri serukiramuco rizaba kugeza muri Kanama uyu mwaka, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko abaryitabiriye bazibonera ko u Rwanda ari igihugu cy’amahirwe, kikaba igihugu gishyize imbere gukora ibikebereye kandi bibereye umugabane wa Africa.
Perezida Kagame kandi yavuze hari igihe Abanyafurika bakagera aho bifuza kugera no ku byo bifuza kugeraho nk’uko bari mu rugendo rwo kubiharanira.
Iri serukiramuco rizitabirwa n’ibihugu 11 birimo n’u Rwanda ruzaryakira.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: TourDuRwanda2020: Amakipe ahagarariye u Rwanda yakoze imyitozo ya nyuma
Body:
Mu gihe habura iminsi ine ngo Tour du Rwanda itangire, abakinnyi bahagarariye u Rwanda muri iri rushanwa bakoze imyitozo ya nyuma kuri uyu wa gatatu bava i Rubavu berekeza i Musanze.
Abakinnyi ba Team Rwanda bazaba bayobowe na Mugisha Samuel wegukanye Tour du Rwanda iheruka.
Andi makipe akinwamo n’Abanyarwanda ni SACA izaba iyobowe na Mugisha Moise ndetse na Benediction Ignite izaba iyobowe na Munyaneza Didier bakunda kwita “Mbape”.
Tour du Rwanda izitabirwa n’amakipe 16 azaturuka ku migabane yose y’Isi. Ikipe 13  muri ziriya, zirimo byibura umukinnyi umwe wegukanye isiganwa rimwe ry’amagare, ahantu runaka.
Team Rwanda ni yo izaba ifite abakinnyi benshi (4) bigeze kweguka isiganwa ry’amagare.
 
Inzira Tour du Rwanda izanyuramo:
Ku Cyumweru tariki ya 23 Gashyantare 2020-Kigali Arena-Kimironko 114,4km
Ku wa Mbere tariki ya 24 Gashyantare 2020-Kigali Mic- Huye 120, 5 km
Ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 25 Gashyantare 2020-Huye- Rusizi: 142,3KM
Ku wa Gatatu tariki ya 26 Gashyantare 2020-Rusizi- Rubavu: 206,3km
Ku wa Kane tariki ya 27 Gashyantare 2020-Rubavu-Musanze 84,7KM
Ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 28 Gashyantare 2020-Musanze-Muhanga 127.3km
Ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 01 Werurwe 2020-Nyamirambo-Mur de Kigali 4.7 Km (Contre la montre individuelle)
Ku Cyumweru tariki ya 02 Werurwe 2020-Kigali Expo Ground-Rebero 89, 3 Km
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: FERWAFA yemereye Gicumbi FC kwakira imikino kuri Stade yayo
Body:
Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA) ryemereye ikipe ya Gicumbi FC kwakirira imikino kuri stade yayo yari imaze igihe iri gusanwa nyuma yo guhagarikwa kubera ko yari yarangiritse.
Ubuyobozi bwa Gicumbi FC bwari bwabwiye Umuseke ko imirimo yo gusana iriya Stade isa nk’iyarangiye ikaba imaze gutwara miliyoni 38 Frw.
Urayeneza John uyobora iyi kipe y’akarere ka Gicumbi, yari yabwiye Umuseke ko FERWAFA yagombaga kuza gusura iriya Stade ejo hashize tariki ya 18 Gashyantare 2020 ndetse koko akanama gashinzwe iby’ibibuga kagiyeyo.
Ibaruwa ya FERWAFA ivuga ko raporo yakozwe na kariya kanama kasuye kiriya kibuga, igaragaza ko kiriya kibuga cyujuje ibisabwa ku buryo noneho ubu cyakwakira imikino.
Iyi baruwa yashyizweho umukono n’Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa FERWAFA, Uwayezu Regis, igira iti “Tunejejwe no kubandikira iyi baruwa tugira ngo tubamenyeshe ko ikibuga cyanyu cyemejwe akaba ari cyo muzajya mwakiriraho imikino yanyu y’amarushanwa yateguwe na FERWAFA.”
Gicumbi FC yari imaze iminsi yakirira imikino yayo kuri Stade ya Mumena I Nyamirambo mu mujyi wa Kigali, abakunzi bayo ba hariya i Gicumbi bavugaga ko bakumbuye kuyireba kuko batabashaga kujya kuyishyigikira i Kigali ndetse ko biri mu byatumaga ikomeje kwitwara nabi.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Stade Amahoro ishobora kwakira Finale ya CAF Champions League
Body:
Perezida w’Impuzamashyirahamwe y’Umupira w’Amaguru muri Afurika, Ahmad Ahmad; Visi Perezida wa CAF, Constant Omari n’Umunya-Cameroun, Samuel Eto’o bagiranye ibiganiro na Perezida Paul Kagame mu mpera z’icyumweru twasoje, amakuru avuga ko mu byo baganiriyeho harimo no kuba umukino wa nyuma wa CAF Champions League wazabera muri Sitade Amahoro.
Ku wa gatandatu tariki ya 15 Gashyantare, Ahmad Ahmad n’igihangange Samuel Eto’ basuye u Rwanda, bukeye ku cyumweru bari i Gabiro ubwo Perezida Paul Kagame yatangizaga Umwiherero w’Abayobozi Bakuru, ndetse nyuma yaje guhura na bo baraganira.
Aba bayobozi bagize umwanya wo gusura Stade Amahoro mu rwego rwo gusuzuma niba yujuje ibisabwa kugira ngo ibe yakwakira umukino wa nyuma wa CAF Champions League wa 2019/2020 uteganyijwe kuba muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka.
Ahmad Ahmad; Visi Perezida wa CAF, Constant Omari na Samuel Eto’o ikinyamakuru Africasports.net kivuga ko bimwe mu byo baganiriye na Paul Kagame harimo kuba u Rwanda rwazakira Finale ya CAF Champions League w’uyu mwaka.
Muri Nyakanga 2019 CAF yemeje impinduka mu buryo imikino ya nyuma ya CAF Champions League na CAF Confederation Cup yakinwagamo, muri uyu mwaka no mu izakurikira, umukino wa nyuma uzaba umwe aho kuba ibiri ubanza n’uwo kwishyura, kandi umubere ku kibuga cyatoranyijwe.
Mu mpinduka nshya byari byatangajwe ko ibihugu bya Misiri, Gabon, Sudani, Maroc na Afurika y’Epfo bifite amahirwe yo kwakira umukino wa nyuma wa Champions League.
Ikemezo cya nyuma ku mujyi uzakira uriya mukino cyagombaga gutangazwa ku wa 9 Gashyantare 2020.
Kugeza ubu iri rushanwa rigeze muri ¼, risigayemo amakipe ya Al Ahly (Misiri), Zamalek SC (Misiri), TP Mazembe (RDC), ES Tunis (Tunisie), Raja Casablanca (Maroc), Wyadad Casablanca (Maroc), Étoile du Sahel (Tunisie) na Mamelodi Sundwons (Afurika y’Epfo).
Tariki ya 28 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo hazakinwa imikino ibanza muri ¼ mu gihe umukino wa nyuma uteganyijwe tariki ya 29 Gicurasi 2020, ushobora kubera mu Rwanda nk’uko Africasports.net.
Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa FERWAFA, Uwayezu Regis yabwiye Umuseke ko ibyavuye mu biganiro bariya bayobozi ba CAF bagiranye n’abashinzwe umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda bizatangazwa mu minsi iri imbere.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Ubucuti mfitanye n’Amavubi ntibuzakora mu kibuga – McKinstry utoza Uganda
Body:
Umutoza wa Uganda Jonathan ‘Johnny” McKinstry wahoze atoza u Rwanda yatangaje ko yakiriye neza kujya mu itsinda rimwe n’u Rwanda, ngo ni ikipe azi kurusha izindi z’ibihugu bya Africa. Yavuze ko mu kibuga ubucuti asanganywe n’abakinnyi b’Amavubi nta cyo buzayafasha.
 
Tombola y’uko amakipe azahura mu mikino ya nyuma y’irushanwa ry’abakinnyi bakina imbere mu bihugu byabo (CHAN 2020) rizabera muri Cameroon muri Mata, Amavubi yisanze mu itsinda rikomeye cyane rya gatatu “C” hamwe na Morocco, Uganda na Togo.
McKinstry wahoze atoza u Rwanda ubu akaba ari umutoza wa Uganda Cranes yatangaje ko nta kipe y’igihugu azi neza nk’u Rwanda kandi afitanye umubano mwiza n’abakinnyi b’Amavubi.
Ati “Muri Africa nta kipe nzi neza kurusha u Rwanda. Abakinnyi benshi (baba abo mu ikipe nkuru cyangwa iya CHAN) ntabwo bankiniye ariko nijye wabahamagaye bwa mbere.”
Akomeza avuga ko hari umubano afitanye na bo, ariko iminota 90 y’umukino ngo izarangwa no guhangana.
Ati “Ndizera ko dufite icyo bisaba cyose kugira ngo tubone amanota yose, atari ku Rwanda gusa ahubwo no kuri Maroc.”
Johnny McKinstry ni we mutoza wagejeje Amavubi kure muri CHAN mu nshuro eshatu amaze kuyikina. Mu irushanwa ryari ryakiriwe n’u Rwanda mu 2016, yagejeje Amavubi muri ¼, asezererwa na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo atsinzwe 2-1.
Umukino wa mbere u Rwanda ruzahura na Uganda kuri Stade de la Réunification, i Douala. Umukino wa kabiri Amavubi azakina na Morocco, usoza amatsinda u Rwanda ruzakina na Togo.
Amakipe abiri azaza mu myanya ya mbere ni yo azakomeza mu mikino ya 1/4.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: CHAN2020: u Rwanda rwongeye gutombola Uganda mu itsinda C
Body:
Tombola y’amatsinda mu gikombe cya Africa gihuza abakinnyi bakina imbere mu bihugu (CHAN 2020) kizakinirwa muri Cameroun, u Rwanda ruri mu itsinda C kumwe na Uganda, Morocco na Togo.
Irushanwa rizatangira gukinwa guhera tariki ya 4-25 Mata 2020.
Tombola yabaye ku masaha y’umugoroba kuri uyu wa mbere tariki ya 17 Gashyantare 2020, mu Ngoro y’Imikino iri i Yaoundé muri Cameroun.
Yari iyobowe na Samson Adamu ushinzwe amarushanwa muri CAF, u Rwanda rukaba ruri mu itsinda C ririmo Uganda, Morocco na Togo.
Umukino ufungura irushanwa uzaba tariki ya 5 Mata uhuze Cameroon na Zimbabwe.
U Rwanda rwakiriye CHAN 2016, rugiye gukina iri rushanwa ku nshuro ya gatatu yikurikiranya ndetse n’iya kane muri rusange nyuma yo kwitabira CHAN 2011 yabereye muri Sudan.
Mu nshuro eshatu Amavubi amaze gukina iri rushanwa, inshuro imwe nibwo yarenze amatsinda, asezererwa na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ku bitego 2-1 muri ¼ cya CHAN 2016 yabereye mu Rwanda.
Mu kwitegura irushanwa ry’uyu mwaka, u Rwanda ruzakina imikino ibiri ya gicuti na Cameroun (tariki ya 24 Gashyantare) na Congo Brazzaville (tariki ya 28 Gashyantare).
Muri Mutarama Ikipe y’igihugu y’u Rwanda na bwo yatombe Uganda, Kenya na Mali mu zizahurira mu itsinda E mu gashikisha itike yo kujya mu gikombe k’Isi kizabera muri Qatar muri 2022.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: TourDuRwanda2020: Batanu bagize Team Rwanda bamenyekanye n’imyenda bazakinana
Body:
Umuhango wabereye ku kicaro k’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umukino w’Amagare “FERWACY”, umutoza w’ikipe y’u Rwanda,  Magnell Sterling yerekanye abakinnyi 5 bazahagararira u Rwanda muri Tour du Rwanda ya 2020, ndetse bangaragaza imyambaro yabo.
 
Tour du Rwanda izaba ikinwa ku nshuro ya 12 kuva mu 2009, ubwo yabaga mpuzamahanga yemejwe n’impuzamashyirahamwe y’uyu mukino ku rwego rw’Isi (UCI), ndetse n’inshuro ya kabiri irushanwa rizakina riri ku rwego rwa 2.1.
Aba bakinnyi bagize Team Rwanda bayobowe na Mugisha Samuel, ni we Munyarwanda uheruka kwegukana Tour du Rwanda. Kuba yaratangiranye n’umutoza mu myitozo yitegura iri rushanwa kuva tariki ya 1 Ugushyingo 2019, ngo bizafasha uyu musore kuyobora bagenzi be neza.
Mu bandi bakinnyi bari muri Team Rwanda uyu mwaka, ni Gahemba Bernabe ni we ukiri muto kurusha abandi akaba ari n’ubwa mbere agiye gukina iri siganwa.
Harimo Uwizeye Jean Claude wegukanye umwanya wa kabiri muri Tour du Rwanda 2018, Nsengimana Jean Bosco watwaye iri siganwa muri 2015 na Areruya Joseph waritwaye muri 2017.
Staff Technique ya Team Rwanda:
Igizwe n’umutoza wa Team Rwanda, Magnell Sterling, Umukanishi Maniriho Eric na Ruvogera Obed umuganga.
Dore inzira za Tour du Rwanda 2020:
23 Gashyantare 2020: Kigali Arena-Kimironko: 114, 4 Km
24 Gashyantare 2020: Kigali-Huye: 120,5 Km
25 Gashyantare 2020: Huye-Rusizi: 142,0 Km
26 Gashyantare 2020: Rusizi-Rubavu: 206,3 Km
27 Gashyantare 2020: Rubavu-Musanze: 84,7 Km
28 Gashyantare 2020: Musanze-Muhanga:127,3 Km
29 Gashyantare 2020: Kigali-Kigali: 4,5 Km
1 Werurwe 2020: Kigali Expo Ground-Rebero: 89,3 Km
  
AMAFOTO@ KUBWAYO Adrien
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Peace Cup: APR FC izahura na Kiyovu Sports, Rayon na Mukura muri 1/8
Body:
Amakipe yamaze kumenya uko azahura muri 1/8 k’irangiza mu gikombe cy’Amahoro, APR FC izakura na Kiyovu SC naho Rayon Sports ikine na Mukura VS.
Tombola ya 1/8 yabereye ku Kicaro k’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amagaru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA).
Igikombe cy’Amahoro ni irushanwa ngarukamwaka rigiye rikinwa ku nshuro ya 38, ryitabirwa n’amakipe akina ikiciro cya mbere ndetse n’icya kabiri cya Shampiyona y’u Rwanda.
Imikino ya 1/8  ibanza yari iteganyijwe kuba tariki 19 – 20 Gashyantare 2020, iyo kwishyura ikaba tariki  2 – 3 Werurwe 2020, ariko bihuriranye n’imikino ya gicuti y’ikipe y’Igihugu (Amavubi).
Biteganijwe ko iyi mikino y’igikombe cy’Amahoro izakomeza nyuma y’imikino ya gishuti y’Amavubi iteganijwe mu mpera za Gashyantare ndetse n’imikino ya CHAN izaba mu ntangiriro za Mata 2020.
Amatariki nyirizina azatangazwa mu gihe kiri imbere.
Umukino wo guhatanira umwanya wa gatatu, ndetse n’umukino wa nyuma w’Irushanwa ry’Igikombe cy’Amahoro, izakinwa tariki 13 Kamena 2020, hazaba hamenyekanye ikipe izahagararira u Rwanda muri Total CAF Confederation Cup.

Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Gusana Stade ya Gicumbi bimaze gutwara miliyoni 38 Frw…Abafana bakumbuye kureba ruhago
Body:
Imirimo yo gusana Stade ya Gicumbi irarimbanyije ikaba imaze gutwara asaga miliyoni 38 Frw. Abakunzi b’umupira w’amaguru muri kariya karere by’umwihariko abakunda Gicumbi FC barasaba ko imikino igaruka kuko bakumbuye kubona amacenga y’ikipe yabo.
 
Iyi stade isanzwe ari iy’Ikipe ya Gicumbi FC y’akarere, yari imaze iminsi ikinira imikino yayo [yasuwemo] kuri stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo nyuma y’uko FERWAFA ihagarikiye kiriya kibuga cyari cyarangiritse bikabije.
By’umwihariko ikibuga k’iriya kipe cyari cyarangiritse cyane kirimo ibinogo ndetse n’igisenge cy’ahari hasakaye cyaratwawe.
Ubuyobozi bwa Gicumbi FC bwahise butangira gusana iriya stade, ubu imirimo irarimbanyije ndetse ngo bizeye ko nihakorwa isuzuma bazahita bakomorerwa kwakira imikino kuko ibyo basabwe gukora bisa nk’ibyarangiye.
Umuyobozi wa Gicumbi FC, Urayeneza John avuga ko akanama kazakora igenzura kazajyayo ejo tariki ya 18 Gashyantare 2020.
Gusa igice cyari gisakaye, ubu ntibaragisakara ariko Urayeneza John amara impungenge abafana.
Ati “Nitumara kwemererwa kwakira amakipe inaha, mu gihe tuzajya dukina hazaba hari amahema ku buryo nta kibazo cyo kunyagirwa kizabaho, ndetse ikipe niyemererwa  gukinira inaha hari imbaraga bizayongerera cyane.”
Iyi stade yasanwe n’akarere, ngo kamaze gukoresha arenga miliyoni 38 Frw mu mirimo yo kuyisana.
Abakunzi b’umupira w’amaguru by’umwihariko b’ikipe ya Gicumbi FC bavuga ko bakumbuye kureba ikipe yabo kuko aho yakiniraga i Kigali itapfaga kubona abaza kuyishyigikira.
Egide Mutimucyeye ufana Gicumbi FC, avuga ko ubu batazi n’amakuru y’ikipe yabo gusa bakababaza n’uko ikomeje gutsindwa ariko ko biterwa no kuba itakibona abafana baza kuyishyigikira mu mikino yayo.
Ati  “Abenshi ntibazi n’abakinnyi ifite, ikina nta morari, nigaruka inaha bizatuma idasubira mu kiciro cya kabiri.”
Evence NGIRABATWARE
UMUSEKE.RW/GICUMBI

Title: Sunrise ITSINZE Rayon Sports 2-0
Body:
Imikino ya shampiyona yo ku munsi wa 20 isize Rayon Sports itakaje amanota atutu nyuma yo gutsindwa na Sunrise 2-0, APR FC itsinda AS Muhanga 2-0.
Ni imikino y’umunsi wa 20 wa Shampiyona yakomezaga kuri Sitade ya Kigali Rayon Sports yari yakiriye Sunrise FC naho AS Muhanga yakinaga na APR FC I Muhanga.
Rayon Sports yagiye gukina uyu mukino isha amanota atatu ngo igabanye ikinyuranyo cy’amanota ari hagati yayo na APR iyoboye urutode rwa shampiyona.Umukino ubanza Sunrise yari yatsinze Rayon Sports 2-1.
Ku isaha ya saa Sacyenda (15H00’) imbere y’abakunzi ba Rayon Sports bari buzuye sitade ya Kigali umukino waje gutangire.
Ni umukino amakipe yose yatangiye asatirana ashaka kubona insinzi hakiri kare. Ku munota wa 14’Sunrise yabonye igitego cyatsinzwe na Niyibizi Vedaste nyuma y’umupira waturutse ku ruhande rw’ibumoso Wangi Pius arawusimbuka Vedaste ahita atsinda igitego cya mbere.
Ku munota wa 19’ Rayon Sports yashoboraga kubona igitego nyuma y’ikosa ryakorewe Drissa Dangnogo mu rubuga rw’amahina umusifuzi atanga Penali Rugwiro Herve ayiteye Nsabimana Jean de Dieu umunyezamu wa Sunrise umupira awukuramo.
Igice cya mbere cyarangiye Sunrise iri imbere 1-0. Mu gice cya kabiri Rayon Sports yagarutse isatira izamu rya Sunrise aho yabonye uburyo butatu mu minota 10’ ya mbere bwashoboraga kuvamo igitego.
Ku munota wa 60’ Rayon Sports yakoze impinduka ebyeri Sekamana Maxime na Ciza Hussein basimburwa na Ernest Sugira hamwe Mugisha Gilbert bakunda barafinda. Sunrise yakoze impinduka Ndatimana Robert asimbura Niyibizi Vedaste.
Ku munota wa 70’ Sunrise yabonye igitego cya kabiri cyatsinzwe na Babuwa Samson nyuma yo gucenga ba myugariro ba Rayon Sports atera ishoti mu izamu Kimenyi Yves afashe umupira uramucika uruhukira mu rucundura.
Iminota 90’ yarangiye umusifuzi yongeraho iminota itanu, umukino urangira Rayon Sports itsinzwe na Sunrise 2-0, uba umukino wa mbere Kilasa Alain atsinzwe kuva yatangira gutoza iyi kipe.
APR FC yatsinze AS Muhanga ibitego bibiri ku busa ishyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’Amanota 7 hagati yayo na Rayon Sports.
 Abakinnyi babanje mu kibuga ku mpande zombi:
Rayon Sports : Kimenyi Yves (GK.1), Iradukunda Eric Radou 14, Eric Rutanga Alba 3, Rugwiro Herve 4, Kayumba Soter 15, Ally Niyonzima 28, Mugheni Kakule Fabrice 27, Cyiza Hussein Mugabo 10, Sekamana Maxime 24, Drissa Dagnogo 18 na Bizimana Yannick 23.
Sunrise FC: Nsabimana Jean de Dieu Shaulin (GK30), Nzayisenga Jean d’Amour Mayor 22, Niyonshuti Gad Evra 3, Mushimiyimana Regis 4, Kyiza Ibrahim Ayubu 15, Uwambajima Leon Kawunga (C 6), Mugabo Emmy 11 , Babuwa Samson 17, Wangi Pius 19, Twagirimana Innocent Kavatari 8 naNiyibizi Vedaste 10.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Zamalek yegukanye ‘CAF Super Cup’ itsinze Espérance de Tunis
Body:
Zamalek yo mu Misiri yegukanye igikombe kiruta ibindi muri Afurika “CAF Super Cup” nyuma yo gutsinda Espérance Sportive de Tunis yo muri Tunisia ibitego 3-1 mu mukino wabereye kuri Stade Thani Bin Jassim muri Qatar.
Igikombe kiruta ibindi ‘CAF Super Cup’2020, gihuza ikipe yatwaye CAF Champions League (Espérance) ndetse n’iyatwaye CAF Confederation Cup (Zamalek SC) mu mwaka w’imikino ushize, CAF ikaba yarahisemo ko uyu mukino kubera muri  Qatar.
Zamalek yatangiye umukino neza kuko yafunguye amazamu hakiri kare ubwo ku munota wa kabiri Mohamed Abdel-Shafy yatsindaga igitego cya mbere, ku mupira wari uvuye kuri  Youssef Obama.
Iyi kipe yo mu bwami bwa Pharaoh yakomeje gukina neza, inahusha uburyo bwinshi bw’ibitego, ku munota wa 16 ndetse na 25 Moustafa Mohamed yashoboraga gutsinda  igitego cya kabiri ariko umupira uca hejuru y’izamu.
Mu gice cya kabiri, Espérance de Tunis yahinduye umukino ndetse ibona penaliti yinjijwe neza na Abdelraouf Bengiut nyuma y’uko ikoranabuhanga rya VAR rigaragaje ko El Wensh yakoze umupira ari mu rubuga rw’amahina.
Nyuma y’imino itatu, Zamalek yongeye kuyobora umukino itsindiwe igitego cya kabiri na Achraf Bencharki wanatsinze ikindi igitego cyashimangiye intsinzi y’Abanya-Misiri ku munota wa gatanu muri itandatu y’inyongera.
Gutsinda uyu mukino byatumye Zamalek SC yegukana Igikombe cya Super Cup ku nshuro ya kane mu gihe icyo yaherukaga yagitwaye mu 2003.
Zamalek yahawe igikombe inahabwa ibahasha irimo ibihumbi 200$ mu gihe Esperance de Tunis yahawe ibihumbi 150$.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Samuel Eto’o na Perezida wa CAF, Ahmad Ahmad bari mu Rwanda
Body:
Samuel Eto’o Fils igihangnge mu mupira w’amaguru, haba muri Cameroun, muri Africa no ku Isi ari mu ruzinduko mu Rwanda, na Ahmad Ahmad Perezida w’Impuzamashyirahamwe y’umupira w’amaguru muri Africa (CAF).
Eto’o wahoze ari umukinnyi w’umupira w’Amaguru ku rwego mpuzamahanga, by’umwihariko akaba yarakinnye mu makipe akomeye i Burayi ari mu Rwanda na Ahmad bakazagirana ibiganiro n’abafite aho bahuriye n’Umupira w’Amaguru Rwanda kugira ngo u Rwanda ruzakire igikombe cya Africa cya 2026.
Ibiganiro n’abafite umupira mu nshingano bizaba kuri iki Cyumweru.
Twagerageje kuvugana n’umunyamabanga w’ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda, (FERWAFA) Uwayezu Regis atubwira ko ahuze.
Eto’o yakiniye Cameroun imikino 118 atsinda ibitego 56, yasoje umupira w’amaguru nk’umukinnyi mpuzamahanga mu ikipe ya Antalyaspor aho yanatozaga akina.
Samuel Eto’o Fils yakiniye FC Barcelona, Inter Milan, Anzhi Makhachkala, Chelsea, Everton, Sampdoria, Antalyaspor na Konyaspor.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Perezida Kagame yahuye na Mashami Vincent mbere yo kugirwa umutoza w’Amavubi
Body:
Umutoza w’ikipe y’Igihugu, Amavubi Mashami Vincent yavuze ko yabonanye na Perezida wa Repubulika y’u Rwanda Paul Kagame baganira ku iterambere ry’ikipe y’igihugu, avuga hari inama yabagiriye zizabafasha mu minsi iri mbere.
Amakuru yo kubonana hagati y’Umutoza Mashami Vincent na Perezida wa Repubulike yagiye hanze ubwo umutoza Mashami yari hafi guhabwa akazi ko gutoza Amavubi.
Bamwe baje gutangaza ko kiri no mu byatumye ahabwa akazi mu gihe ubuyobozi bwa FERWAFA bwatangazaga ko ubushobozi bwe butamwemerera gukomeza gutoza Amavubi.
Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki 14 Gashyantare,  Mashami Vincent yavuze ko ari iby’agaciro kuganira n’Umukuru w’Igihugu ku iterembere ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda.
Ati “Nibyo koko nabonanye n’Umukuru w’Igihugu. Ni ishema, ni iby’agaciro kandi namushimira byimazeyo ko yaduhaye umwanya wo kubonana na we, ibyo twavuganye si ngombwa ko nabivugira hano.”
Umutoza Mashami avuga ko we na Perezida Paul Kagame “bagize ibiganiro byiza kandi byubaka.”
Ati “Hari inama yaduhaye, hari amasomo yaduhaye, hari inyunganizi kandi umuntu yabimushimira cyane kuko Perezida wa Repubulika arakurikirana, ndakeka ko nta kintu na kimwe atazi. Ni cyo kintu umuntu yakwishimira.”
Mashami Vincent yasinye amazereno y’umwaka umwe yo gutoza Amavubi, ahabwa inshingano zo kurenza Amavubi amatsinda mu mikino ya CHAN 2020, izatangira muri Mata 2020 ndetse no gufasha Amavubi kwitwara neza mu mikino yo gushaka itike y’Igikombe k’Isi.
Kwirukana Umutoza Mashami Vincent ngo kuko hari imikino yatsinzwe irimo uwa Cameroon yatsinzwemo i Kigali 1-0, ntabwo byavugwagaho rumwe mu bakurikirana umupira w’amaguru, kuko benshi babona ko n’undi wamusimbura nta gitangaza kirenze ibyo yakoze yazana mu ikipe y’Amavubi.
Mu kiraka cy’amezi atatu yari yahawe, yabashije kugeza u Rwanda mu mikino ya CHAN 2020 izabera muri Cameroon.
FERWAFA yahaye umutoza Mashami Vincent amasezerano yo gutoza Amavubi umwaka umwe.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: FERWAFA ku bihano yafatiye Rayon iciye inkoni izamba
Body:
Imyanzuro ya Komite y’ubujurire ku kibazo cya Rayon Sports n’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA) ku bihano ryayifatiye kubera kutitabira irushanwa ry’Ubutwari bikaza guteza impaka, imaze gutangazwa igaragagaramo guca inkoni izamba kuri bimwe muri byo.
Ibihano byafashwe ubwo Rayon Sports yangaga kwitabira irushanwa ry’Igikombe cy’Ubutwari2020, ku mpamvu zitavuzweho rumwe n’ubwo yo yasobanuraga ko ibyo yasabye abategura irushanwa bitahawe agaciro.
Komite y’Ubujurire igizwe n’abantu bane yemeje ibihano bishya bikuraho ibyo FERWAFA yari yafashe, yagumishijeho ihazabu ya Frw 300 000, ndetse no kudategura imikino ya gicuti mu kwezi kumwe.
Ibihano bya mbere byavugaga ko FERWAFA ishingiye ku ngingo ya 12 itegeka amakipe yose kwitabira amarushanwa yateguwe na yo uko yakabaye isanze,  ‘ari ngombwa guhanisha Rayon Sports kutitabira igikombe cy’Ubutwari cya 2021, kwishyura amafaranga y’u Rwanda ibihumbi 300 ndetse no kudakina umukino wa gicuti haba imbere mu gihugu ndetse no hanze yacyo mu gihe cy’amezi 12.’ 
Umuvugizi wa Rayon Sports, Jean Paul Nkurunziza, yabwiye Umuseke ko ikemezo cy’akanama k’ubujurire kakuyeho ibihano byfatiwe Rayon Sports ku kigero cya 95%, ngo ikipe yabibonye kandi amategeko yayirengeye.
Imyanzuro yafashwe kuri uyu wa 14 Gashyantare ivuga ko ibirimo byubahirizwa kuva aho ikipe ya Rayon Sports ibonera imyanzuro.
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Sugira yagarutse, Kilasa ni we mutoza w’Amavubi wungirije Mashami
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu nibwo hatangajwe abatoza b’Ikipe y’Igihugu ‘Amavubi’, batangira akazi mu minsi mike iri imbere ubwo u Rwanda ruzaba rukina imikino ibiri ya gicuti uwa Cameroun ndetse na Congo Brazzaville, Sugira Erneste yagarutse mu ikipe, naho Mashami azungirizwa na Alain Kilasa.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu mu kiganiro n’Abanyamakuru ku kicaro k’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA), Umutoza Mukuru w’Amavubi, Mashami Vincent yashimye abamugiriye ikizere.
Ati: ”Ndashima Imana, kandi ndashimira ubuyozi bwa Minisiteri ya Siporo na FERWAFA bangiriye ikizere.”
Mashami Vincent yemezwa nk’umutoza mukuru w’Amavubi, Kilasa Alain umutoza w’agatenyo wa Rayon Sports na Habimana Sosthène na bo bemejwe nk’abungiriza be, bazakorana na Niyitunze Jean Paul nk’uwongerera ingufu abakinnyi mu gihe umutoza w’abanyezamu ari Higiro Thomas.
Ikipe y’Igihugu izitabira imikino mpuzamahanga Nyafurika ihuza abakinnyi bakina imbere mu bihugu byabo (CHAN 2020) izabera muri Cameroun kuva tariki ya 4 -25 Mata 2020.
Amavubi y’abakina imbere afite imikino ibiri ya gicuti, uwa mbere na Cameroun i Yaoundé tariki ya 24 Gashyantare mu gihe undi uzakinirwa i Kigali tariki ya 28 Gashyantare 2020 bakina na Congo Brazzaville.
 
Abakinnyi 28 bahamagawe mu Mavubi:
Abanyezamu: Kimenyi Yves, Ndayishimiye Eric Bakame na Olivier Kwizera na Gahungu Habarurema
Ba myugariro: Manzi Thierry, Mutsinzi Ange, Aimable Nsabimana, Herve Rugwiro, Iradukunda Eric, Ombolenga Fitina, Eric Rutanga na Emmanuel Imanishimwe.
Abakina hagati: Nsabimana Eric, Ngendahimana Eric, Amran Nshimiyimana, Ally Niyonzima, Bukuru Christopher, Niyonzima Olivier Sefu, Manishimwe Djabel, Twizerimana Martin Fabrice na Dominique Savio Nshuti.
Ba Rutahizamu: Byiringiro Lague, Sugira Ernest, Danny Usengimana, Bertrand Iradukunda, Bizimana Yannick, Iyabivuze Ossee na Mico Justin.
Abatoza b’Amavubi: Mashami Vincent, Kilasa Alain, Habimana Sosthene naThomas Higiro.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: APR FC yujuje imyanya ya Komite z’abafana, uw’Umuvugizi wa Emile ntibawutoreye
Body:
Nyuma y’uko ubuyozi bwa APR FC butoye komite nshya y’abafana umwanya w’Umuvugizi w’abafana warimo Emile Kalinda uherutse guhagarikwa igihe kitazwi kubera amagambo mabi yavuze kuri Rayon Sports, ntiwashyizwemo umusimbura ashobora kuwugarukamo.
Ku Cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020, APR FC yahagaritse igihe kitazwi uwari Umuvugizi w’abafana Emile Kalinda, azira ubutumwa bwagiye hanze ku mbuga nkoranyambaga burimo “amagambo y’urwango mu Banyarwanda”.
Nyuma y’uko APR ihagaritse Emile Kalinda batangaje ko mu minsi mike bazereka abafana umusimbura we.
Ku wa kane tariki ya 13 Gashyantare 2020, ubuyobozi bw’abafana ba APR FC buyobowe na Rtd. Col. Kabagambe Geoffrey, bwakoze ivugurura mu buyobozi ndetse banuzuza imyanya itari ifite abayiyobora, uw’Umuvugizi w’abafana ntibawutoreye.
Umuhuzabikorwa w’abafana ba APR FC, RTD Col. Kabagambe yavuze ko bashyizeho Komite nshya kugira ngo buzuze imyanya itari ifite abayirimo.
Ati “Twakoze ivugurura mu buyobozi bw’abafana ndetse tunaboneraho kuzuza imyanya yari isanzwe iriho idafite abayiyobora, haba ku rwego rw’igihugu no ku rwego rw’Umujyi wa Kigali.”
Emile Kalinda agarutse ku mwanya w’ubuvugizi bw’abafana yaba ari inshuro ya kabiri, yigeze guhagarikwa azira amagambo muri Gicurasi 2017 yavuze ko APR FC itazemera gukomera amashyi Rayon Sports yari yatwaye Shampiyona uwo mwaka, nabwo yaje kongera gusubira mu mwanya we.
Ubundi yahagaritswe ni muri uyu mwaka wa 2020 ubwo yandikiranaga n’umuntu, agatuka abafana ba Rayon Sports, ndetse benshi bakabona ko imvugo ze zirimo amagambo ‘atanya Abanyarwanda”.
 
Komite shya y’Abafana ba APR FC:
Umuhuzabikorwa: RTD Col. Kabagambe
Umuhuzabikorwa wungirije: RTD Col. Ruzibiza
Ubukangurambaga no gukurikirana ibikorwa by’abafana: Songambere François
Umunyamabanga: Kirezi Nana Ozil
Ushinzwe imyitwarire y’abafana: Mariya Gahigi

Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Mugheni Fabrice yatowe nk’umukinnyi mwiza w’ukwezi muri Rayon Sports
Body:
Itsinda ry’abafana ba Rayon Sports rya Match Generation ku bafanye n’umufatanyabikorwa w’ikipe, ari we uruganda rwa Skol bahembye Mugheni Fabrice nk’umukinnyi mwiza w’ukwezi kwa Mutarama 2020.
Mugheni Fabrice ukina hagati mu kibuga muri Rayon Sports yahataniraga iki gihembo na rutahizamu Bizimana Yannick wagihawe inshuro ebyiri zikurikirana.
Nyuma yo gutwara igikombe cy’uwahizi abandi, Mugheni Fabrice yashimiye cyane abafana ba Rayon Sports basanze akwiye igihembo na bagenzi be bamufashije kubigeraho.
Ati ”Mbere na mbere ndashimira Imana, ndashimira abafana mwakoze cyane. Ndashimira kandi n’abakinnyi bagenzi bange bamfashije, kuko ntabwo nkora ndi umwe, dukora nk’ikipe. Mwarakoze cyane.”
Igihembo ngarukakwezi gitangwa n’abakunzi ba Rayon Sports gifite agaciro k’amafaranga ari hagati y’ibihumbi 100Frw n’ibihumbi 200Frw.
Ni igikorwa kiba buri kwezi mu rwego rwo gutera ingabo mu bitugu abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports bitwaye neza, hashishikarizwa n’abandi gukomeza kwitwara neza, ngo biha amahirwe ikipe kwitwara neza.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Byusa Wilson utoza Intare FC yemeza ko Sugira Ernest akenewe mu Ikipe y’Amavubi
Body:
Umutoza w’Intare FC Byusa Wilson uzwi nka Rudifu, yemeza ko Rutahizamu Sugira Erneste akenewe mu Ikipe y’Igihugu Amavubi izakina CHAN2020 igihe yakomeza kwitwara neza.
Sugira Erneste yatsinze igitego kimwe muri bibiri Rayon Sports yatsinze Intare FC iyisezerera mu gikombe cy’Amahoro.
Nyuma y’uyu mukino umutoza w’Intare FC, Byusa Wilson bakunda kwita Rudifu yavuze ko Sugira ari umukinnyi mwiza wagira icyo afasha Amavubi n’ubwo atagize igihe kinini cyo kumutoza.
Ati: “Sugira ni umukinnyi ufite ubwenge, wenda sinakubwira ngo muri APR FC yari ameze gutya, muri Rayon Sports ameze gute, jyewe nabonye bamunzanira mutoza amezi abiri gusa. Ariko arimo kuzamuka cyane, kandi nta ba Rutahizamu benshi dufite.
Nakomeza kuzamuka gutya ashobora gufasha ikipe y’iguhugu, jyewe nahitamo ko akomeza gutya, CHAN isanze ameze neza twaba dufite ba Rutahizamu nka babiri batatu bameze neza kandi arakenewe.”
Sugira Ernest ni umwe muri barutahizamu Amavubi agenderaho, yakomeje gufasha iyi kipe kwitwara neza mu mikino mpuzamahanga iheruka gukina.
Sugira yafashije u Rwanda  kubona  insinzi  enye mu marushanwa atandukanye  yikurikiranya aho mu gushaka itike y’igikombe k’Isi 2022 u  Rwanda rwasezereye Seychelles ku giteranyo k’ibitego 10-0 mu mikino mikino ibiri.
Yafashije u Rwanda kubona itike ya CHAN ku bitego bibiri yatsinze, kimwe cyo hanze muri Ethiopia ikindi mu Rwanda, ndetse mbere yaho yari yafashije u Rwanda gutsinda RD.Congo ibitego 3-2 mu mukino wa gicuti.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: ICY’AMAHORO: Rayon yasezereye Intare Sugira yongera gutsinda…Na APR yatsinze
Body:
Imikino y’igikombe cy’Amahoro yo kwishyura, Rayon Sports yatsinze Intare FC, Mukura Itsinda 3-2 Bugesera FC naho APR FC itsinda Etoile de l’EST 1-0.
Imikino ya nyuma itanu yo kwishyura yakinwaga kugira ngo hamenyekane ikipe zigera muri 1/8 zizahatanira igikombe.
Kuri stade ya Kicukiro, Rayon Sports yatsinze 2-0 Intare FC, umukino ubanza Rayon Sports yari yatsinze Intare 4-0, yagiye gukina uyu mukino yizeye ko yakomeje.
Rayon Sports yabonye igitego kihuse ku munota wa karindwi cyatsinzwe na Sugira Ernest utsinze igitego cya kabiri kuva yagera muri iyi kipe yatijwemo na mukeba wayo APR FC.
Ku munota wa 45’ Rayon Sports yabonye igitego cya kabiri cyatsinzwe na iragire Said. Igice cya mbere cyarangiye Rayon Sports iri imbere n’ibitego 2-0 ari na byo byabonetse muri uyu mukino.
Mu gice cya kabiri abakinnyi ba Intare FC bagarutse bakina neza bashaka kwishyura ibitego kugira ngo barebe ko ikipe yabo yazazamuka nk’iyatsinzwe neza kuko hagomba kuzamuka amakipe ane yatsinzwe neza.
Umukino warangiye Rayon Sports isezereye Intare FC Iyitsinze 6-0 mu mikino ibiri.
Mu yindi mikino, i Ngoma APR FC yatsinze Etoile de l’EST 1-0 cyatsinzwe na Nshimiyimana Yunusu mu gihe Mukura yatsinze 3-2 Bugesera FC.
Uko indi mikino yarangiye
Marines FC 3-0 Gorilla
Intare FC 0-2 Rayon Sports
Gicumbi FC 2-0 Rwamagana FC
Police FC 1-0 Musanze FC
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Ruhango yatangiye irushanwa ryo gushaka abazajya mu ikipe y’akarere y’amagare
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu taliki ya 12 Gashyantare 2020 hatangijwe amarushanwa agamije gushaka urubyiruko rufite impano mu mukino w’amagare kugira ngo binjire mu ikipe y’akarere igiye gutangizwa.
Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Ruhango buvuga ko nta kipe bwagiraga y’umukino w’amagare ibyo buvuga ko byagiraga ingaruka ku rubyiruko rufite impano yo gusiganwa ku magare ariko rutigeze rwitoza kugira ngo harebwe abashobora gufashwa kuzamura iyo mpano bafite.
Uyu munsi haje urubyiruko 48 rwakoze amarushanwa yo gusiganwa ku magare baturutse ku biro by’Umurenge wa Ruhango basorezwa mu Mujyi wa Ruhango rwagati.
Hakizimana Aimable wo mu Murenge wa Bweramana witabiriye iryo Jonjora, avuga aya marushanwa akwiye guhoraho kugira ngo n’urundi rubyiruko rubashe kubona amahirwe yo kugaragaza impano yarwo.
Yagize ati «Ku buryo natwe twaserukira u Rwanda ku rwego mpuzamahanga.»
Umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe amarushanwa n’amahugurwa mu ishyirahamwe ry’umukino w’amagare mu Rwanda (FERWACY), Nkuranga Alphonse avuga ko  kuba Akarere ka Ruhango katangije irushanwa ry’amagare ari igikorwa bakiriye neza, akavuga ko bagiye kubaha amagare yabugenwe bazajya bakoresha kugira ngo babe inzobere muri uyu mukino.
Ati «Muri FERWACY dufite gahunda y’uko duhereye hasi tuba dufite abakinnyi guhera ku myaka yo mike, kuba rero Ruhango yatangije iri siganwa ry’amagare bahereye ku rubyiruko ruri hagati y’imyaka 16 na 18 y’amavuko ni igikorwa cy’ingenzi dushima kandi tuzatera inkunga.»
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Ruhango, Habarurema Valens avuga ko aka karere kagomba guhagararira intara y’Amayepfo mu mukino w’amagare.
Yagize ati «Twifuza ko mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo Akarere ka Ruhango kagira umwihariko mu isiganwa ry’amagare, uyu munsi twifuzaga kumenya ko babishoboye tugiye kubashakira amagare ya Siporo.»
Urubyiruko 10 rwabashije gutsinda, bakaba bahembwe Amagare, Televiziyo, na Radio, mu gihe babiri ba mbere bemerewe kwiga amashuri y’imyuga n’ubumenyingiro ku buntu.
Aba babiri kandi FERWACY yabemereye ko izabajyana  kwihugurira i Musanze mu kigo abakinnyi b’ikipe y’Igihugu y’amagare basanzwe bahugurirwamo.
MUHIZI ELISEE
UMUSEKE.RW/Ruhango

Title: Kiyovu isigaranye amahirwe yo kuzamuka mu zatsinzwe bike mu Gikombe cy’Amahoro
Body:
Imikino y’Igikombe cy’Amahoro yo kwishyura yatangiye, kuri Stade ya Kigali, AS Kigali yatsinze Kiyovu SC 1-0, bisa n’aho amahirwe yo gukomeza mu irushanwa kuri Kiyovu Sports asigaye mu kuzamuka nk’ikipe yatsinzwe bike, irategereza hamenyekane uko izindi zizitwara.
Ni umukino watangiye ku isaha ya saa 15h00, umukino watangiye amakipe yombi asatirana, gutsinda igitego bikanga.
Ku munota wa 26’ Kiyovu Sports yashoboraga kubona igitego nyuma y’ishoti rikomeye ryatewe na Saba Robert umunyezamu wa AS Kigali, Bate Shamilu umupira awushyira muri koroneli bayite arawufata.
Iminota 45’ yarangiye umusifuzi yongeraho iminota ibiri ku munota wa 46’ Arotamal Alex yacenze ba myugariro ba Kiyovu SC, Munezero Fiston amutegera mu rubuga rw’umunyezamu umusifuzi ahita atanga penaliti.
Nsabimana Eric bakunda kwita Zidani umupira yawuteye neza atsinda igitego cya AS Kigali, biba 1-0.
Mu gice cya kabiri AS Kigali yakoze impinduka Kayitaba Bosco asimbura Sudi Abdullah naho Saba Robert nyuma yo kuvikana akajyanwa kwa muganga yasimbuwe na Nizeyima Jean Claude bakunda kwita Rutsiro.
Ku munota wa 71’ Bishira Latif yakoze umupira n’intoki mu rubuga rw’umuzamu umusifuzi avuga ko nta penaliti ihari, ikemezo cyakiriwe nabi n’abafana ba Kiyovu SC bari kuri Stade ya Kigali.
Ku munota wa 76’ Kiyovu yashoboraga kubona igitego cyo kwishyura nyuma y’umupira ba rutahizamu bayo bateye umunyezamu wa AS Kigali asohoka nabi ntiyawufata, Benedata Janvier awugarurira ku murongo.
Ku munota wa 80’ AS Kigali yakoze izindi mpinduka, Ntamuhanga Tumaini asimbura Arotamal Alex. Iminota ya nyuma AS Kigali yakinnye yugarira izamu ngo itishyurwa igitego yatsinze.
Iminota 90’ yarangiye umusifuzi wa kane Uwikunda Samuel yongeraho iminota itandatu, irangira AS Kigali itsinze Kiyovu SC mu Gikombe cy’Amahoro 1-0 gishobora gusezerera Kiyovu SC.
 
Abakinnyi 11 aya makipe yombi yakoresheje:
KIYOVU SC Xl: Nzeyirwanda Djihad , Serumogo Ally, Mutangana Derrick, Munezero Fiston, Mbonyingabo Regis, Tuyishime Benjamin , Hamidou, Twizeyimana Martin Fabrice, Armel Ghislain na Saba Robert.
AS Kigali Xl: Bate Shamilu, Rusheshangoga Michel, Ishimwe Christian, Bishira Latif, Rurangwa Moss, Kalisa Rashid, Nsabimana Eric Zidane, Ndekwe Felix, Arotamal Alex, Sudi Abdullah na Benedata Janvier.

 
   
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Rayon yajuririye ibihano yahawe na FERWAFA
Body:
Ubuyobozi bw’ikipe ya Rayon Sports buratangaza ko bwajuririye ibihano iyi kipe iherutse guhabwa n’Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA).
Rayon Sport yikuye mu mikino ngarukamwaka y’igikombe cyitiriwe Ubutwari, isimbuzwa Kiyovu Sports.
Ibi byatumye FERWAFA ihanisha Rayon Sports kutazakina iki gikombe muri 2021, gutanga amande y’ibihumbi 300Frw no kudakina umukino uwo ari wo wose wa gicuti muri uyu mwaka.
Umuvugizi wa Rayon Sports, Jean Paul Nkurunziza aganira n’Umuseke yavuze ko bamaze gutanga ubujurire bwabo muri FERWAFA.
Ati « Twamaze kujurira ibyemeze twari twarafatiwe, igisigaye ni inzego zibishinzwe zigiye gusuzuma ikibazo cyacu. »
Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa FERWAFA, Uwayezu Francois Régis yemereye Umuseke ko iri shyirahamwe ryamaze kwakira ubu bujurire.
Ati «Igisigaye  tugiye kubishyikiriza komisiyo ishinzwe ubujurire muri FERWAFA kugira ngo barebe niba hari uko basesengura bityo ko imyanzuro izajya hanze mu minsi mike. »
Rayon Sports iri ku mwanya wa kabiri muri Shampiyona n’amanota 41, irarushwa amanota ane na mukeba wayo APR FC ya mbere.
Rayon iri kwitegura umukino wo kwishyura mu ijonjora ry’ibanze ry’Igikombe cy’Amahoro mu mukino izakirwamo na Intare FC ku wa Gatatu. Umukino ubanza w’iri rushanwa, warangiye iyi kipe yambara ubururu n’umweru itsinze ibitego 4-0.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Perezida Kagame akomeye kuri Arsenal ihagaze nabi mu Bwongereza
Body:
Perezida Paul Kagame umukunzi wa Arsenal yo mu Bwongereza, asanga hari igikwiye guhinduka muri yo kugira ngo ibe yakongera kuba mu makipe ahatanira ibikombe.
Mu kiganiro Perezida Kagame yagiranye n’Ikinyamakuru New African Magazine, yabajijwe ku myitwarire n’umusaruro wa Arsenal FC muri iyi minsi. Ahamya ko iyi kipe yakundaga guhatanira umwanya wa mbere cyangwa uwa kabiri, ubu abona ko atari ko bimeze.
Ati “Arsenal yakundaga kuba ihataniye umwanya wa mbere cyangwa uwa kabiri muri Shampiyona, nyuma kuboneka mu makipe ane ya mbere bitangira kuba ikibazo. Ubu irwanira kuguma mu makipe 10 ya mbere. Hari ikigomba guhinduka.”
Abajijwe niba agikunda Arsenal nyuma yo gusubira inyuma, yagize ati “Ndacyakunda Arsenal. Ifite umwihariko w’umukino mwiza, ariko ntabwo bigomba kurangira ari ugukina byo gukina gusa, ahubwo ikine igamije gutsinda.”
Perezida Kagame avuga ko ibyo abona byahinduka abibona nk’umufana, akaba adafite icyo yakora ngo bihunduke.
Ati “Ikibabaje ni uko ndi umufana kandi nta kintu nabikoraho. Icyo nshobora gukora ni ugukomeza kuyireba kuri Televiziyo nkababazwa n’uko yatsinzwe, nkishima mu gihe yatsinze. Rimwe uba wumva wakubita ibipfunsi televiziyo iyo ubonye hari amakosa bari gukora. Gusa urakomeza ukayiba inyuma.”
Abajijwe niba amafaranga u Rwanda rwashoye muri Visit Rwanda mu bufatanye bagiranye n’iriya kipe yari ngombwa, Perezida Kagame yemeje ko gukorana na yo ari uko iri mu zikunzwe ku Isi ndetse byazamuye umubare w’abakerarugendo baza mu gihugu.
Ati “Abantu banenga bagira amahirwe menshi kuko ntabwo baba bafite ibyo babazwa. Ndabibazwa, amafaranga twashoye muri Arsenal yatanze umusaruro mwiza. Kuri ubu dufite umubare w’abakerarungo wiyongereye. Ndatekereza ko dushobora kuba twarinjije atari munsi y’inshuro eshanu kuruta ayo twatanze.”
U Rwanda rwasinyanye amasezereno yo kwamamaza ibyiza nyaburanga bigize igihugu n’amakipe akomeye i Burayi, Paris St. Germain yo mu Bufaransa na Arsenal yo mu Bwongereza.
Arsenal ifanwa na Perezida w’u Rwanda, Paul Kagame na benshi mu Banyarwanda iri  ku mwanya wa 10 muri shampiyona y’ikiciro cya mbere mu Bwongereza, ifite amanota 31 mu mikino 25 imaze gukina, irushwa na Liverpool ya mbere amanota 42.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Ally Niyonzima ku mukino wa mbere muri Rayon batsinze, ati “gutwara igikombe birashoboka”
Body:
Kuri iki Cyumweru tariki ya 9 Gashyantare 2020, Rayon Sports yatsinze Bugesera FC  1-0, umukino wa mbere Ally Niyonzima yakiniyemo Rayon Sports kuva yasinya amasezerano yo kuyikinira.
Ally Niyonzima yinjiye mu kibuga ku munota wa 36’ asimbuye Umunya-Mali Omar Sidibe wavunitse afasha Rayon Sports kubona amanota atatu.
Uyu mukinnyi yashimiye umutoza wamugiriye ikizere akamuha umwanya wo gukina kandi ataramara iminsi myinshi akorana imyitozo na bagenzi be muri Rayon Sports.
Ati: “Nishimiye kuba dutsinze umukino wa mbere nkinnye muri Rayon Sports, birimo kugenda neza ndimo kumenyerana n’abandi. Natinze kuza ndetse nkora imyitozo mike kurusha abandi, ariko umutoza yangiriye ikizere anshyira mu kibuga, biranshimishije cyane.”
Avuga ko Rayon Sports izatwara igikombe, ndetse yabyijeje abafana.
Ati “Birashoboka cyane ko Rayon Sports twatwara igikombe uyu mwaka, umwaka ushize baragitwaye kandi twabarushaga (APR FC) amanota 12 badutwara igikombe, rero n’uyu mwaka birashoboka, none byaba akarusho tugitwaye ndi muri iyi kipe.”
Ally Niyonzima yaje mu Rwanda avuye muri Académie Tchité yo mu Burundi, akinira Mukura Victory Sports mu 2015.
Ku wa 30 Kanama 2017 ni bwo Niyonzima Ally yasinyiye AS Kigali amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri, avuye muri Mukura Victory Sports, atanzweho miliyoni 10 Frw mbere y’uko ayivamo mu ntangiriro za 2019.
Yaguzwe na APR FC muri Gashyantare 2019 avuye muri AS Kigali ku masezerano y’amezi atandatu, ayivamo muri Kanama, 2019 ajya muri Oman aho yaje kuva aza muri Rayon Sports asinyira amezi atandatu.
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: APR ikiyoboye itsinze Marines 3-0, Rayon yisubiza uwa kabiri itsinze 1-0 Bugesera
Body:
Imikino yo ku munsi wa 19 wa shampiyona y’u Rwanda, kuri stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo APR FC yatsinze 3-0 Marines FC, iyi kipe y’ingabo z’u Rwanda ikomeza kuyobora urutonde mu gihe mukeba wayo, Rayon Sports i Bugegeza yatsinze Bugesera FC 1-0 yisubiza umwanya wa kabiri.
Rayon Sports yakinnye uyu mukino iri ku mwanya wa gatatu wa shampiyona irushwa na APR FC ya mbere amanota ane, isabwa gutsinda uyu mukino ngo igabanye ikinyuranyo cy’amanota ari hagati yayo na APR FC.
Bugesera FC yari yakiriye uyu mukino yari ku mwanya wa gatandatu n’umwenda w’igitego Kimwe isabwa gutsinda kugira ngo igume kuri uyu mwanya.
Imininota 30’ ya mbere y’umukino yihirariwe na Rayon Sports, yabonye uburyo butata bwashoboraga kuvamo igitego, ku mipira itatu Omar Siodibe yateye mu izamu rya Bugesera ariko ntihavamo igitego.
Nyuma yo kubona ko ikipe ye iri kurushwa cyane, Masudi Djuma umutoza wa Bugesera yakoze impinduka ku munota wa 39’ Rucogoza Djihad asimbura Djamal Bazuza.
Ku munota wa 40’ Rayon Sports yakoze impinduka Omar Side bakunda kwita Mwalimu asimburwa na Niyonzima Ally nyuma yo kuvunika. Igice cya mbere cyarangiye amakipe yombi anganya 0-0.
Mu gice cya kabiri Rayon Sports yakoze impinduka Drissa Dagnogo  asimbura Nshimiyima Amran nyuma y’iminota ine gusa yinjiye mu kibuga ku mukino wa mbere akiniye iyi kipe yahise abona igitego cya mbere yatsinze n’umutwe nyuma y’umupira yateye n’umutwe ukubita igiti cy’izamu ujya mu izamu.
Rayon Sports yatangiye guherekanya umupira neza ba rutahizamu bayo bakarata ibitego.
Ku munota wa 70’ Bizimna Yannick yahushije igitego nyuma yo gutera umupira ugakubita igiti cy’izamu, Ku munoto wa 77’ Shaban Hussein Tchabalala yahushije igitego nyuma yo gusigarana n’umuzamu ateye umupira unyura hejuru y’izamu.
Umukino warangiye Rayon Sports itsinze Bugesera FC 1-0, ibona amanota atatu ayihesha umwanya wa kabiri wa shampiyona.
Ku rundi ruhande APR FC yatsinze Marines FC 3-0, ikomeza gushyiramo ikinyuranyo cy’amanota ane hagati yayo na Rayon Sports .
Abakinnyi 11 babanjemo ku mpande zombi: 
Bugsere FC: Ntagungira Masud (GK), Douglas Patrick , Issa Kariyo, Mugisha Francois Master, Kwitonda Alain, Niyitegeka Idrissa, Sina Jerome, Murengezi Rodrigue , Nzabanita David (C), Djamal Bazuza, na Shaban Hussein Tchabalala.
Rayon Sports: Kimenyi Yves (G.K) Rugwiro Herve, Ndizeye Samuel, Rutanga Eric, Iradukunda Eric RaduNshimiyimana Amran, Omar Sidibe, Mugheni Kakule Fabrice, Sugira Ernest, Bizimana Yannick na Sekamana Maxime.
AMAFOTO YARANZE UMUKINO








 


 
AMAFOTO © Adrien KUBWAYO 
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: FERWAFA yahannye Rayon Sports…
Body:
Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda, FERWAFA, rimaze gusohora itangazo ry’ibihano byafatiwe Rayon Sports izira ko ititabiriye imikino y’Igikombe cy’ubutwari 2020. Harimo kutazakina iki gikombe muri 2021, gutanga amande y’ibihumbi 300Frw no kudakina umukino uwo ari wo wose wa gicuti.
Rayon Sports ntiyitabiriye imikino ngarukamwaka y’igikombe cyitiriwe ubutwari, isimbuzwa Kiyovu Sports.
Kiriya gikombe giheruka kwegukanwa na APR FC.
FERWAFA yavuze ko ishingiye ku ngingo ya 12 itegeka amakipe yose kwitabira amarushanwa yateguwe na Ferwafa uko yakabaye isanze ‘ari ngombwa guhanisha Rayon Sports kutitabira igikombe cy’Ubutwari cya 2021, kwishyura amafaranga y’u Rwanda ibihumbi 300 ndetse no kudakina umukino wa gicuti haba imbere mu gihugu ndetse no hanze yacyo mu gihe cy’amezi 12.’
Ifashe ibi bihano nyuma y’uko Rayon Sports yikuye mu irushanwa ry’intwari ku mpamvu z’uko yashakaga gukinisha abakinnyi badafite ibyangombwa mu rwego rwo kubagerageza ariko amategeko y’irushanwa atabyemera bityo iyavamo.
 
Rayon Sports ngo iragira icyo ibitangazaho mu masaha ari imbere…
Umuvugizi wa Rayon Sports Jean Paul Nkurunziza yabwiye Umuseke ko nabo amakuru ya biriya bihano bayamenye ariko ko ntacyo yabitangazaho mbere y’uko inama ya Komite iterana.
Ati:” Ayo makuru rwose twayamenye ariko nakubwira ko turi bukore inama kuri iki gicamunsi tukaza kurebera hamwe icyo bashingiyeho bafata biriya byemezo. Nyuma y’iyi nama nibwo nagira icyo ngutangariza kirenze ibi nkubwiye.”
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Tour du Rwanda 2020: Cameroun n’u Bubiligi ntibazayitabira, basimbujwe ‘ikipe ya Adrien’
Body:
Mu gihe habura iminsi 14 ngo Tour du Rwanda 2020 ibe  ku nshuro ya 12, ikipe ya Cameroun n’iy’Ababiligi batarengeje imyaka 23 zatangaje ko zitazitabira iri rushanwa  kubera impamvu zise ‘izabo bwite.’ Zasimbujwe SACA itozwa na Adrien Niyonshuti.
Isiganwa ry’amagare mpuzamahanga rigiye gukinwa ku nshuro yaryo ya kabiri riri kuri 2.1. Amakipe ya Cameroon n’Ububiligi yabwiye ishyirahamwe ry’umukino w’amagare mu Rwanda (FERWACY), ko atazitabira iri siganwa ku mpamvu zabo.
FERWACY yahise iyasimbuza SACA (Skol Adrien Cycling Academy) itozwa na Adrien Niyonshuti wamamaye cyane muri uyu mukino.
Tour du Rwanda igiye kuba ku nshuro ya 12, yabaye mpuzamahanga kuva mu 2009, icyo gihe ikaba yari iri ku rwego rwa 2.2 kugeza mu 2018 ubwo yegukanwaga na Mugisha Samuel.
Isiganwa rya 2020 rizitabirwa n’amakipe 15, u Rwanda ruzaba rufitemo ikipe y’Igihugu, Benediction Ignite Team y’i Rubavu, ya gatatu muri Afurika mu kiciro cya gatatu cy’amakipe akina uyu mukino ndetse na SACA yasimbuye amakipe atazitabira iri rushanwa.
 Inzira za Tour du Rwanda 2020:
 
Agace ka mbere: Tariki ya 23 Gashyantare 2020: Kigali Arena-Rwamagana-Kimironko (ibilometero 114.4)
Agace ka kabiri: Tariki ya 24 Gashyantare 2020: Kigali- Huye (ibilometero 120.5)
Agace ka gatatu: Tariki ya 25 Gashyantare 2020: Huye- Rusizi (ibilometero 142)
Agace ka kane: Tariki ya 26 Gashyantare 2020: Rusizi-Rubavu (ibilometero 206.3)
Agace ka gatanu: Tariki ya 27 Gashyantare 2020: Rubavu- Musanze (ibilometero 84.7)
Agace ka gatandatu: Tariki ya 28 Gashyantare 2020: Musanze- Muhanga (ibilometero 127.3)
Agace ka karindwi: Tariki ya 29 Gashyantare 2020: Nyamirambo- Mont Kigali (ibilometero 4.5)

Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Basketball: Patriots BBC yigaranzuye APR BBC irayitsinda
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 7 Gashyantare 2020, ubwo Basketball National League yasubukurwaga, Espoir BBC na Patriots BBC zibonye intsinzi.
Umukino wa mbere watangiye saa 18h00,  Espoir BBC ikina na  Shoot For The Stars, umukino urangira  Espoir  inyagiye  Shoot For The Stars  ku manota 118 kuri 68 nyuma yo kuyobora uduce tw’umukino twose.
Umukino wari utegerejwe na benshi ni uwahuje Patriots BBC na APR BBC.
Mu mikino wayo uheruka Patriots yatsinzwe  na IPRC Kigali.
Umukino w’ejo   yasabwaga gutsinda kugira ngo ikomeze ihatanire iki gikombe.
Agace ka mbere karangiye APR BBC iyoboye n’amanota 16-11, bituma abafana ba Patriots BBC bibaza niba itagiye gutakaza uyu mukino.
APR BBC yayoboye kandi agace ka kabiri, amakipe yombi ajya kuruhuka iri imbere n’amanota 24-21
Nyuma y’ikiruhuko mu gace ka gatatu Patriots yaboye agace ka gatatu n’amanota 44-43 harimo ikinyuranyo cy’inota rimwe.
Patriots yigaranzuye APR BBC iyitsinda agace ka kane ari nako kanyuma, birangira itsinze umukino n’amanota 64-57.
Uko imikino iteganyijwe kuri uyu wa Gatandatu:
Rusizi BBC vs UR CMHS (Rusizi, 9h00),
RP- IPRC Kigali BBC vs RP- IPRC Musanze (Kuri Stade Amahoro, 12h00),
RP-IPRC Huye BBC vs Tigers BBC, (Stade ya Huye, 13h00),
UR Huye BBC vs 30 Plus BBC, (Stade ya Huye, 14h00),
Jean Paul MUGABE
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Police FC yatsinze 2-0 Gasogi, ihita ikura Rayon ku mwanya wa kabiri
Body:
Umukino ubanzariza indi yo ku munsi wa 19 wa shampiyona y’ikiciro cya mbere mu Rwanda, Police FC yatsinze 2-0 Gasogi United ibona amanota atatu. Iyi kipe ya Police y’u Rwanda ihita ikura Rayon Sports ku mwanya wa kabiri by’agateganyo.
Police FC yafunguye amazamu ku munota wa 35’ ku gitego cyatsinzwe na Iyabivuze Osee nyuma yo guhererekanya umupira na Nshuti Dominique Savio na Dusabimana Jean Claude bamuhaye umupira wavuyemo igitego cya mbere.
Gasogi United yatangiye guherekanya umupira mu kibuga hagati ishaka igitego ariko kugera imbere y’izamu bikanga. Igice cya mbere cyarangiye Police FC iri imbere n’igitego 1-0.
Police FC yakoze impinduka, Iyabivuze Osee asimburwa na Harerimana Obed wari ugiye gukinira iyi kipe umukino wa mbere kuva yasinya amasezerano, naho Bigirimana Issa asimbura Songa Isaie, mu gihe Ntirushwa Aime yasimbuwe na Habimana Cedric.
Gasogi United na yo yakoze impinduka, Rugamba Jean Baptiste asimburwa na Muganza Isaac, Nshimiyimana Ibrahim asimburwa na Habimana Yves.
Ku munota wa 71’ Police FC yabonye igitego cya kabiri cyatsinzwe na Mico Justin ku mupira wari uvuye ku ruhande rw’ibumoso.
Umukino warangiye, Police FC ibonye amanota atatu y’umunsi wa 19, ifata umwanya wa kabiri by’agateganyo n’amanota 40, mu gihe Gasogi United yo yagumye ku mwanya wa 9 n’amanota 22.
Uko indi mikino yo ku munsi wa iteganyijwe 19:
Kuwa Gatandatu tariki 8 Gashyantare 2020
AS Kigali vs Etincelles FC (Kigali Stadium, 15h00’)
Espoir FC vs Sunrise FC (Rusizi, 15h00’)
